tika-s0402t:729_8: āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte tato rājagahaṃ gatomhi.
tika-s0402t:729_11: “Tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vadanto viya samanuyuñjakena vuttavacanato aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ āharanto apanāmessati,
tika-s0402t:729_13: Appatītā honti tena atuṭṭhā asomanassikāti apaccayo,
tika-s0402t:730_0: Yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desitoti ettha dhamma-
tika-s0402t:730_1: saddena catusaccadhammo vuttoti āha “yassa maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:730_5: Idāni “yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito”ti ettha dhamma-
tika-s0402t:730_7: na pana catusaccadhammoti adhippāyena atthavikappaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:730_9: Takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti ettha sammāsaddo ubhayatthāpi yojetabbo “sammā takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:730_13: tassa niyyānaṃ atthato dhammasseva niyyānanti tappaṭikkhepena “so dhammo…pe…
tika-s0402t:731_0: Yadi tiracchānasīhassa nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo,
tika-s0402t:731_1: kimaṅgaṃ pana tathāgatasīhassa nādoti āha “sīhanādanti seṭṭhanāda”nti.
tika-s0402t:731_2: Yadi vā tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā,
tika-s0402t:731_5: tassa bhūtatāya ayaṃ nādo seṭṭhanādo nāma hoti uttamanādo.
tika-s0402t:731_7: Imamatthaṃ pana vadantassa bhagavato aññato bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā natthīti abhītanādo nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:731_8: Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyā,
tika-s0402t:731_9: evaṃ pana vadantaṃ bhagavantaṃ koci uṭṭhahitvā paṭibāhituṃ samattho nāma natthīti ayaṃ nādo appaṭinādo nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:732_1: sammā vā nitudanti pīḷenti etenāti sannitodakaṃ.
tika-s0402t:732_13: tassa kira saddo ativiya virūpo amanāpo.
tika-s0402t:735_1: Pañcame kesamuttaṃ nivāso etesanti kesamuttiyāti āha “kesamuttanigamavāsino”ti.
tika-s0402t:736_0: “Mā anussavenā”tiādīsu pana eko daharakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ anussavo atthi,
tika-s0402t:736_1: evaṃ cirakālakatāya anussutiyā labbhamānaṃ kathamidaṃ aññathā siyā,
tika-s0402t:736_6: evaṃ paramparābhatakathaṃ nāma na aññathā siyā,
tika-s0402t:736_9: Eko kenaci kismiñci vuttamatte “evaṃ kira eta”nti gaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:736_13: Tena piṭakauggaṇhanakabhāvena ekacco tādisaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā tena taṃ samentaṃ sameti,
tika-s0402t:736_16: attano uggahaganthasampattiyā mā gaṇhitthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:737_0: Koci kañci vitakkento “evameva tena bhavitabba”nti kevalaṃ attano saṅkappavasena “bhūtamida”nti gaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:737_2: Añño “imāya yuttiyā bhūtamida”nti kevalaṃ anumānato nayaggāhena gaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:737_4: Kassaci “evametaṃ siyā”ti parikappentassa ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0402t:737_7: Aparassa cintayato yathāparikappitaṃ kañci atthaṃ “evametaṃ na aññathā”ti abhinivisantassa ekā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
tika-s0402t:737_8: Yā yassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ nijjhāyantassa paccakkhaṃ viya nirūpetvā cintentassa khamati.
tika-s0402t:738_1: Kodho nāma cetaso dukkhanti āha “kodhacittassa abhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:741_3: Dāsā nāma antojātā vā dhanakkītā vā karamarānītā vā sayaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ upagatā.
tika-s0402t:742_0: Nicchātoti ettha chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā jighacchāhetutāya,
tika-s0402t:742_3: Abbhantare santāpakarānaṃ kilesānanti attano santāne darathapariḷāhajananena santāpanakilesānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:742_4: Antotāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sīto sītalo bhūto jātoti sītibhūto.
tika-s0402t:745_2: Yasmā tehi vinā kathā na pavattati,
tika-s0402t:745_4: Atati satati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā,
tika-s0402t:745_6: Dhammappavattimattatāya hi paramatthato avijjamānopi kālo tasseva dhammassa pavattiavatthāvisesaṃ upādāya teneva vohārena atītotiādinā voharīyati,
tika-s0402t:745_7: atītādibhedo ca nāmāyaṃ nippariyāyato dhammānaṃyeva hoti,
tika-s0402t:745_9: Yathāvuttamatthaṃ itaresu dvīsu atidisati “anāgatapaccuppannesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0402t:745_12: Suttantapariyāyena paṭisandhito pubbe atīto addhā nāma,
tika-s0402t:745_14: saha cutipaṭisandhīti tadantaraṃ paccuppanno addhā nāma.
tika-s0402t:745_15: Abhidhammapariyāyena tīsu khaṇesu uppādato pubbe atīto addhā nāma,
tika-s0402t:745_18: Tatthāyaṃ suttantadesanāti suttantapariyāyeneva atītādivisayaṃ kathaṃ dassento “atīte kassapo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:746_1: “Cakkhu anicca”nti pañhe uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃseneva byākātabba”nti vuttaṃ niccatāya lesassapi tattha abhāvato,
tika-s0402t:746_4: Cakkhusote visesatthasāmaññatthānaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvato dvinnaṃ tesaṃ sadisacodanā paṭicchannamukheneva
tika-s0402t:746_5: byākaraṇīyā paṭikkhepavasena anuññātavasena ca vissajjitabbatoti āha “yathā cakkhu,
tika-s0402t:746_8: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpañhe yassa yena anaññatā coditā,
tika-s0402t:746_9: so eva paramatthato nupalabbhatīti ca jhānattayassa metteyyatākittanasadisoti abyākātabbatāya ṭhapanīyo vutto.
tika-s0402t:746_10: Evarūpo hi pañho tidhā avissajjanīyattā byākaraṇaṃ akatvā ṭhapetabbo.
tika-s0402t:747_4: Sassatavādibhāvameva dīpetīti attanā gahite ucchedavāde dosaṃ disvā attanopi sassatavādibhāvameva dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:747_6: Pañhaṃ pucchantehi paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadā pañhapucchanakānaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:748_1: Paṭicchādanattho eva vā caratisaddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha “paṭicchādetī”ti.
tika-s0402t:748_3: Tattha aññena vacanenāti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:748_10: “Evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upaneti,
tika-s0402t:748_12: “Ko āpanno”tiādinā hi codanaṃ avissajjetvāva vikkhepāpajjanaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:753_1: Aṭṭhame bhagavā mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesaṃ yāthāvato adhigamāyāti bhagavaṃmūlakā.
tika-s0402t:753_2: Tenāha “bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmā”ti.
tika-s0402t:753_3: Amhākaṃ dhammāti tehi attanā adhigantabbatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:754_2: Āpāthaṃ upagacchantā hi bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:754_4: Paṭisarati sabhāvasampaṭivedhavasena paccekaṃ upagacchatīti vā paṭisaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:754_7: tasmā paṭivijjhanavasena bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
tika-s0402t:754_10: Asatipi mukhe atthato evaṃ vadanto viya hotīti āha “phasso āgacchati ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmo”ti.
tika-s0402t:754_11: Phasso ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchantoyeva hi attano “ahaṃ kinnāmo”ti nāmaṃ pucchanto viya,
tika-s0402t:754_12: bhagavā cassa nāmaṃ karonto viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:755_1: attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha “bhagavato”ti.
tika-s0402t:755_7: Keci pana paṭibhātūti padassa dissatūti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0402t:755_11: Pāḷiyaṃ ko adhippayāsoti ettha ko adhikappayogoti attho.
tika-s0402t:759_4: Lobhādīni panetāni asahajātānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ kesañci akusalānaṃ upanissayapaccayaṭṭhena,
tika-s0402t:759_5: sahajātānaṃ adinnādānādīnaṃ kesañci sampayuttā hutvā uppādakaṭṭhena,
tika-s0402t:759_12: Tadapīti etthāpi eseva nayoti āha “sopi akusalamūla”nti.
tika-s0402t:759_17: Abhisaṅkharotīti ettha āyūhatīti atthaṃ vatvā tañca āyūhanaṃ paccayasamavāyasiddhito sampiṇḍanaṃ rāsikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0402t:760_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “vadhenā”tiādīsu vadhenāti māraṇena vā pothanena vā.
tika-s0402t:760_1: Vadhasaddo hi hiṃsanattho viheṭhanattho ca hoti.
tika-s0402t:761_0: Kālasmiṃ na vadatīti yuttakāle na vadati,
tika-s0402t:761_1: vattabbakālassa pubbe vā pacchā vā ayuttakāle vattā hoti.
tika-s0402t:761_5: Atthaṃ na vadatīti kāraṇaṃ na vadati,
tika-s0402t:761_7: Dhammaṃ na vadatīti sabhāvaṃ na vadati,
tika-s0402t:761_9: Vinayaṃ na vadatīti saṃvaravinayaṃ na vadati,
tika-s0402t:761_11: attano suṇantassa ca na saṃvaravinayāvahassa vattāti attho.
tika-s0402t:763_7: Sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti kasmā na sakkonti?
tika-s0402t:763_9: Rukkhamūle patitamāluvābījato hi latā uppajjitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhati.
tika-s0402t:763_10: Sā mahāpattā ceva bahupattā ca mahākolirapattasaṇṭhānehi tato ca mahantatarehi sākhāviṭapantarehi pattehi samannāgatā.
tika-s0402t:763_11: Atha naṃ rukkhaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya vinandhamānā sabbaviṭapāni sañchādetvā mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:763_12: sā vāte vāyante deve vā vassante oghanaheṭṭhāgatā olambanahetubhūtaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ janetvā tassa rukkhassa sabbasākhaṃ bhijjati,
tika-s0402t:763_14: Tato tasmiṃ rukkhe patiṭṭhitavimānaṃ bhijjati vinassati.
tika-s0402t:763_15: Iti tā devatāyo bhavanavināsabhayā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0402t:763_17: taṃ sākhāsu bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati,
tika-s0402t:763_18: rukkhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ pana yāva rukkhassa mūlamattampi tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:763_20: Tattha tattha palujjitvāti tattha tattha bhijjitvā.
tika-s0402t:766_1: Dasame tadahūti ettha tasmiṃ ahanīti atthoti āha “tasmiṃ ahu uposathe”ti.
tika-s0402t:766_4: Upavasantīti ca sīlena vā anasanena vā khīrasāyanādividhinā vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
tika-s0402t:766_6: bāhirakā sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanena khīrasāyanamadhusāyanādividhinā vā upetā hutvā viharanti.
tika-s0402t:766_11: tassa visesanabhāvena vuccamāno divāsaddo savisesena dīpetīti āha “divasassa divā,
tika-s0402t:767_0: Nāhaṃ kvacanītiādivacanassa micchābhinivesavasena pavattattā “idaṃ tassa musāvādasmiṃ vadāmī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:767_1: catukoṭikasuññatādassanavasena pavattaṃ pana ariyadassanamevāti na tattha musāvādo.
tika-s0402t:769_1: Ariyo hi nāhaṃ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṃ na passati,
tika-s0402t:769_2: kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati,
tika-s0402t:769_5: parikkhāraṭṭhāne parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:769_6: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-
tika-s0402t:769_7: saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatīti ayamattho.
tika-s0402t:769_9: saddaṃ āharitvā “mama kismiñci kiñcanatatthī”ti so parassa attānaṃ “mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāvena atthī”ti na passati,
tika-s0402t:769_12: parikkhāraṭṭhāne parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:769_13: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:769_14: na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:769_16: na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:770_0: Yasmā pana micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ yāthāvadassanassa asambhavato yathāvuttacatukoṭikasuññatādassanaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0402t:770_2: natthi pitā”tiādivacanaṃ viya micchāgāhavasena “nāhaṃ kvacanī”tiādi vuttanti yutto cettha musāvādasambhavo.
tika-s0402t:770_6: na pana sabbathā phalābhāvoti āha “byañjanameva hi ettha sāvasesa”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:772_1: sakko devānamindo devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhagavato aṭṭha yathābhucce vaṇṇe payirudāhāsi –
tika-s0402t:772_4: yāvañca so bhagavā bahujanahitāya paṭipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:772_5: evaṃ bahujanahitāya paṭipannaṃ bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ imināpaṅgena
tika-s0402t:773_0: Ādinā mahāgovindasutte vitthāritehi bahujanahitāya paṭipannādīhi buddhānubhāvadīpakehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0402t:773_1: Atha “navahi kāraṇehī”ti avatvā “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “ettha hi…pe…
tika-s0402t:773_4: imasmiṃ sutte “itipi so bhagavā”ti iminā vacanena avisesato sabbepi lokiyalokuttarā buddhaguṇā dīpitā,
tika-s0402t:773_5: tasmā tena dīpitaguṇe sandhāya “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehī”ti vuttanti.
tika-s0402t:773_6: Arahantiādīhi pāṭiyekkaguṇāva niddiṭṭhāti arahantiādīhi ekekehi padehi ekeke guṇāva niddiṭṭhāti attho.
tika-s0402t:774_1: Purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbāti “kiliṭṭhasmiñhi kāye pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhantī”tiādinā nayena yojanā kātabbāti attho.
tika-s0402t:775_0: Saṅghassa anussaraṇaṃ nāma tassa guṇānussaraṇamevāti āha “aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe anussaratī”ti.
tika-s0402t:775_1: Dve tayo vāre gāhāpitaṃ usumanti dve tayo vāre uddhanaṃ āropetvā sedanavasena gāhāpitaṃ usumaṃ.
tika-s0402t:775_2: Purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbāti “kiliṭṭhasmiñhi vatthe pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhantī”tiādinā nayena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0402t:776_1: viratāvāti etena pahānahetukā idhādhippetā viratīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:776_2: Kammakkhayakarañāṇena hi pāṇātipātadussīlyassa pahīnattā arahanto accantameva tato paṭiviratāti vuccati samucchedavasena pahānaviratīnaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0402t:776_4: maggadhammānaṃ pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ sammāvācādīnañca paccayapaccayuppannabhāve apekkhite sahajātānampi
tika-s0402t:776_6: gahaṇappavattiākāravasena paccayabhūtesu sammādiṭṭhiādīsu pahāyakadhammesu pahānakiriyāya purimakālavohāro,
tika-s0402t:776_7: paccayuppannāsu ca viratīsu viramaṇakiriyāya aparakālavohāro ca hotīti pahānaṃ vā samucchedavasena,
tika-s0402t:777_0: Atha vā pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti pāṇātipāto,
tika-s0402t:777_4: Te hi arahanto ariyamaggena pahāya samugghātetvā pāṇātipātadussīlyato accantameva paṭiviratāti vuccanti,
tika-s0402t:777_7: Viratāvāti avadhāraṇena tassā viratiyā kālādivasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:777_8: Yathā hi aññe samādinnaviratikāpi anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lābhajīvitādihetu samādānaṃ bhindanti,
tika-s0402t:777_10: arahanto pana sabbaso pahīnapāṇātipātattā accantaviratā evāti.
tika-s0402t:778_0: Daṇḍanasaṅkhātassa paraviheṭhanassa ca parivajjanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ daṇḍasatthānaṃ nikkhepavacananti āha “parūpaghātatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:778_1: Lajjīti ettha vuttalajjāya ottappampi vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:778_4: Dhammagarutāya vā arahantānaṃ dhammassa ca attā dhīnattā attādhipatibhūtā lajjāva vuttā,
tika-s0402t:778_11: saddo anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto.
tika-s0402t:779_0: Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti etena tassā viratiyā pavattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:779_3: yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesapaccayo hoti,
tika-s0402t:779_5: Evaṃ yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā virati sampajjati,
tika-s0402t:780_9: Atha vā sucibhūtenāti etena hirottappādīhi samannāgamo,
tika-s0402t:780_10: ahirikādīnañca pahānaṃ vuttamevāti “lajjī”tiādi na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:781_5: “idhekacco na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0402t:781_9: tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatī”tiādinā vuttā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogāpi paṭivirati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:782_2: thirabhāvo ca saccavāditāya ṭhitakathattā kathāvasena veditabboti āha “ṭhitakathāti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:782_3: Na ṭhitakathoti yathā haliddirāgādayo anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya na ṭhitā,
tika-s0402t:782_4: evaṃ na ṭhitā kathā yassa so na ṭhitakathoti haliddirāgādayo yathā kathāya upamā honti,
tika-s0402t:783_4: Evampi sāyanhabhojanenapi siyuṃ ekabhattikāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “viratā vikālabhojanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:783_5: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhānaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-s0402t:783_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā aparaṇho “vikālo”ti vutto.
tika-s0402t:784_0: Saṅkhepato “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādinayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ sacchandarāgappavattito naccādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:784_2: Attanā payojiyamānaṃ parehi payojāpīyamānañca naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññato pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva naccasaddena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:784_6: Ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato dassanāicceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:784_7: Avisūkabhūtassa gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha “visūkabhūtaṃ dassana”nti.
tika-s0402t:784_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāya khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāya “dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ gītaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0402t:785_0: Yaṃ kiñcīti ganthitaṃ vā aganthitaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ.
tika-s0402t:785_2: Tassāpi “yaṃ kiñcī”ti vacanato dhūpitassapi adhūpitassapi yassa kassaci vilepanādi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:785_5: Uccāsayanaṃ mahāsayanañca samaṇasārupparahitaṃ adhippetanti āha “pamāṇātikkantaṃ akappiyattharaṇa”nti,
tika-s0402t:785_7: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti,
tika-s0402t:785_9: Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:785_11: etasmiṃ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti.
tika-s0402t:785_12: āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:786_1: “Kittaka”nti imassa atthaṃ bodhetīti āha “kīvamahapphaloti kittakaṃ mahapphalo”ti.
tika-s0402t:786_3: saddo ratanapariyāyoti āha “pahūtarattaratanānanti pahūtena rattasaṅkhātena ratanena samannāgatāna”nti.
tika-s0402t:786_5: Bheritalasadisaṃ katvāti bheritalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:786_6: Tato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ na agghatīti yathāvuttaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ tato soḷasabhāgato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ na agghati.
tika-s0402t:786_7: Tato bahutaraṃ hotīti cakkavattirajjasirito bahutaraṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:787_0: Cātumahārājīkānantiādīsu cātumahārājikā nāma sinerupabbatassa vemajjhe honti,
tika-s0402t:787_10: Apica tāvatiṃsāti tesaṃ devānaṃ nāmamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:787_15: Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:787_16: Tattha dibbasukhaṃ yātā payātā sampattāti yāmā.
tika-s0402t:787_18: Pakatipaṭiyattārammaṇato atirekena ramitukāmakāle yathārucite bhoge nimminitvā nimminitvā ramantīti nimmānarati.
tika-s0402t:787_19: Cittācāraṃ ñatvā parehi nimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattī.
tika-s0402t:788_0: Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ manussagaṇanāya navutivassasatasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:788_1: Tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni.
tika-s0402t:788_2: Yāmānaṃ devānaṃ cuddasa ca vassakoṭiyo cattāri ca vassasatasahassāni.
tika-s0402t:788_3: Tusitānaṃ devānaṃ sattapaññāsa ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni.
tika-s0402t:788_4: Nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ dve ca vassakoṭisatāni tisso ca vassakoṭiyo cattāri ca vassasatasahassāni.
tika-s0402t:788_5: Paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ nava ca vassakoṭisatāni ekavīsa koṭiyo ca saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni.
tika-s0402t:789_4: Sīlasamādānato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kiñci akatvā dhammassavanena vā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena vā vītināmetabbanti āha “taṃ pana upavasantena…pe…
tika-s0402t:790_0: Vācaṃ bhinditvā uposathaṅgāni samādātabbānīti “imañca rattiṃ imañca divasa”nti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā
tika-s0402t:790_1: “uposathaṅgavasena aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni samādiyāmī”ti ekato katvā puna paccekaṃ “pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0402t:790_3: uccāsayanamahāsayanā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmī”ti evaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā yathāpāḷi samādātabbāni.
tika-s0402t:790_4: Pāḷiṃ ajānantena pana attano bhāsāya paccekaṃ vā “buddhapaññattaṃ uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti ekato adhiṭṭhānavasena vā samādātabbāni,
tika-s0402t:790_6: Upāsakasīlañhi attanā samādiyantenapi samādinnaṃ parasantike samādiyantenapi,
tika-s0402t:790_7: ekajjhaṃ samādinnampi samādinnameva hoti paccekaṃ samādinnampi.
tika-s0402t:790_8: Taṃ pana ekajjhaṃ samādiyato ekāyeva virati ekā cetanā hoti.
tika-s0402t:790_9: Sā pana sabbaviraticetanānaṃ kiccakārīti tenapi sabbasikkhāpadāni samādinnāneva.
tika-s0402t:790_10: Paccekaṃ samādiyato pana nānāviraticetanāyo yathāsakaṃ kiccavasena uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:791_6: Candappabhā tāragaṇāva sabbeti yathā candappabhāya kalaṃ sabbe tārāgaṇā nānubhavantīti ayamettha atthoti āha “candappabhāti sāmiatthe paccatta”nti.
tika-s0402t:796_2: Bāhirakasamayaṃ luñcitvā harantoti bāhirakānaṃ samayaṃ nisedhetvā āpanno.
tika-s0402t:797_0: Paññācakkhussa vibandhanato andhaṃ karotīti andhakaraṇoti āha “yassa rāgo uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:797_1: Acakkhukaraṇoti asamatthasamāsoyaṃ “asūriyapassāni mukhānī”tiādīsu viyāti āha “paññācakkhuṃ na karotīti acakkhukaraṇo”ti.
tika-s0402t:797_2: Paññānirodhikoti anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na deti,
tika-s0402t:797_3: lokiyapaññaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattipañcābhiññāvasena uppannampi samucchinditvā khipatīti paññānirodhikoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:797_9: taṃ paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ na detīti anibbānasaṃvattaniko.
tika-s0402t:800_1: Dutiye na aññātukāmoti na ājānitukāmoyevāti attho.
tika-s0402t:803_3: Paṭhamañhi sekhasīlasamādhipaññāyo vatvā pacchā asekhasīlādīni vadanto imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:806_5: Aparisesadhammajānanato vā aparisesasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:806_7: Samitanti tasseva vevacananti āha “satataṃ samitanti sabbakālaṃ nirantara”nti.
tika-s0402t:807_0: Visuddhisampāpanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhipāpanatthāya.
tika-s0402t:807_1: Samatikkamanatthāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca pahānatthāya.
tika-s0402t:807_2: Atthaṃ gamanatthāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamanāya,
tika-s0402t:807_5: Taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0402t:807_7: Apaccayanibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāyāti paccayarahitattā apaccayassa asaṅkhatassa taṇhāvānavirahitattā
tika-s0402t:810_1: Pañcame kiccakaraṇīyesu sahabhāvaṭṭhena amā hontīti amaccā.
tika-s0402t:810_4: Sassusasurapakkhikāti sassusasurā ca tappakkhiko ca sassusasurapakkhikā.
tika-s0402t:810_10: Avecca ratanassa guṇe yāthāvato ñatvā pasādo aveccappasādo.
tika-s0402t:810_11: So pana yasmā maggenāgatattā kenaci akampanīyo ca appadhaṃsiyo ca hoti,
tika-s0402t:811_5: yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0402t:811_11: assāso passāso”ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0402t:820_2: mūlassa vā gandho mūlagandhoti āha “mūlavatthuko gandho”ti.
tika-s0402t:820_4: Idāni mūlaṃ gandhayogato gandhoti imamatthaṃ dassento “gandhasampannaṃ vā mūlameva mūlagandho”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:820_5: Pacchimoyevettha atthavikappo yuttataroti dassetuṃ “tassa hi gandho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:823_9: rājadhāniṃ sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
tika-s0402t:823_12: bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa abhibhūsambhavaṃ nāma sāvakayugaṃ ahosi aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ. Atha kho,
tika-s0402t:823_14: sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesī”tiādinā brahmasaṃyutte āgatassa aruṇavatisuttantassa aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:823_17: na tāva kulesu bhattaṃ niṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:824_3: Anekavihitaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ katvāti “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti,
tika-s0402t:824_4: supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vā dassetī”tiādinā nayena āgataṃ anekappakāraṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:824_6: Gāthādvayaṃ abhāsīti thero kira “kathaṃ desitā kho dhammadesanā sabbesaṃ piyā manāpā”ti cintetvā “sabbepi
tika-s0402t:824_7: pāsaṇḍā sabbe devamanussā attano attano samaye purisakāraṃ vaṇṇayanti,
tika-s0402t:824_10: Evamassa dhammadesanā sabbesaṃ piyā bhavissati manāpā”ti ñatvā tīsu piṭakesu vicinitvā “ārambhatha nikkamathā”ti idaṃ gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0402t:825_0: Kiṃ āloko ayanti kassa nu kho ayaṃ ālokoti.
tika-s0402t:825_2: Sabbeti lokadhātuyaṃ sabbe devā ca manussā ca.
tika-s0402t:825_3: Osaṭāya parisāyāti dhammassavanatthaṃ samosaṭāya parimitaparicchinnāya parisāya.
tika-s0402t:825_4: Atthopi nesaṃ pākaṭo ahosīti na kevalaṃ te saddameva assosuṃ,
tika-s0402t:825_5: atha kho atthopi tesaṃ pakatisavanūpacāre viya pākaṭo ahosi.
tika-s0402t:826_3: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti yattako candimasūriyehi obhāsiyamāno lokadhātusaṅkhāto ekeko loko,
tika-s0402t:826_6: Kasmā panesā ānītāti esā cūḷanikā lokadhātu kasmā bhagavatā ānītā,
tika-s0402t:827_3: Kampanadevatūpasaṅkamanādinā jātacakkavāḷena saha yogakkhemaṃ ṭhānaṃ jātikkhettaṃ.
tika-s0402t:827_6: Sabbesampi buddhānaṃ evaṃ jātikkhettaṃ tannivāsīnaṃyeva ca devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayoti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:827_7: Paṭisandhiggahaṇādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa pakampanassa labbhanato.
tika-s0402t:828_0: Sahassaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitaṃ majjhimikantiādinā majjhimikāya lokadhātuyā sahassaṃ tisahassilokadhātu,
tika-s0402t:828_4: Āṇā pharatīti tannivāsidevatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena vattati,
tika-s0402t:828_6: adhippāyavasena ca pana “yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vacanato buddhānaṃ avisayo nāma natthi,
tika-s0402t:833_1: Catutthassa paṭhame sammā ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ samādānanti āha “samādānaṃ vuccati gahaṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:833_3: Lokiyasīlassa adhisīlabhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “apica sabbampi lokiyasīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:833_5: Pañcapi dasapi vā sīlāni sīlaṃ nāma,
tika-s0402t:833_6: pātimokkhasaṃvaro adhisīlaṃ nāma anavasesakāyikacetasikasaṃvarabhāvato maggasīlassa padaṭṭhānabhāvato ca.
tika-s0402t:833_11: Apica nibbānaṃ patthayantena samādinnaṃ pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlampi adhisīlameva nibbānādhigamassa paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:833_12: Nibbānaṃ patthayantena samāpannā aṭṭha samāpattiyopi adhicittameva.
tika-s0402t:836_0: Evaṃ atīte anāgate ca vaṭṭamūlakadukkhasallakkhaṇavasena saṃvegavatthutāya vimuttiākaṅkhāya paccayabhūtā kammassakatapaññāpi adhipaññāti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:839_1: Chaṭṭhe samattakārīti anūnena paripūrena ākārena samannāgato.
tika-s0402t:839_2: Sikkhāpadānaṃ khuddānukhuddakattaṃ apekkhāsiddhanti āha “tatrāpi saṅghādisesaṃ khuddaka”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:839_5: Lokavajjaṃ nāpajjati lokavajjasikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamasādhakassa kilesagahanassa sabbaso pahīnattā.
tika-s0402t:839_6: Paṇṇattivajjameva āpajjati paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ vā ajānatopi āpattisambhavato.
tika-s0402t:839_7: Cittena āpajjanto rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpajjatīti upanikkhittasādiyena āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:840_1: tāni eva ādibrahmacariyakāni yathā “vinayo eva venayiko”ti āha “maggabrahmacariyassā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:840_2: Cattāri mahāsīlasikkhāpadānīti cattāri pārājikāni sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0402t:840_5: Vinipāteti virūpaṃ sadukkhaṃ saupāyāsaṃ nipātetīti vinipāto,
tika-s0402t:840_9: na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:840_16: Heṭṭhimantato sattamabhavato upari anuppajjanadhammatāya vā niyato.
tika-s0402t:840_19: So pana paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho ca adhigantabbabhāvena icchitabboti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā
tika-s0402t:840_20: sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ parā gati assāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-s0402t:841_0: Tanubhāvāti pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca kadāci karahaci uppattiyā ca tanubhāvena.
tika-s0402t:841_1: Tanuttañhi dvīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ adhiccuppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca.
tika-s0402t:841_2: Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:841_3: kadāci karahaci uppajjanti viraḷākārā hutvā viraḷavāpite khette aṅkurā viya.
tika-s0402t:841_4: Uppajjamānāpi ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:841_5: mandamandā uppajjanti tanukākārā hutvā abbhapaṭalamiva makkhikāpattamiva ca.
tika-s0402t:841_6: Tattha keci therā bhaṇanti “sakadāgāmissa kilesā kiñcāpi cirena uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:841_8: Tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:841_11: Dvīhiyeva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṃ tanuttaṃ veditabbaṃ adhiccuppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya cāti.
tika-s0402t:842_6: kammaṃ vā phalenāti saṃyojanānīti āha “saṃyojanānanti bandhanāna”nti.
tika-s0402t:842_7: Asamucchinnarāgādikassa hi etarahi khandhādīnaṃ āyatiṃ khandhādīhi sambandho,
tika-s0402t:842_9: katānampi kammānaṃ asamatthabhāvāpattito rāgādīnaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca saṃyojanaṭṭho siddho.
tika-s0402t:843_4: Tattha parinibbāyitā cassa kāmaloke khandhabījassa apunāgamanavasenevāti dassetuṃ “anāvattidhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:843_6: Anāvattidhammoti tato brahmalokā punappunaṃ paṭisandhivasena na āvattanadhammo.
tika-s0402t:844_0: Padesaṃ padesakārī ārādhetīti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ pāripūriyā ekadesabhūtaṃ heṭṭhimamaggattayaṃ padeso,
tika-s0402t:844_1: taṃ karonto padesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ phalattayameva ārādheti,
tika-s0402t:844_4: Paripūraṃ paripūrakārīti sīlakkhandhādīhi saddhindriyādīhi ca parito pūraṇena paripūrasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ
tika-s0402t:847_1: Sattame kulā kulaṃ gamanakoti kulato kulaṃ gacchanto.
tika-s0402t:847_2: Dve vā tayo vā bhaveti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave.
tika-s0402t:847_10: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule uppatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0402t:847_12: Kevalo hi kulasaddo mahākulameva vadati “kulaputto”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:847_15: Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃ khandhabījaṃ atthi,
tika-s0402t:847_18: Tenāha “ekasseva bhavassa bījaṃ etassa atthīti ekabījī”ti.
tika-s0402t:848_0: Uddhaṃvāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto,
tika-s0402t:848_1: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto.
tika-s0402t:848_8: tasmā āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā parinibbāyanto upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma hotīti āha “yo pana kappasahassāyukesu avihesū”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:848_9: So tividho hotīti ñāṇassa tikkhamajjhamudubhāvena tividho hoti.
tika-s0402t:849_1: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti evaṃ saddhādhuravasena abhinivisitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0402t:849_3: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti evaṃ paññādhuraṃ katvā abhiniviṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:849_4: Yathāvuttameva aṭṭhavidhattaṃ kolaṃkolasattakkhattuparamesu atidisanto “tathā kolaṃkolā sattakkhattuparamā cā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:850_0: Tattha sattakkhattuṃ paramā bhavūpapatti attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ assa,
tika-s0402t:850_1: tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
tika-s0402t:850_2: Bhagavatā gahitanāmavaseneva cetāni ariyāya jātiyā jātānaṃ tesaṃ nāmāni jātāni kumārānaṃ mātāpitūhi gahitanāmāni viya.
tika-s0402t:850_3: Ettakañhi ṭhānaṃ gato ekabījī nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:850_5: ettakaṃ sattakkhattuparamoti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:850_9: Ko pana nesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
tika-s0402t:851_0: Tattha “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:851_1: “upari tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannā”ti vacanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:851_2: “Paṭhamamaggo niyamehī”ti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:851_3: “Upari tayo maggā niyamentī”ti vāde paṭhamamagge anuppanneyeva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjatīti.
tika-s0402t:851_4: “Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyametī”ti vādo pana yujjati.
tika-s0402t:851_5: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
tika-s0402t:852_0: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti vaṭṭābhirato,
tika-s0402t:852_7: nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-s0402t:852_10: yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0402t:852_11: yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0402t:852_14: kālena manusse saṃsaritvā pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇantova idha gahito,
tika-s0402t:853_0: “Sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti vacanato pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-s0402t:853_1: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-s0402t:853_6: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyissati,
tika-s0402t:854_0: Idāni tassa pabhedaṃ dassento “tīsu pana vimokkhesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:854_1: Imassa pana sakadāgāmino ekabījinā saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
tika-s0402t:854_6: tathā animittaappaṇihitavimokkhehīti evaṃ dvādasa arahantā hontīti āha “yathā pana sakadāgāmino,
tika-s0402t:857_9: hatthāmalakaṃ viya pākaṭe vibhūte katvā vibhāveti.
tika-s0402t:857_10: Gaṇhāpetīti te dhamme manasā anupakkhite diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhe kārento uggaṇhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:857_12: Paṭiladdhaguṇehīti tāya desanāya tannissayapaccattapurisakārena ca tesaṃ paṭividdhaguṇehi.
tika-s0402t:857_13: Vodāpetīti tesaṃ cittasantānaṃ assaddhiyādikilesamalāpagamanena pabhassaraṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:857_14: Saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ kathetīti ativiya sukhumaṃ katvā katheti.
tika-s0402t:858_0: Accayanaṃ sādhumariyādaṃ madditvā vītikkamanaṃ accayoti āha “aparādho”ti.
tika-s0402t:858_4: So hi aparajjhantaṃ purisaṃ adhibhavitvā pavattati.
tika-s0402t:858_8: tathāgatoti āha “ariyassa vinayeti buddhassa bhagavato sāsane”ti.
tika-s0402t:858_9: Puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karontoti kāmaṃ “vuddhi hesā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena vākyaṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:858_10: tathāpi desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto “saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0402t:863_2: Karaṇīyānīti ettha avassake anīyasaddo daṭṭhabboti āha “avassakiccānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:866_5: Erakādīhi katāni hi chavāni lāmakāni dussānīti “chavadussānī”ti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-s0402t:869_2: Dūrabhāvo ca ākāsassa valāhakavigamena hotīti āha “valāhakavigamena dūrībhūte”ti.
tika-s0402t:869_7: Duvidhamevassa saṃyojanaṃ natthīti orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyavasena duvidhampi saṃyojanaṃ assa paṭhamajjhānalābhino ariyasāvakassa natthi.
tika-s0402t:869_10: itaraṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ puna imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhivasena ānetuṃ asamatthatāya natthīti vuttanti attho.
tika-s0402t:869_11: Jhānalābhino hi sabbepi ariyā brahmalokūpapannā heṭṭhā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:869_12: uddhaṃ uddhaṃ uppajjantāpi vehapphalaṃ akaniṭṭhaṃ bhavaggañca patvā na punaññattha jāyanti,
tika-s0402t:869_15: Jhānavasena hi heṭṭhā na āgacchatīti jhānānāgāmī.
tika-s0402t:872_2: Avītataṇhatāya hi taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā,
tika-s0402t:872_4: Te paccayabāhullāya yuttappayuttā hontīti cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā nāma honti.
tika-s0402t:872_5: Sikkhāya agāravabhāvato sithilaṃ agāḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti sāthalikā.
tika-s0402t:872_7: Sithilasaddena samānatthassa sathalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:873_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana visesanassa pubbanipātavaseneva atthaṃ dassento “jātabhaṇḍanā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:873_3: Kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:873_4: Kalahassa pubbabhāgoti kalahassa hetubhūtā paṭibhāgā taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā.
tika-s0402t:873_5: Hatthaparāmāsādivasenāti kujjhitvā aññamaññassa hatthe gahetvā palapanaacchindanādivasena.
tika-s0402t:873_7: nāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā viruddhavādabhūtaṃ vivādaṃ āpannāti vivādapannā.
tika-s0402t:873_9: Mukhasannissitatāya vācā idha “mukha”nti adhippetāti āha “pharusā vācā mukhasattiyo”ti.
tika-s0402t:874_0: Satipi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi pana duviññeyyanānattaṃ khīrodakasammoditaṃ
tika-s0402t:874_1: accantametaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhatīti āha “khīrodakaṃ viya bhūtā”ti.
tika-s0402t:874_6: Mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā olokanaṃ cakkhūni viya cakkhūni nāmāti āha “upasantehi mettacakkhūhī”ti.
tika-s0402t:874_9: Pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjatīti khuddikādibhedena pañcappakārā pīti uppajjati.
tika-s0402t:875_0: Kena udakena dārito pabbatappadesoti katvā āha “kandaro nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:875_6: Yattha upari unnatappadesato udakaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati ceva sandati ca,
tika-s0402t:878_3: rañño vā senāya aṅgabhūtattā rañño aṅganti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:878_8: Ānetvā hunitabbānañhi cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ āhunanti.
tika-s0402t:878_10: Paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti tassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato paṭiggaṇhituṃ anucchaviko.
tika-s0402t:879_0: Pāhunakabhattassāti disavidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ atthāya sakkāre paṭiyattassa āgantukabhattassa.
tika-s0402t:879_1: Tañhi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:879_4: Tathā hesa ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte dissati,
tika-s0402t:879_9: Ayañhettha adhippāyo “ñātimittā vippavuṭṭhā na cirasseva samāgacchanti,
tika-s0402t:880_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā,
tika-s0402t:880_3: dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
tika-s0402t:881_1: Ubho hettha sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbalokena kayiramānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti vā añjalikaraṇīyo.
tika-s0402t:882_1: natthi ito uttaraṃ visiṭṭhanti hi anuttaraṃ,
tika-s0402t:882_3: Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyati rakkhati,
tika-s0402t:882_4: khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṃ, kedārādi,
tika-s0402t:882_7: Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ “rañño sālikkhetaṃ yavakkheta”nti vuccati,
tika-s0402t:882_9: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni viruhanti,
tika-s0402t:885_9: So hi navabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā jiṇṇabhāvaṃ appatto majjhe paribhogakālepi dubbaṇṇo ca dukkhasamphasso ca appagghoyeva hoti.
tika-s0402t:885_11: jiṇṇakāle pana aḍḍhamāsakaṃ vā kākaṇikaṃ vā agghati.
tika-s0402t:885_13: Navotipi upasampadāya pañcavassakālato heṭṭhā jātiyā saṭṭhivassopi navoyeva.
tika-s0402t:885_15: Dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nittejatāya sarīravaṇṇopi na sampajjati,
tika-s0402t:885_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sarīravaṇṇena dubbaṇṇatāpi guṇavaṇṇassa abhāvena dubbaṇṇatāyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:886_0: Ye kho panassāti ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākā vā ñātimittādayo vā etaṃ puggalaṃ sevanti.
tika-s0402t:886_1: Tesanti tesaṃ puggalānaṃ cha satthāre sevantānaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ viya.
tika-s0402t:886_2: Devadatte sevantānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ viya ca taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
tika-s0402t:886_3: Majjhimoti pañcavassakālato paṭṭhāya yāva navavassakālā majjhimo nāma.
tika-s0402t:886_6: Kiṃ nu kho tuyhanti tuyhaṃ bālassa bhaṇitena ko atthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:887_0: Tīhi kappāsaaṃsūhi suttaṃ kantitvā katavatthanti tayo kappāsaaṃsū gahetvā kantitasuttena vāyitaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ,
tika-s0402t:888_0: Tesaṃ taṃ hotīti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhādayo sevantā viya taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti.
tika-s0402t:888_1: Sammāsambuddhañhi ekaṃ nissāya yāvajjakālā muccanakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:888_2: tathā sāriputtattheramahāmoggallānatthere avasese ca asīti mahāsāvake nissāya saggagatasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:888_3: yāvajjakālā tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ paṭipannasattānampi pamāṇaṃ natthiyeva.
tika-s0402t:888_4: Ādheyyaṃ gacchatīti tassa mahātherassa taṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ yathā gandhakaraṇḍake kāsikavatthaṃ ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati,
tika-s0402t:888_5: evaṃ uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ hadaye ca ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati.
tika-s0402t:891_1: Navame yathā yathā kammaṃ karotīti yena yena pakārena pāṇaghātādipāpakammaṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:891_2: Vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatevāti avadhāraṇena kammasiddhiyaṃ tabbipākassa appavatti nāma natthīti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:891_4: Evaṃ santanti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “evaṃ sante”ti.
tika-s0402t:892_0: “Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”tiādinā kāyassa asubhāniccādiākāraanupassanā kāyabhāvanāti
tika-s0402t:892_8: te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:893_0: Yathā hi pabbatapāde pūtipaṇṇassa udakaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:893_1: kāḷavaṇṇaṃ olokentānaṃ byāmasataṃ gambhīraṃ viya khāyati,
tika-s0402t:893_2: yaṭṭhiṃ vā rajjuṃ vā gahetvā minantassa piṭṭhipādoddharaṇamattampi na hoti,
tika-s0402t:893_4: tāva taṃ puggalaṃ sañjānituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-s0402t:893_5: sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya anāgāmī viya ca khāyati.
tika-s0402t:893_8: Iti te rāgādayo “ettako aya”nti puggalassa pamāṇaṃ dassentāva uppajjantīti pamāṇakaraṇā nāma vuttā.
tika-s0402t:898_1: vipassanāpādakaaṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ vipassanācittañca tato cittato adhikaṃ cittanti adhicittanti āha “adhicittanti samathavipassanācitta”nti.
tika-s0402t:898_2: Anuyuttassāti anuppannassa uppādanavasena uppannassa paṭibrūhanavasena anu anu yuttassa,
tika-s0402t:898_4: Ettha ca purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto nisīdanaṃ ādāya “asukasmiṃ rukkhamūle
tika-s0402t:898_5: vā vanasaṇḍe vā pabbhāre vā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamantopi tattha gantvā hatthehi vā pādehi
tika-s0402t:898_6: vā nisajjaṭṭhānato tiṇapaṇṇāni apanentopi adhicittaṃ anuyuttoyeva.
tika-s0402t:898_7: Nisīditvā pana hatthapāde dhovitvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto bhāvanāya appanaṃ appattāyapi
tika-s0402t:899_1: Kāmarāgasaṅkhātena vā kāmena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko.
tika-s0402t:899_5: paresaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavattassa karuṇāpaṭipakkhassa pāpadhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:899_6: Ñātake ārabbha uppanno vitakkoti ñātake ārabbha gehassitapemavasena uppanno vitakko.
tika-s0402t:899_7: Janapadamārabbha uppanno vitakkoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0402t:899_9: uppanno vitakkoti “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:899_11: pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ kareyyu”nti evaṃ uppannavitakko.
tika-s0402t:900_4: paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtattā aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ hutvā udetīti attho.
tika-s0402t:901_3: Suṭṭhu nisīdatīti samādhipaṭipakkhe kilese sannisīdento suṭṭhu nisīdati.
tika-s0402t:901_5: Sammā ādhiyatīti yathā ārammaṇe suṭṭhu appitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:902_0: Abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassāti ettha “abhiññāya sacchikaraṇīyassā”ti vattabbe “abhiññā”ti ya-
tika-s0402t:902_1: kāralopena pana puna kālakiriyāniddeso katoti āha “abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ kātabbassā”ti.
tika-s0402t:902_2: Abhiññāya iddhividhādiñāṇena sacchikiriyaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādikaṃ abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyanti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:902_3: Sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇātīti ettha pana yassa paccakkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0402t:902_7: Sakkhī ca so bhabbo cāti sakkhibhabbo.
tika-s0402t:902_8: Ayañhi iddhividhādīnaṃ bhabbo tattha ca sakkhīti sakkhibhabbo,
tika-s0402t:903_0: Abhiññāpādakajjhānādibhedeti ettha abhiññāpādā ca abhiññāpādakajjhānañca abhiññāpādakajjhānāni. Ādi-
tika-s0402t:903_1: saddena arahattañca arahattassa vipassanā ca saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:904_3: avasāne pana arahattaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ arahattassa vipassanā vāti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:905_0: Yañhi taṃ tatra tatra sakkhibhabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi,
tika-s0402t:905_7: yadariyā etarahi upasampajja viharantī”ti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā abhiññā nibbattentassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:905_11: Tenevāha “āsavānaṃ khayātiādi cettha phalasamāpattivasena vuttanti veditabba”nti.
tika-s0402t:908_5: Kālena kālanti ettha kālenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:908_9: Upalakkhitasamādhānākāro samādhiyeva idha samādhinimittanti āha “ekaggatā hi idha samādhinimittanti vuttā”ti.
tika-s0402t:908_10: Ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyyāti ettha ṭhānaṃ atthīti vacanaseso.
tika-s0402t:908_13: Taṃ vā manasikaraṇaṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya,
tika-s0402t:909_0: Yaṃ kiñci suvaṇṇatāpanayoggaaṅgārabhājanaṃ idha “ukkā”ti adhippetanti āha “aṅgārakapalla”nti.
tika-s0402t:909_1: Sajjeyyāti yathā tattha pakkhittaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tappati,
tika-s0402t:909_7: Mūsāya vā pakkhipeyyāti tattake vā pakkhipeyya.
tika-s0402t:916_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame sambodhito pubbevāti sambodho vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ “sāmaṃ sammā bujjhi etenā”ti katvā,
tika-s0402t:916_4: Bodhisattasseva satoti ettha yathā udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ paripākagataṃ padumaṃ sūriyarasmisamphassena
tika-s0402t:916_6: Evaṃ buddhānaṃ santike byākaraṇassa laddhattā avassaṃ anantarāyena pāramiyo pūretvā bujjhissatīti bujjhanakasattoti bodhisatto.
tika-s0402t:916_10: “taṃ bodhiṃ kudāssu nāmāhaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti patthayamāno paṭipajjatīti bodhiyaṃ satto āsattotipi bodhisatto.
tika-s0402t:917_0: Atha vā bodhīti ñāṇaṃ “bujjhati etenā”ti katvā,
tika-s0402t:917_4: Buddhānañhi pādamūle abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya paṇḍitova so satto,
tika-s0402t:917_9: Chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca etthāti nibbānaṃ “chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānañcā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:917_11: Tattha āgammāti idaṃ yo jano rāgaṃ vineti pajahati ca,
tika-s0402t:920_6: Ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññameva vā araṇīyato sāmaññatthanti āha “sāmaññatthena vā cattāro maggā”ti.
tika-s0402t:923_3: saddena paccāmasanassa vipākassa parāmāsoti āha “taṃ abhinivattetī”ti,
tika-s0402t:923_5: Idāni na kevalaṃ vipākasseva parāmāso taṃ- saddena,
tika-s0402t:923_6: atha kho chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tabbipākassa ca parāmāso daṭṭhabboti āha “yadā vā tenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:923_7: Te ceva dhammeti te chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme.
tika-s0402t:923_8: Nibbijjhitvā passatīti kilese nibbijjhitvā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā passatīti.
tika-s0402t:928_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame apāyesu nibbattanasīlatāya apāyūpagā āpāyikāti āha “apāyaṃ gacchissantīti āpāyikā”ti.
tika-s0402t:928_2: Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ
tika-s0402t:928_3: kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathāpaṭipajjanato “ahaṃ brahmacārī”ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hotīti
tika-s0402t:928_5: “Ahampi bhikkhū”ti vatvā uposathaṅgādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva,
tika-s0402t:928_13: idāni te assamaṇabhāvaṃ āropessāmī”tiādinā vadanto paribhāsati.
tika-s0402t:929_1: kilesakāmavasena ca tesaṃ assādanaṃ siyāti āha “kilesakāmena vatthukāme sevantassā”ti.
tika-s0402t:929_3: Natthi dosoti assādetvā visayaparibhoge natthi ādīnavo,
tika-s0402t:929_9: Pivitabbataṃ paribhuñjitabbatanti etthāpi kattuvaseneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:932_1: Dutiye parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavatti attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto vediyanto kataññū katavedīti āha “iminā mayhaṃ kata”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:935_1: Tatiye sukhena metabboti yathā parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0402t:935_2: evameva “uddhato”tiādinā yathāvuttehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhatīti,
tika-s0402t:935_4: Dukkhena metabboti yathā mahāsamuddassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0402t:935_5: evameva “anuddhato”tiādinā dassitehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0402t:935_6: “anāgāmī nu kho khīṇāsavo nu kho”ti vattabbataṃ gacchati,
tika-s0402t:935_8: Pametuṃ na sakkotīti yathā ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ,
tika-s0402t:936_4: Mano hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho.
tika-s0402t:936_12: Cittekaggatārahitoti upacārappanāsamādhirahito caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya anavaṭṭhitakiriyo.
tika-s0402t:939_6: taṃ sabbaṃ khepetvā nirayampi gacchatī”tiādivacanato arūpabhavato cutassa apāyūpapatti vuttā viya dissatīti
tika-s0402t:939_7: tannivattanatthaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ vivaranto “sandhāyabhāsitamidaṃ vacana”nti dīpeti “nirayādīhi
tika-s0402t:939_9: Na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃ akusalaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0402t:939_10: Iminā tato cavantānaṃ upacārajjhānameva paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammanti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:942_1: Pañcame dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha “dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:942_8: Paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthīti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti.
tika-s0402t:942_9: Idhaloke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthīti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti.
tika-s0402t:942_11: Ime sattā yattha yattha bhavayonigatiādīsu ṭhitā,
tika-s0402t:943_0: Phalābhāvavasenāti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalassa abhāvavasena “natthi mātā,
tika-s0402t:943_3: nāpi tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ abhāvavasena tesaṃ lokapaccakkhattā.
tika-s0402t:943_4: Pubbuḷakassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo,
tika-s0402t:943_5: na ca khanapubbakoti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha “cavitvā uppajjanakā sattā nāma natthīti vadatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:943_6: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sayaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedenti,
tika-s0402t:946_1: Chaṭṭhe chahi talehi samannāgato pāsakoti catūsu passesu cattāri talāni,
tika-s0402t:946_2: dvīsu koṭīsu dve talānīti evaṃ chahi talehi samannāgato pāsakakīḷāpasutānaṃ maṇisadiso pāsakaviseso.
tika-s0402t:949_0: 121. Aṭṭhame sucibhāvoti kilesāsucivigamena suddhabhāvo asaṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, atthato kāyasucaritādīni.
tika-s0402t:952_5: Ninhātā aggamaggasalilena vikkhālitā pāpā etenāti ninhātapāpako,
tika-s0402t:955_2: yehi dhammehi ubhayahitamunanato muni nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:955_3: te munibhāvakarā moneyyā paṭipadā dhammā eva vuttā.
tika-s0402t:955_8: “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādinā kāyasaṅkhātassa ārammaṇassa jānanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:955_9: kāyassa ca samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato parijānanatā,
tika-s0402t:955_13: sabbe ete kāyamukhena pavattā moneyyappaṭipadā dhammā kāyamoneyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:955_17: Idhāpi teneva pāḷinayena atthaṃ dassento “tividhakāyaduccaritappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:956_7: vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyya”nti imāya pāḷiyā vuttamatthaṃ atidīpento “vacīmoneyyepi eseva nayo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:956_8: Tattha copanavācañceva saddavācañca ārabbha pavattā paññā vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:957_7: cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyya”nti imāya pāḷiyā āgatanayena atthaṃ vibhāvento
tika-s0402t:957_9: Tattha ca ekāsītividhaṃ lokiyacittaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:957_10: Tassa samudayādito parijānanaṃ manapariññāti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-s0402t:962_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame taṇhāgedhena gathitoti taṇhābandhanena baddho.
tika-s0402t:962_5: Taṇhāya adhibhavitvā ajjhotthaṭo gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā viya ṭhito.
tika-s0402t:962_7: Anādīnavadassāvīti gathitādibhāvena paribhoge ādīnavamattampi na passati.
tika-s0402t:962_8: Nissaraṇapaññoti ayamattho āhāraparibhogeti tattha payojanaparicchedikā “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:962_9: pavattā āhārapaṭibaddhachandarāganissaraṇabhūtā paññā assa atthīti nissaraṇapañño.
tika-s0402t:965_2: Pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū aparabhāge bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
tika-s0402t:965_3: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ passamānā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā na cirasseva sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā
tika-s0402t:965_9: paṭhamādayo satta vibhattiyo muñcitvā na kiñci katheti,
tika-s0402t:965_10: evaṃ kathite ca amhākaṃ gaṇṭhipadaṃ nāma natthī”ti,
tika-s0402t:965_11: te bhagavati agāravā hutvā tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato upaṭṭhānampi dhammassavanampi abhiṇhaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0402t:965_15: bhikkhave”tiādinā tamatthaṃ paṭipucchitvā “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti tehi bhikkhūhi vuttaṃ paṭivacanaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0402t:966_0: Neva āgataṭṭhānaṃ na gataṭṭhānaṃ addasaṃsu. Kasmā? Aññāṇato.
tika-s0402t:966_1: Te kira tassa suttassa atthaṃ na jāniṃsu.
tika-s0402t:966_2: Tesañhi tasmiṃ samaye vicitranayaṃ desanāvilāsayuttampi taṃ suttaṃ ghanaputhulena dussapaṭṭena mukhaṃ
tika-s0402t:966_3: baddhaṃ katvā purato ṭhapitamanuññabhojanaṃ viya ahosi.
tika-s0402t:966_4: Nanu ca bhagavā attanā desitaṃ dhammaṃ pare ñāpetuṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto,
tika-s0402t:966_5: so kasmā yathā te na jānanti,
tika-s0402t:966_8: Bhagavā hi “abhabbā ime imaṃ mānakhilaṃ anupahacca maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā sacchikātu”nti tesaṃ sutapariyattiṃ
tika-s0402t:966_9: nissāya uppannaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo mānabhañjanatthaṃ “sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”ntiādinā
tika-s0402t:967_0: Sammāsambuddho “mayhaṃ kathā niyyātī”ti mukhasampattameva kathetīti cintayiṃsūti idaṃ aṅguttarabhāṇakānaṃ vaḷañjanakatantinīhārena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:967_2: evaṃ mānabhañjanatthaṃ desitañca pana taṃ suttaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū “taṃyeva kira pathaviṃ diṭṭhigatiko sañjānāti,
tika-s0402t:967_4: ki nāmidaṃ kathaṃ nāmida”nti cintentā “pubbe mayaṃ bhagavatā kathitaṃ yaṃkiñci khippameva jānāma,
tika-s0402t:967_5: idāni panimassa mūlapariyāyassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā na jānāma na passāma,
tika-s0402t:967_6: aho buddhā nāma appameyyā atulā”ti uddhatadāṭhā viya sappā nimmadā hutvā buddhūpaṭṭhānañca dhammassavanañca sakkaccaṃ agamaṃsu.
tika-s0402t:967_7: Tena samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū “aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
tika-s0402t:967_8: te nāmabrāhmaṇapabbajitā tathā mānamadamattā bhagavatā mūlapariyāyadesanāya nihatamānā katā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
tika-s0402t:967_11: pubbepi ahaṃ evaṃ ime mānapaggahitasīse carante nihatamāne akāsi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āharanto “bhūtapubbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:967_13: aññataro disāpāmokkho brāhmaṇo bārāṇasiyaṃ paṭivasati tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇṭukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ
tika-s0402t:968_0: Taṃ sutvā te bhikkhū “pubbepi mayaṃ māneneva upahatā”ti bhiyyosomattāya nihatamānā hutvā attano upakārakammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0402t:968_1: Tato bhagavā ekaṃ samayaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caranto vesāliṃ patvā gotamake cetiye viharanto imesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ
tika-s0402t:968_2: bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā idaṃ gotamakasuttaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0402t:968_3: Idañca suttaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā bhikkhū tasmiṃyeva āsane saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
tika-s0402t:969_2: tassa ca nesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ yāthāvato abhijānitvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:969_3: Ime pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanānītiādi panettha nidassanamattaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:969_5: veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayena vā pucchāya vā aṭṭhuppattiyā vā sanimittaṃ hetūdāharaṇasahitañcāti attho.
tika-s0402t:969_11: Apare pana “yathārahaṃ iddhiādesanānusāsanipāṭihāriyasahita”nti vadanti anusāsanipāṭihāriyarahitā desanā natthīti katvā.
tika-s0402t:972_5: Ettha ca paṭhamo satthā rūpāvacarasamāpattilābhī daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0402t:974_0: Tattha titthiyā samayaṃ jānantā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpeyyuṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ vadamānā.
tika-s0402t:974_7: Tathāgato pana kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññāpeti,
tika-s0402t:974_10: eko sammāsambuddhoti imasmiṃ loke tayo satthāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:977_3: Teneva hi “nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo”ti anantaraṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:977_5: Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:977_14: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti dasa disā pabhāsento,
tika-s0402t:977_15: cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.
tika-s0402t:978_16: Mahantaṃ khuddakaṃ majjhimanti vaṇṇetabbato pamitabbato vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:978_18: rūpāyatananti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe vaṇṇasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:978_20: Chaviyā daṭṭhabbo rūpāyatane gayhamānassapi chavimukheneva gahetabbato.
tika-s0402t:978_21: Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
tika-s0402t:979_0: Kevalaparipuṇṇanti ekadesampi asesetvā niravasesatova paripuṇṇanti ayamettha atthoti āha “anavasesatā attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:979_5: Keci pana “īsakaṃ asamattaṃ kevalaṃ kevalakappa”nti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:979_7: anatthantarena pana kappasaddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ kataṃ “kevalā eva kevalakappā”ti.
tika-s0402t:980_1: saddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ okappasaddamattaṃ nidasseti,
tika-s0402t:980_2: aññathā kappasaddassa atthuddhāre okappaniyapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā.
tika-s0402t:980_11: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassa obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0402t:980_12: ayaṃ pana sabbasseva pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappasaddo gahitoti āha “anavasesaṃ samantato”ti.
tika-s0402t:984_1: Chaṭṭhe gāvīnaṃ kayavikkayavasena yogo etthāti goyogo,
tika-s0402t:984_2: kayavikkayaṃ karonto gāvīhi yujjanti etthāti vā goyogo,
tika-s0402t:987_1: Aṭṭhame idaṃ te mānasminti ettha mānasminti paccatte bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:987_2: Idanti ca liṅgavipallāsena napuṃsakaniddeso katoti āha “ayaṃ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamāno”ti.
tika-s0402t:990_1: Navame asādhāraṇasikkhāpadanti bhikkhunīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva paññattasikkhāpadaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadanti
tika-s0402t:993_2: Pāsāṇe lekhasadisā parāparādhanibbattā kodhalekhā yassa so pāsāṇalekhūpamasamannāgato pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vutto.
tika-s0402t:993_5: Na khippaṃ lujjatīti na antarā nassati kammaṭṭhāneneva nassanato.
tika-s0402t:993_6: Evamevanti evaṃ tassapi puggalassa kodho na antarā punadivase vā aparadivase vā niṭṭhāti,
tika-s0402t:993_11: Sammodatīti nirantaro hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:994_0: Atha vā sandhiyatīti ṭhānagamanādīsu kāyakiriyāsu kāyena samodhānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0402t:994_4: Sammodatīti uddesaparipucchādīsu vacīkiriyāsu vācāya samodhānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0402t:994_5: vippavāsāgatopi piyasahāyako viya piyatarabhāvaṃ upetīti attho.
tika-s0402t:994_6: Apica kiccakaraṇīyesu tehi saddhiṃ ādītova ekakiriyābhāvaṃ upagacchanto sandhiyati,
tika-s0402t:999_3: Yuddhamupajīvatīti vā etasmiṃ atthe yodhājīvoti niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1002_3: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”tiādinā appaṭipucchitvā kevalaṃ dhammadesanāvaseneva vinītaparisā.
tika-s0402t:1005_1: Catutthe uppādā vā tathāgatānanti tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi veneyyapuggalānaṃ maggaphaluppatti viya saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādisabhāvo na tathāgatuppādāyatto,
tika-s0402t:1005_2: atha kho tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi anuppādepi hotimevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1005_3: Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti ṭhito eva so aniccasabhāvo byabhicārābhāvato na kadāci saṅkhārā aniccā na hoti.
tika-s0402t:1005_4: Kāmaṃ asaṅkhatā viya dhātu na nicco so sabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1006_1: ṭhitāva sā dhātūti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti esā dhātu esa sabhāvo tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe uddhañca appaṭivijjhiyamāno na tathāgatehi uppādito,
tika-s0402t:1006_2: atha kho sabbakālaṃ sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
tika-s0402t:1006_4: kevalaṃ pana sayambhuñāṇena abhisambujjhanato “ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena abhisambuddho”ti pavedanato ca
tika-s0402t:1006_5: tathāgato dhammassāmīti vuccati apubbassa tassa uppādanato.
tika-s0402t:1008_0: Atha vā abhisambujjhatīti paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati,
tika-s0402t:1008_9: Vivaṭaṃ vibhattañca atthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttānīkaroti.
tika-s0402t:1011_1: Pañcame tantāvutānaṃ vatthānanti idaṃ “yāni kānicī”ti iminā samānādhikaraṇanti āha “paccatte sāmivacana”nti.
tika-s0402t:1011_4: makkhali moghapurisoti ettha makkhalīti tassa nāmaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1011_5: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta,
tika-s0402t:1011_7: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
tika-s0402t:1011_10: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0402t:1011_11: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
tika-s0402t:1011_12: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti.
tika-s0402t:1011_13: So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
tika-s0402t:1011_15: Tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu.
tika-s0402t:1014_1: Ekādasame akuppadhammatāya khayavayasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ atītāti accantā,
tika-s0402t:1014_2: evaṃ aparihāyanasabhāvattā accantā niṭṭhā assāti accantaniṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:1014_4: Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassanaṃ kuppanaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0402t:1014_6: Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti accantayogakkhemī,
tika-s0402t:1014_8: Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā tassa avihāyanasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti accantabrahmacārī,
tika-s0402t:1020_1: Ito paresu pana suttapadesu “gāḷhā”ti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “kakkhaḷā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1020_3: Atha kho taṇhāvasena thiraggahaṇanti āha “lobhavasena thiraggahaṇā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1020_4: Agāḷhā paṭipadāti vā kāmānaṃ ogāhanaṃ paṭipatti,
tika-s0402t:1020_6: Nijjhāmā paṭipadāti kāyassa nijjhāpanavasena khepanavasena pavattā paṭipatti,
tika-s0402t:1020_10: Ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karotītiādi nidassanamattaṃ vamitvā mukhavikkhālanādiācārassapi tena vissaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0402t:1020_11: Jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati avalekhati udakena adhovanato.
tika-s0402t:1020_16: Na karoti “samaṇena nāma parassa vacanakarena na bhavitabba”nti adhippāyena.
tika-s0402t:1021_0: Puretaranti taṃ ṭhānaṃ attano upagamanato puretaraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1021_1: Taṃ kira so “bhikkhunā nāma yadicchakā eva bhikkhā gahetabbā”ti adhippāyena na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:1021_2: Uddissa kataṃ mama nimittabhāvena bahū khuddakā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpāditāti na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:1021_3: Nimantanaṃ na sādiyati evaṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatīti.
tika-s0402t:1021_6: Kabaḷantarāyo hotīti uṭṭhitassa dvinnampi kabaḷantarāyo hoti.
tika-s0402t:1022_7: Abhuñjanavasena eko aho etassa atthīti ekāhiko, āhāro,
tika-s0402t:1022_9: So pana atthato ekadivasaṃ laṅghako hotīti āha “ekādivasantarika”nti.
tika-s0402t:1022_15: Ukkaṭṭho pana pariyāyabhattabhojaniko dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhameva bhuñjati.
tika-s0402t:1023_10: Majjhimapaṭipadāya uppathabhāvena amanīyā gantabbā ñātabbāti antā.
tika-s0402t:1026_0: 164-184. Samanuññoti sammadeva katānuñño. Tenāha “samānajjhāsayo”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0402t:1037_3: Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti.
tika-s0402t:1037_10: Sandhāvitasaṃsaritapadānaṃ kammasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha “mayā ca tumhehi cā”ti paṭhamavikappe.
tika-s0402t:1037_11: Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṃ hadaye katvā “mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti yathārutavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1037_12: Dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṃ taṇhārajjunā baddhaṃ sattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti etāyāti bhavanetti.
tika-s0402t:1038_0: Vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaroti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne parasantāne ca vināsakaro abhāvakaro.
tika-s0402t:1038_2: Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā sātisayaṃ kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
tika-s0402t:1041_3: Tena ca kalinā sukhaṃ na paṭilabhatīti tena aparādhena sukhaṃ na vindati.
tika-s0402t:1041_4: Nindiyappasaṃsāya hi pasaṃsiyanindāya ca samakova vipāko.
tika-s0402t:1041_5: Pasaṃsiyanindāti ca sampannaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā.
tika-s0402t:1041_6: Nindiyappasaṃsā pana kathaṃ tāya samavipākāti ce?
tika-s0402t:1041_7: Tasmiṃ avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena tassa sabbhāvakaraṇato ca.
tika-s0402t:1041_8: Lokepi hi asūraṃ sūrena samaṃ karonto gārayho hoti,
tika-s0402t:1041_11: Appamattakova kalīti diṭṭhadhammikattā sappaṭikārattā ca appamattako aparādho. Ayaṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:1041_12: mahantataro kali katūpacitattā samparāyikattā appaṭikārattā ca.
tika-s0402t:1042_3: Yatheva hi sataṃ satasahassānaṃ koṭi hoti,
tika-s0402t:1042_4: evaṃ sataṃ satasahassānaṃ koṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:1042_10: Yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjatīti ariye garahanto yaṃ nirabbudasaṅkhātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati,
tika-s0402t:1045_1: Pañcame anusotaṃ gacchatīti saṃsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchati.
tika-s0402t:1045_4: Anāgāmī hi assaddhiyehi kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampaniyacittatāya tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma.
tika-s0402t:1045_7: Brāhmaṇoti bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇoti saṅkhaṃ gato khīṇāsavo.
tika-s0402t:1045_10: Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi.
tika-s0402t:1045_15: Kiṃ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma,
tika-s0402t:1046_7: samāpattipāragūti evaṃ chahi ākārehi sabbadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gato.
tika-s0402t:1049_1: Chaṭṭhe appakaṃ sutaṃ hotīti navaṅgasatthusāsane kiñcideva sutaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1049_9: Maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya.
tika-s0402t:1049_10: Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya.
tika-s0402t:1052_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-s0402t:1052_2: Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ sakavāde pañca suttasatānīti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1052_3: Visesavidhayo pare sanimittā tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0402t:1052_5: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1052_6: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1052_9: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0402t:1052_12: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu “vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1052_13: heta”ntiādīvacanasambandhesu abbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā
tika-s0402t:1052_15: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā,
tika-s0402t:1052_16: satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-s0402t:1052_17: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
tika-s0402t:1052_22: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāvāti?
tika-s0402t:1052_24: Sodhitañhi pubbe “gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimitta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1053_1: “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-s0402t:1053_4: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
tika-s0402t:1053_12: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi,
tika-s0402t:1053_14: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
tika-s0402t:1053_18: Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0402t:1053_20: Evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1053_22: vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya sāratthadīpaniyā amhehi pakāsito,
tika-s0402t:1054_0: Na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathāñca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa
tika-s0402t:1054_1: anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hotīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1054_2: Tenevāha “na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1057_2: Vinayaṃ upetāti tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayaṃ upetā.
tika-s0402t:1057_6: Tameva pariyattidhammaṃ dhārenti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya vinassantaṃ akatvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena hadaye ṭhapentīti dhammadharā.
tika-s0402t:1057_7: Edisā ca attanā sutassa dhammassa ādhārabhūtā nāma hontīti āha “sutadhammānaṃ ādhārabhūtā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1060_14: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0402t:1060_15: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1061_9: tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpajjitapubbā.
tika-s0402t:1061_10: Tatra vata maṃ ‘bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatī’ti nimittametaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1061_13: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena visārado ahanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0402t:1062_2: saddena tattha ca cakkasaddassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1063_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1063_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe…
tika-s0402t:1063_3: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1064_2: na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1064_3: Bhagavato eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddho”ti parassa vacanavasena dassitadhammesu.
tika-s0402t:1065_2: Evaṃbhūtā pana te yasmā antarāyakarā nāma honti,
tika-s0402t:1065_4: Asañcicca vītikkame nātisāvajjāti katvā vuttaṃ “sañcicca vītikkantā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1065_5: Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi nidassanamattaṃ itaresampi catunnaṃ “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1065_6: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ viya.
tika-s0402t:1065_7: Yasmā taṃkhaṇampi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā virato hoti ce,
tika-s0402t:1065_11: Tattha yassa kassacīti na kevalaṃ pabbajitasseva,
tika-s0402t:1067_3: Puthūhi vā sitāti bahūhi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sitā upanibaddhā.
tika-s0402t:1070_10: Bhavābhavoti vā khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1071_1: Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ tasitaṃ sattaṃ assāsadassanavasena
tika-s0402t:1071_2: sahāyakiccaṃ karontī bhavādīsu anibbinnaṃ katvā paribbhamāpeti.
tika-s0402t:1071_3: Tathā hi taṃ papātakaṃ acintetvā madhuggaṇhanakaluddakā viya anekādīnavākulesu bhavesu ānisaṃsameva dassentī anatthajāle sā paribbhamāpeti,
tika-s0402t:1071_9: Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi,
tika-s0402t:1071_10: kāmāvacarādikusalehi ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesapaccayo.
tika-s0402t:1071_12: Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1071_17: Itthabhāvo vā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno attabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1071_21: Tenevāha “itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1075_0: Evamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti ettha etamādīnavaṃ ñatvātipi paṭhanti,
tika-s0402t:1075_1: etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṃ samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ñatvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1075_2: Atha vā evamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṃsārānativattanaādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā.
tika-s0402t:1075_3: Niggahaṇoti caturūpādānasaṅkhātassa sabbassa gahaṇassa paṭinissajjanena niggahaṇo,
tika-s0402t:1075_4: khandhaparinibbānena saṅkhārappavattito apagaccheyyāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1078_2: bhavantarādīhi dukkhena sattaṃ yojenti ghaṭentīti yogā.
tika-s0402t:1078_3: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena yogo cāti kāmayogo.
tika-s0402t:1078_9: Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1079_0: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca.
tika-s0402t:1079_4: samudeti etasmāti samudayoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ samudayānaṃ saddatthatopi bhedo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1079_7: Paccayato hi saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passato khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayadassanaṃ sukhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1079_8: khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṃ sukhena ijjhati.
tika-s0402t:1079_9: Idha pana khaṇikasamudayaṃ dassento āha “samudayanti uppatti”nti.
tika-s0402t:1080_5: Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passato aññataradassanena itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0402t:1080_6: Pubbabhāgeyeva ārammaṇavasena khayato vayato sammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passanto byatirekavasena anussavādito accantatthaṅgamaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:1080_7: maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇato accantatthaṅgamaṃ passanto asammohato itarampi passati.
tika-s0402t:1080_8: Idha pana bhedatthaṅgamaṃ dassento āha “atthaṅgamanti bheda”nti.
tika-s0402t:1080_9: Kāmānaṃ uppattibhedaggahaṇeneva cettha yathā kāmānaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā,
tika-s0402t:1080_10: evaṃ kāmavatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1080_11: Madhurabhāvanti iminā kāmasannissitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dasseti. “Yaṃ kho,
tika-s0402t:1080_13: ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1080_15: Amadhurabhāvanti iminā pana kāmahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1081_3: saddassa viya ca purimapadassa okārantatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:1081_5: Atha vā sīlatthena ikasaddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakasaddassa adassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko.
tika-s0402t:1081_9: “Taddhitā”ti hi bahuvacananiddesā vicittattā vā taddhitānaṃ abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā “punabbhavaṃ dentī”tiādīsupi
tika-s0402t:1082_0: Visaṃyojenti paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ kāmayogādito viyojentīti visaṃyogā,
tika-s0402t:1087_3: Uppajjati kāmavitakko vāti vatthukāmesu avītarāgatāya tādise paccaye kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ce,
tika-s0402t:1087_5: Byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vāti āghātavinaye visesena cittassa adamitattā āghātanimitte byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko,
tika-s0402t:1087_6: leḍḍudaṇḍādīti parahiṃsanavasena vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ceti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:1087_7: Taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāsetīti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kāmavitakkādiṃ yathāpaccayaṃ attano citte uppannaṃ “itipāyaṃ vitakko pāpako,
tika-s0402t:1087_10: so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena paccavekkhaṇāya abhāvato adhivāseti attano cittaṃ āropetvā vāseti.
tika-s0402t:1087_11: Adhivāsentoyeva ca nappajahati tadaṅgādippahānavasena na paṭinissajjati.
tika-s0402t:1087_12: Tato eva ca na vinodeti attano cittasantānato na nudati na nīharati.
tika-s0402t:1087_13: Tathā avinodanato na byantīkaroti na vigatantaṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:1087_14: Ātāpī pahitatto yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi,
tika-s0402t:1087_16: ayaṃ pana tathā na karotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1087_17: Tathābhūto pana na anabhāvaṃ gameti anu anu abhāvaṃ na gameti.
tika-s0402t:1088_1: Anātāpīti kilesānaṃ ātāpayikassa vīriyassa abhāvena anātāpī.
tika-s0402t:1088_4: Kusīto hīnavīriyoti kusalehi dhammehi parihāpayitvā akusalapakkhe kucchitaṃ sīdanato kosajjasamannāgamena ca kusīto,
tika-s0402t:1088_7: Sayanairiyāpathassa visesato kosajjapakkhikattā yathā taṃsamaṅgino bhāvitattā sambhavanti,
tika-s0402t:1089_0: Sukkapakkhe tañce bhikkhu nādhivāsetīti āraddhavīriyassapi viharato anādimati saṃsāre cirakālabhāvitattā
tika-s0402t:1089_1: tathārūpapaccayasamāyoge satisammosena vā kāmavitakkādi uppajjati ce,
tika-s0402t:1089_2: taṃ bhikkhu attano cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti,
tika-s0402t:1089_7: apica kho taṃ vinodeti nudati nīharati.
tika-s0402t:1089_10: yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi,
tika-s0402t:1089_13: Anabhāvaṃ gameti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti,
tika-s0402t:1090_0: Evaṃbhūtotiādīsu evaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ anadhivāsena suvisuddhāsayo samāno tāya ca āsayasampattiyā tannimittāya
tika-s0402t:1090_1: ca payogasampattiyā parisuddhasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū satisampajaññena samannāgato
tika-s0402t:1090_2: jāgariyaṃ anuyutto tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ ātāpanalakkhaṇena vīriyena samannāgatattā ātāpī.
tika-s0402t:1090_3: Sabbaso pāputrāsena samannāgatattā ottāpī satataṃ rattindivaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1090_4: Samitaṃ nirantaraṃ samathavipassanānuyogavasena catubbidhasammappadhānasiddhiyā āraddhavīriyo pahitatto.
tika-s0402t:1090_5: Nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittoti vuccati kathīyatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1091_0: Gāthāsu gehanissitanti ettha gehavāsīhi apariccattattā gehavāsisabhāvattā gehadhammattā vā gehaṃ vuccati vatthukāmo.
tika-s0402t:1091_4: Kummaggapaṭipannoti yasmā ariyamaggassa uppathabhāvato abhijjhādayo tadekaṭṭhadhammā ca kummaggo,
tika-s0402t:1091_6: Mohaneyyesu mucchitoti mohasaṃvattaniyesu rūpādīsu mucchito sammatto ajjhopanno.
tika-s0402t:1091_8: Phuṭṭhanti phusituṃ pattuṃ pāpo so tādiso micchāsaṅkappagocaro puggalo abhabbo,
tika-s0402t:1092_0: Vitakkaṃ samayitvānāti yathāvuttaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalena vūpasametvā.
tika-s0402t:1092_1: Vitakkūpasame ratoti navannampi mahāvitakkānaṃ accantūpasamabhūte arahatte,
tika-s0402t:1092_2: nibbāne eva vā ajjhāsayena rato abhirato.
tika-s0402t:1092_3: Bhabbo soti so yathāvutto sammāpaṭipajjamāno puggalo pubbabhāge samathavipassanābalena sabbavitakke yathārahaṃ
tika-s0402t:1092_4: tadaṅgādivasena vūpasametvā ṭhito vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:1092_5: nibbānasaṅkhātañca anuttaraṃ sambodhiṃ phuṭṭhuṃ adhigantuṃ bhabbo arahā.
tika-s0402t:1095_0: 12. Dutiye sampannasīlāti ettha tividhaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
tika-s0402t:1097_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1098_1: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgisampannaṃ nāma. “Imissā, bhante,
tika-s0402t:1098_5: Idha paripuṇṇasampannavasena atthaṃ dassento “sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1098_7: tasmā sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā hutvātipi sīlasamaṅgino hutvātipi evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1098_11: cetanādīnaṃ pana sīlanalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattilakkhaṇena vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0402t:1099_0: Tattha “paripuṇṇasīlā”ti iminā atthena khettadosavigamena khettapāripūrī viya sīladosavigamena sīlapāripūrī vuttā hoti.
tika-s0402t:1099_5: Tattha bījakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha antarantarā bījāni khaṇḍāni vā pūtīni vā honti,
tika-s0402t:1099_10: Vappakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha akusalo bījāni vapanto antarantarā nipāteti.
tika-s0402t:1099_13: Udakakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha katthaci udakaṃ atibahuṃ vā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1099_17: Ūsakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha kassako kismiñci padese naṅgalena bhūmiṃ cattāro pañca vāre kasanto atigambhīraṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:1099_21: tādisañca khettaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1099_23: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā khettaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1099_27: tādisañca sīlaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1099_28: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā sīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1100_0: “Sīlasamaṅgino”ti iminā panatthena sīlena samaṅgibhūtā samodhānagatā samannāgatā hutvā viharathāti idameva vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1100_1: Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena,
tika-s0402t:1100_4: Tattha “sampannasīlāti ettāvatā ca kira bhagavā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā ‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā’ti
tika-s0402t:1100_5: iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassetī”ti divāvihāravāsī sumatthero āha.
tika-s0402t:1100_9: itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”ti vatvā taṃ ananujānanto āha –
tika-s0402t:1100_19: sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:1100_20: Tasmā ‘sampannasīlā’ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā ‘sampannapātimokkhā’ti tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā
tika-s0402t:1101_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutāti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-s0402t:1101_1: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvārā.
tika-s0402t:1101_2: Evaṃbhūtā ca tena upetā samannāgatā nāma hontīti āha “upetā hutvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1101_3: Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannāti kāyikavācasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena, na-
tika-s0402t:1101_9: Bhayato dassanasīlāti paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlā.
tika-s0402t:1101_11: Taṃ taṃ samādātabbaṃ samādāyāti yaṃ kiñci sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattiādibhedesu sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūritabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vācasikaṃ vā sīlaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1101_13: sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1102_0: Udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1102_3: āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1102_5: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-s0402t:1102_6: Tathā avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1102_9: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1102_11: Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passatī”tiādinā nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca
tika-s0402t:1102_12: pañca katvā vuttāni pañcavīsati udayalakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_0: Vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatīti “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_3: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_5: Rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_8: phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_10: Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati”tiādinā nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca
tika-s0402t:1103_11: pañca katvā vuttāni pañcavīsati vayalakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-s0402t:1103_13: Kathayantīti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti.
tika-s0402t:1104_1: caṅkamanādivasena gamanaṃ kappentopi “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ
tika-s0402t:1104_2: janeti vāyamatī”tiādinā nayena vuttappadhānavīriyaṃ karonto ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā akusaladhammā pahīyanti,
tika-s0402t:1104_6: Yatamenaṃ pasārayeti etaṃ pasāretabbaṃ hatthapādādiṃ yataṃ yatamāno yathāvuttavīriyasamaṅgī hutvā pasāreyya,
tika-s0402t:1105_0: Idāni yathā paṭipajjanto yataṃ yatanto nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:1105_6: Yāvatā jagato gatīti yattakā sattasaṅkhārabhedassa lokassa pavatti,
tika-s0402t:1105_8: Ettāvatā anavasesatā sammasanañāṇassa visayaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1105_15: upari tiriyaṃ adhoti tidhā saṅgahite sabbasmiṃ loke atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1105_16: sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aniccādisammasanādhigatena udayabbayañāṇena pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi udayaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1105_17: pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi vayaṃ samavekkhitā samanupassitā bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0402t:1106_0: Cetosamathasāmīcinti cittasaṃkilesānaṃ accantavūpasamanato cetosamathasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ.
tika-s0402t:1109_1: Tatiye uttamavīriyānīti seṭṭhavīriyāni visiṭṭhassa atthassa sādhanato.
tika-s0402t:1112_1: Catutthe saṃvarādīnaṃ sādhanavasena padahati etehīti padhānāni.
tika-s0402t:1112_2: Saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyanti yathā abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:1112_3: evaṃ satiyā upaṭṭhāne cakkhādīnaṃ pidahane analasassa uppannavīriyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1112_8: Purimuppannasamādhi hi parato uppajjanakasamādhissa kāraṇaṃ hotīti “samādhinimitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1113_1: Taṃ āgammāti taṃ nibbānaṃ maggena adhigamahetu.
tika-s0402t:1113_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti vossaggavasena pariṇāmitaṃ pariccajanavasena ceva pakkhandanavasena ca pariṇāmanasīlaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1113_10: Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati,
tika-s0402t:1113_11: tenevākārena tannimittakkhandhe ca pajahatīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “vipassanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1113_13: Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ pāpuṇantī ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ekaṃsato nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti vattabbataṃ labhati,
tika-s0402t:1113_14: maggo ca samucchedavasena kilese khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajati,
