tika-s0402t:1113_15: tasmā yathākkamaṃ vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena pakkhandanapariccāgavossaggā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1113_18: Taṃ pana pariṇāmanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca icchitanti āha “vipassanābhāvañca maggabhāvañca pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1114_0: Bhaddakanti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavigamanena ekantahitattā dullabhattā ca bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1114_1: Na hi aññaṃ samādhinimittaṃ evaṃ dullabhaṃ rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ atthi.
tika-s0402t:1114_2: Anurakkhatīti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito yathā parihāni na hoti,
tika-s0402t:1117_5: tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjīti mandhāturājā kira ekadivasaṃ attano pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pucchi –
tika-s0402t:1118_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “mandhātumahārājā āgato”ti sutvā “tāvamahiddhiko mahārājā na sakkā yuddhena paṭibāhitu”nti sakarajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1118_6: tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno pāricārikā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0402t:1118_17: tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthārā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayasumanapupphavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā,
tika-s0402t:1118_18: yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anuppavisatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1119_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri.
tika-s0402t:1119_1: Taṃ ākāse uṭṭhahi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
tika-s0402t:1119_2: Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyā āsanne ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya.
tika-s0402t:1119_3: Rājā ekakova attano ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0402t:1119_4: Sakko “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā “svāgataṃ, mahārāja, sakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1119_6: anusāsa mahārājā”ti vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dve bhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi.
tika-s0402t:1119_8: devaloke pavattivipākadāyino aparapariyāyavedanīyassa kammassa katokāsattā sabbadā soḷasavassuddesikatāmālāmilāyanādidevabhāvo pāturahosi.
tika-s0402t:1119_9: Tassa sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāya nisinnassa akkhinimisanamattena nānattaṃ paññāyati.
tika-s0402t:1119_10: Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti.
tika-s0402t:1119_11: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno tadā manussānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāya yāva chattiṃsa sakkā upapajjitvā cutā,
tika-s0402t:1119_12: tāva sakkarajjaṃ kāretvā “kiṃ me iminā upaḍḍharajjenā”ti atitto kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patito
tika-s0402t:1119_14: Tena vuttaṃ “devaloke pana yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1122_6: Sā ca nesaṃ paratā aniccadassane pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “iminā hi padena aniccānupassanā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1125_1: Sattame chandāgatinti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento āha “chandena agati”nti.
tika-s0402t:1126_0: Ettha ca yo “ayaṃ me mittoti vā,
tika-s0402t:1126_3: lañcaṃ vā pana me detī”ti chandavasena assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:1126_8: Yo pana mandattā momūhattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:1126_10: Yo pana “ayaṃ rājavallabhoti vā visame corādike visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni samādāya vattanena visamanissito vā,
tika-s0402t:1126_11: anatthampi me kareyyā”ti bhīto assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:1127_0: Yo pana kiñci bhājento “ayaṃ me sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto vā”ti pemavasena atirekaṃ deti,
tika-s0402t:1127_2: yo muyhanto dinnādinnaṃ ajānamāno kassaci ūnaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1127_4: “ayaṃ imasmiṃ adīyamāne mayhaṃ anatthampi kareyyā”ti sīto kassaci atirekaṃ deti,
tika-s0402t:1127_5: so catubbidhopi yathānukkamena chandāgatiādīni gacchanto akattabbaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1128_0: Nihīyati tassa yasoti tassa agatigāmino kittiyasopi parivārayasopi nihīyati parihāyati.
tika-s0402t:1128_3: Yassati tena purecarānucarabhāvena parivārayatīti yaso, parivāro.
tika-s0402t:1132_3: Tenāha “mahāvālikarāsīti attho”ti. Uru, maru, sikatā, vālukā, vaṇṇu,
tika-s0402t:1133_9: Nāmameva vā etaṃ tassā nadiyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1133_10: Tassā nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi,
tika-s0402t:1133_12: Kasmā panāyaṃ ajapālanigrodho nāma jātoti āha “tassā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1133_13: Keci pana “yasmā tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni katvā sabbe vasiṃsu,
tika-s0402t:1133_19: Apare pana vadanti “yasmā majjhanhikasamaye antopaviṭṭhe aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati,
tika-s0402t:1134_4: tasmā abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ ajapālanigrodhe viharāmīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1134_7: Hatthī ca vānaro ca tittiro ca hatthivānaratittirā.
tika-s0402t:1135_6: Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuddho imasmiṃ ṭhāne vuddhoti adhippeto.
tika-s0402t:1135_11: Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva.
tika-s0402t:1135_13: khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā,
tika-s0402t:1135_14: ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikammena sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:1135_15: te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti,
tika-s0402t:1136_2: So panettha na yo koci adhippeto,
tika-s0402t:1137_1: Sadevakaggahaṇena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0402t:1137_3: Tattha hi māro jāto tannivāsī ca hoti.
tika-s0402t:1137_6: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ teneva vacanena gahitattā.
tika-s0402t:1137_7: Kāmaṃ “sadevake”tiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1137_8: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayoge ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1138_0: Devabhāvasāmaññena mārabrahmesu gahitesupi itarehi tesaṃ labbhamānavisesadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇanti dassento “māro nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1138_5: Idha dīghanikāyādayo viya bāhirakānampi ganthanikāyo labbhatīti āha “ekanikāyādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1138_11: Sadevamanussāyāti vā iminā sammutidevaggahaṇaṃ tadavasiṭṭhamanussalokaggahaṇañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1139_0: Evaṃ bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1139_1: Lokavasena vuttāni “lokīyanti ettha kammaṃ kammaphalānī”ti katvā.
tika-s0402t:1139_3: Sīlasampannataranti ettha paripuṇṇasampannatā adhippetā “sampannaṃ sālikedāra”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:1140_0: Iminā vacanenāti imasmiṃ sutte anantaraṃ vuttavacanena.
tika-s0402t:1140_2: suttantarampi ānetvā paṭibāhitabboti dassento “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1140_3: Tattha na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:1140_7: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:1141_2: attano pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bahū rattiyo jānanti,
tika-s0402t:1141_12: Mahāpajāpatiyā dussayugadānakāleti bhagavato saṅghe gāravassa pākaṭakāladassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1141_13: Na hi bhagavā tato pubbe saṅghe gāravarahito vihāsi.
tika-s0402t:1144_1: Dutiye huhuṅkajātikenāti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko mānavasena kodhavasena ca “huhu”nti karonto vicarati,
tika-s0402t:1144_12: pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa pacchimo tatiyo bhāgo.
tika-s0402t:1144_18: Addhagatāti maggappaṭipannā brāhmaṇānaṃ vatacariyādimariyādaṃ avītikkamma caramānā.
tika-s0402t:1144_20: Sutaṃ netanti ettha sutaṃ no etanti padacchedo.
tika-s0402t:1145_9: attano suṇantassa ca na saṃvaravinayāvahaṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1145_10: Na hadaye nidhetabbayuttakanti ahitasaṃhitattā cittaṃ anuppavesetvā nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1145_11: Kathetuṃ ayuttakālenāti dhammaṃ kathentena yo attho yasmiṃ kāle vattabbo,
tika-s0402t:1145_12: tato pubbe pacchā ca tassa akālo,
tika-s0402t:1145_15: Sāpadesaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā na kathetīti “bhagavatā asuke sutte evaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ sāpadesaṃ kāraṇasahitaṃ katvā na katheti.
tika-s0402t:1146_1: suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tassa anuyogaṃ upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā yaṃ suttaṃ jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1146_2: tassa sarīrabhūtaṃ kathaṃ anāmasitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti,
tika-s0402t:1146_4: “suttaṃ nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho,
tika-s0402t:1146_5: nāssa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā passāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:1146_6: Yathā vaṭarukkhasākhānaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne pārohā otaranti, otiṇṇo-
tika-s0402t:1146_12: Nikkhittaṃ nikkhittameva katvā passeneva pariharanto gacchati.
tika-s0402t:1146_13: Yo pana bahumpi bhaṇanto “etadatthamidaṃ vutta”nti nikkhittasuttato aññampi anuyogūpamāvatthuvasena tadupayogīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:1146_16: Na lokiyalokuttaraatthanissitanti attano paresañca na lokiyalokuttarahitāvahaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1147_0: Pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttivasena ca buddhādīhi bhāsitattā pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi,
tika-s0402t:1147_2: Purimassa atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ anusandhi,
tika-s0402t:1147_5: taṃtaṃdesanānaṃ pana pubbāparapāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasenāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1147_6: Uggahitanti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1147_7: pariyāpuṇanavasena ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1147_12: sutaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ arogikaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1147_15: Ekaṃ padaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo,
tika-s0402t:1148_7: Suttekadesassa suttamattassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto,
tika-s0402t:1148_11: dasavaggāni gatānī”tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1148_12: Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā cintitā manasānupekkhitā.
tika-s0402t:1148_13: Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatīti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati.
tika-s0402t:1148_14: Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
tika-s0402t:1149_3: sā paṭipakkhato suddhiyāti āha “abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ citta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1149_9: satipārisuddhijaṃ ñāṇasukhanti catubbidhampi jhānasukhaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhantataṃ upādāya nekkhammasukhanti
tika-s0402t:1149_11: Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha.
tika-s0402t:1149_12: Nikāmalābhīti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇavasiyopi vuttā evāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1149_13: Sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvāti etena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadataṃ khippābhiññatañca dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1150_2: sā ca paricchedānurūpāva icchitabbāti “vipulāna”nti vatvā “yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1150_3: Paricchedakālañhi appatvāva vuṭṭhahanto akasiralābhī na hoti yāvadicchitaṃ pavattetuṃ asamatthattā.
tika-s0402t:1150_4: Idāni yathāvutte samāpajjanādivasībhāve byatirekavasena vibhāvetuṃ “ekacco hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1150_5: Tattha lābhīyeva hotīti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1150_11: Kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandādīnaṃ viya aññesampi samādhipāripanthikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ visodhanañcāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1151_1: Abhiññāpāragūti sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ abhiññāya pāraṃ gato,
tika-s0402t:1151_2: sabbadhamme abhivisiṭṭhāya aggamaggapaññāya jānitvā ṭhitoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1151_3: Pariññāpāragūti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariññāya pāraṃ gato,
tika-s0402t:1151_5: Bhāvanāpāragūti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ bhāvanāya pāraṃ gato,
tika-s0402t:1151_13: Brahmacariyassa kevalīti yaṃ brahmacariyassa kevalaṃ sakalabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1154_6: sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ sammadeva samucchinnattā tato vippamuttoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1154_11: Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
tika-s0402t:1154_12: So hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati,
tika-s0402t:1154_13: tadatthaṃ ariyehi paṭipajjīyati cāti lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1155_0: Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-s0402t:1155_1: Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
tika-s0402t:1157_1: gatoti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
tika-s0402t:1157_3: yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya gato avagato,
tika-s0402t:1157_5: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
tika-s0402t:1157_6: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato.
tika-s0402t:1157_7: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti.
tika-s0402t:1157_8: Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1158_0: Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha diṭṭhādiabhisambodhavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1158_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1158_3: taṃ tathāgatasaddabuddhasaddānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1158_9: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhanteva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato yathā “duddha”nti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1158_12: Mutanti sanissaye indriye nissayaṃ muñcitvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1158_15: Taṃ pana diṭṭhādivinimuttaṃ viññeyyanti āha “sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:1158_20: Taṃ pana pattaṃ vā siyā appattaṃ vā,
tika-s0402t:1158_21: ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha “pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1158_22: Dvayenapi dvippakārampi pattaṃ dvippakārampi pariyesitaṃ tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1158_23: Cittena anusañcaritanti te pana apāpetvā citteneva anu anu sañcaritaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1159_1: Sumanoti rāgavasena lobhavasena saddhādivasena vā sumano.
tika-s0402t:1159_2: Dummanoti byāpādavitakkavasena vā vihiṃsāvitakkavasena vā dummano.
tika-s0402t:1159_14: majjhattavedanā kusalakammaṃ akusalakammanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1159_21: Gatiattho hi dhātavo buddhiatthā bhavantīti akkharacintakā.
tika-s0402t:1160_2: ratiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ tathāāgatattādiatthena
tika-s0402t:1160_3: tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato
tika-s0402t:1160_4: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati.
tika-s0402t:1160_5: Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1160_6: upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
tika-s0402t:1160_7: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ majjhe pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle
tika-s0402t:1160_8: paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati nidassanavasena,
tika-s0402t:1160_11: Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato
tika-s0402t:1160_12: ca anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamadanimmadanaṃ mohamadanimmadanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1160_14: ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekāya nāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1160_27: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1161_0: Yathāvādīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya
tika-s0402t:1161_4: “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati,
tika-s0402t:1161_5: te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0402t:1161_7: Tathā sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammāpaṭipadāyaṃ yathākārī bhagavā,
tika-s0402t:1161_8: tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī.
tika-s0402t:1162_1: heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi,
tika-s0402t:1162_2: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi.
tika-s0402t:1162_3: Asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā,
tika-s0402t:1162_4: tato eva ayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūto.
tika-s0402t:1162_8: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passatīti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:1162_12: cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1163_2: Taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi virahitoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātehi upayehi virahito.
tika-s0402t:1164_0: Abhibhavitvā ṭhitoti tabbisayakilesappahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0402t:1164_1: Cattāropi ganthe mocetvā ṭhitoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike sakasantānato mocetvā ṭhito.
tika-s0402t:1164_2: Veneyyasantāne vā attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanoti sabbaganthappamocano.
tika-s0402t:1164_3: Phuṭṭhassa paramā santīti assa anena khīṇāsavena buddhena paramā santi ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1164_5: Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti kutoci bhayakāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā.
tika-s0402t:1164_10: Nibbānappattassa vā kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0402t:1164_11: na kutoci bhayaṃ ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti akutobhayaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1165_1: Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ accantabhāvaṃ patto.
tika-s0402t:1168_1: Catutthe bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasīti ne samaṇe bāḷhaṃ katvā pasaṃsasi vaṇṇayasi.
tika-s0402t:1168_10: catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakā hutvā viharantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1172_0: Puṇṇā suddhehi dhammehi, tādisā samaṇā mama.
tika-s0402t:1182_1: Santoti rāgādīnaṃ santatāya buddhādayo santo nāma,
tika-s0402t:1182_2: idha pana pubbabuddhesu katādhikārā ussannakusalamūlā bhāvitabhāvanā sattā santoti adhippetā.
tika-s0402t:1182_3: Pakāsantīti dūre ṭhitāpi buddhānaṃ ñāṇapathaṃ āgacchantā pākaṭā honti.
tika-s0402t:1182_4: Himavantovāti yathā tiyojanasahassavitthato pañcayojanasatubbedho caturāsītiyā kūṭasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito
tika-s0402t:1182_5: himavantapabbato dūre ṭhitānampi abhimukhe ṭhito viya pakāsati,
tika-s0402t:1182_12: Te ettha buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇassa jāṇumaṇḍalassa santike nisinnāpi na dissanti na paññāyanti.
tika-s0402t:1182_13: Rattiṃ khittā yathā sarāti rattiṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre khittā sarā viya tathārūpassa upanissayabhūtassa
tika-s0402t:1183_1: yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ hoti nissaṭṭhaṃ pariccattaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1184_0: Diṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti ettha diṭṭhanti maṃsacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1184_6: taṃ sabbaṃ kālavisesavacanicchāya abhāvato “diṭṭha”nteva vuttaṃ yathā “duddha”nti.
tika-s0402t:1185_1: alābhepi tādīti yathā alābhakāle lābhassa laddhakālepi tathevāti tādiso.
tika-s0402t:1188_7: samayaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi subhagavane sālarājamūle”tiādīsu nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1191_0: Ādīsu vakkhamāne āsannapaccakkhe. Idhāpi vakkhamāneyeva āsannapaccakkhe daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1207_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1209_2: tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīle.
tika-s0402t:1211_1: mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunaviratiyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1215_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1221_3: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasutteyeva ariyamagge.
tika-s0402t:1222_0: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita”nti
tika-s0402t:1223_2: Janakuhanatthanti “aho ayyo sīlavā vattasampanno appiccho santuṭṭho mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”tiādinā janassa sattalokassa vimhāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1223_4: tividhena kuhanavatthunā kuhakabhāvena janassa vimhāpanattha”nti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1223_8: Janalāpanatthanti “evarūpassa nāma ayyassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti pasannacittehi “kenattho,
tika-s0402t:1223_11: tassa pāpicchassa sato paccayatthaṃ parikathobhāsādivasena lapanabhāvena upalāpakabhāvena janassa lapanatthanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1224_4: sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti sīlānisaṃsabhāvena vutto catupaccayalābho ca.
tika-s0402t:1224_5: Catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ sakkaccadānasaṅkhāto ādarabahumānagarukaraṇasaṅkhāto ca sakkāro,
tika-s0402t:1224_6: yo ca “sīlasampanno bahussuto sutadharo āraddhavīriyo”tiādinā nayena uggacchanakathutighosasaṅkhāto siloko
tika-s0402t:1224_9: Keci pana “lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthanti pāpicchasseva sato lābhādigarutāya lābhasakkārasilokasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0402t:1225_0: Na iti maṃ jano jānātūti evaṃ brahmacariyavāse sati “sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”tiādinā maṃ loko jānātu sambhāvetūti
tika-s0402t:1225_1: attano santaguṇavasena sambhāvanatthampi na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:1225_2: Keci pana “pāpicchassa sato asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena ‘iti evaṃguṇoti maṃ loko jānātū’ti na idaṃ
tika-s0402t:1225_4: Sabbatthāpi panettha purimo purimoyeva atthavikappo sundarataro.
tika-s0402t:1226_0: Atha khoti ettha athāti aññatthe nipāto,
tika-s0402t:1226_5: Idāni taṃ payojanaṃ dassento “saṃvaratthaṃ pahānattha”nti āha.
tika-s0402t:1226_12: “Iti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:1226_15: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āgato ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1229_0: Āgato ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1230_0: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0402t:1231_0: Atthato pana pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pajahanavasena vattappaṭivattānaṃ pūraṇavasena ca pavattā cetanā ceva virati ca.
tika-s0402t:1231_7: adosappadhānā vā tathāpavattā kusalā khandhā khantisaṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:1231_10: Tesu paṭhamo kāyaduccaritādīsu dussīlassa saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:1231_14: pañcamo kosajjassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaroti veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1231_15: Evametassa saṃvarassa atthāya saṃvaratthaṃ saṃvaranipphādanatthanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1232_3: Tattha yaṃ dīpālokeneva tamassa paṭipakkhabhāvato alobhādīhi lobhādikassa nāmarūpaparicchedādivipassanāñāṇehi tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1233_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa,
tika-s0402t:1233_3: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
tika-s0402t:1233_4: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagahaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena samucchindanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1233_10: Tassa pañcavidhassapi tathā tathā rāgādikilesānaṃ paṭinissajjanaṭṭhena samatikkamanaṭṭhena vā pahānassa atthāya,
tika-s0402t:1234_0: Tattha saṃvarena kilesānaṃ cittasantāne pavesanivāraṇaṃ pahānena ca pavesanivāraṇameva samugghāto cāti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1234_1: Ubhayenapi pana yathārahaṃ ubhayaṃ sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1235_0: Anītihanti ītiyo vuccanti upaddavā diṭṭhadhammikā samparāyikā ca.
tika-s0402t:1235_4: Atha vā ītīhi anatthehi saddhiṃ hananti gacchanti pavattantīti ītihā,
tika-s0402t:1235_12: sammāsambuddhappaveditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvasādhanato ca natthi ettha itihanti anitihaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1236_0: Nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ogadhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pāraṃ gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī,
tika-s0402t:1236_3: Nibbānogadhoti vā ariyamaggo vuccati tena vinā nibbānāvagāhaṇassa asambhavato tassa ca nibbānaṃ anālambitvā appavattanato,
tika-s0402t:1236_6: Maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā tassa anto eva pavattatīti.
tika-s0402t:1236_7: Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “nibbānassa antogāmina”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1236_8: Soti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-s0402t:1236_12: mahante vā sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti mahesino,
tika-s0402t:1237_0: Yathā buddhena desitanti yathā abhiññeyyādibhāvena sammāsambuddhena mayā desitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1237_1: evaṃ ye etaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadatthaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyañca paṭipajjanti.
tika-s0402t:1237_2: Te diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsantassa satthu mayhaṃ sāsanakārino ovādappaṭikarā
tika-s0402t:1237_3: sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyantaṃ appavattiṃ karissanti,
tika-s0402t:1240_2: asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya kohaññaṃ katvā paresaṃ viddhaṃsakāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1240_4: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyatī”ti evaṃ vuttena kodhena ca,
tika-s0402t:1240_5: “dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsani”nti.
tika-s0402t:1240_12: jīvitamado”ti evaṃ vuttajātimadādibhedena mānena ca garukātabbesu garūsupi nipaccakāraṃ akatvā ayosalākaṃ gilitvā ṭhitā viya anonatā hutvā vicaraṇakā.
tika-s0402t:1241_1: Lapāti paccayatthaṃ payuttavācāvasena nippesikatāvasena lapakāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1241_3: Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato suṭṭhu āsevitatāya sīse parikkhittaṃ sunibbattaṃ visāṇaṃ viya thirattā ca siṅgaṃ viyāti siṅgaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1242_4: Apagatāti yadipi te mama sāsane pabbajitā,
tika-s0402t:1242_5: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pana appaṭipajjanato apagatā eva imasmā dhammavinayā,
tika-s0402t:1247_0: Sabbattha patthaṭatāya vepullaṃ pāpuṇantīti sabbattha patthaṭabhāvena sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0402t:1250_1: Sattame niddosānīti avajjarahitāni āgamanasuddhito kāyamaṇḍanādikilesavatthubhāvābhāvato ca.
tika-s0402t:1250_8: Appatāya vā lābhena na somanassaṃ janayanti,
tika-s0402t:1250_10: anavajjatāya vippaṭisāranimittaṃ aññāṇupekkhaṃ na janayanti avippaṭisāravatthubhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1251_0: Paṃsukūlanti saṅkārakūṭādīsu yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1251_1: paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ rathikādīsu patitanantakāni uccinitvā katacīvaraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1251_3: Yaṃ kiñci muttanti yaṃ kiñci gomuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1251_5: “Pūtibhāvena āpaṇādito vissaṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ apariggahitaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhesajjaṃ pūtimuttanti adhippeta”nti apare.
tika-s0402t:1252_4: Idamassāhanti yvāyaṃ catubbidhena yathāvuttena paccayena appena sulabhena santoso,
tika-s0402t:1252_5: idaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sīlasaṃvarādīsu aññataraṃ ekaṃ sāmaññaṅgaṃ samaṇabhāvakāraṇanti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0402t:1252_9: tassa saṅkhepato dve aṅgā bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti.
tika-s0402t:1252_12: Tesu yasmā yathārahaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattibhūtā tassa mūlabhūtā cete dhammā,
tika-s0402t:1252_13: yadidaṃ appicchatā santuṭṭhitā pavivittatā asaṃsaṭṭhatā āraddhavīriyatāti evamādayo,
tika-s0402t:1253_1: Cīvaraṃ pānabhojananti nivāsanādicīvaraṃ ambapānakādipānaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyādibhuñjitabbavatthuñca ārabbhāti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:1253_5: “amukasmiṃ nāma āvāse paccayā sulabhā”ti labhitabbaṭṭhānagamanena vā “mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0402t:1253_6: na tuyha”nti vivādāpajjanena vā navakammakaraṇādivasena vā senāsanādīni pariyesantānaṃ asantuṭṭhānaṃ icchitālābhādinā yo vighāto cittassa hoti,
tika-s0402t:1253_8: Disā nappaṭihaññatīti santuṭṭhiyā cātuddisabhāvena disā na paṭihanati.
tika-s0402t:1254_3: Adhiggahitā hontīti paṭipakkhadhamme abhibhavitvā gahitā honti.
tika-s0402t:1257_2: saddo “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdatī”tiādīsu dvinnaṃ gopānasīnaṃ sandhānaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadaṇḍake āgato.
tika-s0402t:1262_3: “Bhinnena piṭṭhivaṃsena mato hatthī”tiādīsu hatthiādīnaṃ piṭṭhivemajjhe padese.
tika-s0402t:1262_7: Tassa pana vaṃsassa kulanvayaṃ guṇanvayañca nidassanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1263_7: Idha pana ye “ārakā kilesehī”tiādinā laddhanibbacanā paṭividdhaariyasaccā,
tika-s0402t:1263_8: te eva adhippetāti dassetuṃ “ke pana te ariyā”ti pucchaṃ katvā “ariyā vuccantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1263_9: Tattha ye mahāpaṇidhānakappato paṭṭhāya yāvāyaṃ kappo,
tika-s0402t:1263_11: Te tāva sarūpato dassetvā tadaññepi sammāsambuddhe paccekabuddhe buddhasāvake ca saṅgahetvā anavasesato ariye dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1263_13: tāva satthā dharati eva nāmāti imameva bhagavantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1263_16: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle te te paccuppannāti ce,
tika-s0402t:1264_2: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi,
tika-s0402t:1264_3: yadidaṃ cha chakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.

tika-s0402t:1298_7: Sammāsatidhammapadaṃ nāma sūpaṭṭhitassati vā satisīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā.
tika-s0402t:1298_8: Sammāsamādhidhammapadaṃ nāma aṭṭhasamāpatti vā aṭṭhasamāpattisīsena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā.
tika-s0402t:1298_16: Pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantenāti parisuddhabhāvaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaanavajjasaṅkhātaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena.
tika-s0402t:1298_17: Sāvajjadhammasamuppattiyā hi cittassa anavajjabhāvo jahito hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1301_1: Dasame abhiññātāti ediso ca ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā.
tika-s0402t:1301_3: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakādisattehi ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi
tika-s0402t:1301_8: Bhagavā pana yasmā paṭisallānā uttamato phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0402t:1301_12: Sakāraṇāti yehi kāraṇehi paresaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassenti,
tika-s0402t:1301_14: Na hi lakkhaṇayuttena hetunā vinā paravādesu dosaṃ dassetuṃ sakkā.
tika-s0402t:1302_0: Evamādīti ettha ādisaddena “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:1302_5: Tattha kammaṃ paṭibāhantena vipāko paṭibāhito hoti,
tika-s0402t:1302_7: Iti sabbepete atthato ubhayapaṭibāhakā ahetuvādā ceva akiriyavādā ca natthikavādā ca honti.
tika-s0402t:1303_1: Sajjhāyatīti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ uggahetvā paṭhati.
tika-s0402t:1303_4: Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti yathāparikappitahetupaccayābhāvādike natthi hetūtiādinayappavattāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe.
tika-s0402t:1303_5: Micchāsati santiṭṭhatīti “natthi hetū”tiādivasena anussavūpaladdhe atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe
tika-s0402t:1303_6: viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena evametanti nijjhānakkhamabhāvūpagamanena nijjhānakkhantiyā
tika-s0402t:1303_7: tathāgahite punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samānīyamānā micchāvāyāmopatthambhitā
tika-s0402t:1303_8: ataṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvanti gaṇhantī micchāsatīti laddhanāmā taṃladdhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati.
tika-s0402t:1303_9: Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotīti yathāvuttavitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe avaṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya
tika-s0402t:1303_10: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti micchāsamādhinā.
tika-s0402t:1303_11: Sopi hi paccayavisesena laddhabhāvanābalo kadāci samādhānapaṭirūpakiccakaro hotiyeva paharaṇavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1304_0: Javanāni javantīti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni javanti.
tika-s0402t:1304_3: na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ satekicchabhāvāpādanaṃ kenaci sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1304_5: Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatīti yassa ekasmiṃyeva abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā,
tika-s0402t:1304_7: Yassa dvīsu tīsupi vā abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā,
tika-s0402t:1304_9: Etena yā pubbe ubhayapaṭibāhikatāmukhena pavattā atthasiddhā sabbadiṭṭhikā,
tika-s0402t:1304_11: micchāniyāmokkantiyā pana yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamadiṭṭhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppattiyā abhikiṇṇā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1304_12: Ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu tīsu okkantesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hotīti iminā tissannampi diṭṭhīnaṃ samānaphalataṃ samānabalañca dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1304_13: Tasmā tissopi cetanā ekassa uppannā aññamaññaṃ anubalappadāyikā honti.
tika-s0402t:1305_6: āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyeva.
tika-s0402t:1305_8: Tasmā “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggo eva bālo”ti viya vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā,
tika-s0402t:1305_9: yādisehi pana paccayehi ayaṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci micchattaniyāmo tappaṭikkhepapaccaye paṭicca
tika-s0402t:1305_10: tato sīsukkhepanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1306_0: Attano nindābhayenāti “sammā diṭṭhiñca nāma te garahantī”tiādinā attano upari parehi vattabbanindābhayena.
tika-s0402t:1306_2: Sahadhammena parena attano upari kātabbaniggaho upārambho,
tika-s0402t:1306_4: Taṃ pana atthato upavādabhayaṃ hotīti āha “upavādabhayenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1311_1: Catutthassa paṭhame cattāri cakkānīti ettha cakkaṃ nāma dārucakkaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1311_7: rathakāracakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ chārattūnehī”ti idaṃ dārucakkaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1311_13: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti idaṃ sampatticakkaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1311_14: Idhāpi etadeva adhippetanti āha “cattāri sampatticakkāni vattantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1311_18: Attano sammā ṭhapananti attano cittasantānassa yoniso ṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1311_20: Idameva cettha pamāṇanti idameva pubbekatapuññatāsaṅkhātaṃ sampatticakkaṃ eva etesu sampatticakkesu pamāṇabhūtaṃ itaresaṃ kāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1311_22: So eva ca katapuñño puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti akatapuññassa tadabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1314_1: Dutiye tassa dānameva dātabbanti pabbajitassa pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ pattacīvarādi,
tika-s0402t:1314_5: Telena viya makkhetīti satadhotatelena makkheti viya.
tika-s0402t:1314_13: Attano sukhuppattiyaṃ tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ tena dukkhena attanā ekasambhogatāti āha “samānasukhadukkhabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0402t:1314_14: Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā ekato nisajjādinā pākaṭā hotīti dassento “ekāsane”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1315_0: Tattha jātiyā hīno bhogena adhiko dussaṅgaho hoti.
tika-s0402t:1315_1: Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogo kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā.
tika-s0402t:1315_2: Tassa tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā,
tika-s0402t:1315_4: Bhogena hīno jātiyā adhikopi dussaṅgaho hoti.
tika-s0402t:1315_5: So hi “ahaṃ jātimā”ti bhogasampannena saddhi ekaparibhogaṃ icchati,
tika-s0402t:1315_8: Na hi so itarena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato,
tika-s0402t:1315_14: Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1315_17: Sīlavā hi adīyamānepi kismiñci āmise akariyamānepi saṅgahe na kujjhati,
tika-s0402t:1315_18: aññaṃ attanā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akarontampi na pāpakena cittena passati pesalabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1315_19: Tato eva paribhogopi anena saddhiṃ sukaro hoti,
tika-s0402t:1315_25: Tenevāha “so sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti,
tika-s0402t:1318_1: Tatiye sīhoti parissayasahanato paṭipakkhahananato ca “sīho”ti laddhanāmo migādhipati.
tika-s0402t:1318_2: Cattāroti samānepi sīhajātibhāve vaṇṇavisesādisiddhena visesena cattāro sīhā.
tika-s0402t:1318_3: Te idāni nāmato vaṇṇato āhārato dassetvā idhādhippetasīhaṃ nānappakārato vibhāvetuṃ “tiṇasīho”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1318_4: Tiṇabhakkho sīho tiṇasīho purimapade uttarapadalopena yathā “sākapatthivo”ti (pāṇini 2.1.60).
tika-s0402t:1318_9: Rattakambalassa viya kesaro kesarakalomo etassa atthīti kesarī.
tika-s0402t:1319_1: Suvaṇṇaguhato vātiādi “sīhassa vihāro kiriyā evaṃ hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1320_0: Samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti sabbabhāgehi samameva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-s0402t:1321_4: atha kho mayameva mahābalā”ti evaṃ balātimānanimittāya ahaṃkārahetubhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:1321_5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattāti nirahaṃkārattā attasinehassa suṭṭhu samugghātattā na bhāyati.
tika-s0402t:1322_0: Tathā tathāti sīhasadisatādinā tena tena pakārena attānaṃ kathesīti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “sīhoti kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1323_0: Katamahābhinīhārassa lokanāthassa bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattiyā ekantabhāvī buddhabhāvoti katvā “tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo,
tika-s0402t:1323_2: pāyāsassa paribhuttakālo”tiādinā abhisambodhito purimāvatthāpi sīhasadisā katvā dassitā.
tika-s0402t:1323_4: Vijjābhāvasāmaññato dvivijjaṃ itaravijjampi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiccasamuppādasammasanato taṃ puretarasiddhaṃ viya katvā āha “tisso vijjā sodhetvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1324_1: Ekādasame divaseti sattasattāhato paraṃ ekādasame divase.
tika-s0402t:1324_3: Tampi hi kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisajjāti katvā vajirāsanaṃ viya acalapallaṅkaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1324_12: maggabhāvanāti ekekasmiṃ magge cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi ākārehi.
tika-s0402t:1325_0: Paṭhamena nayena abhisambodhito purimatarāvatthāpi avassaṃbhāvitāya gahetvā sīhasadisataṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0402t:1325_1: abhisambuddhāvatthāsu eva sīhasadisataṃ dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1325_9: abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi tathāgatasādhakehi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0402t:1325_10: Yadipi bhagavā bodhipallaṅke nisinnamatteva abhisambuddho na jāto,
tika-s0402t:1325_11: tathāpi tāya nisajjāya nisinnova panujja sabbaṃ parissayaṃ abhisambuddho jāto.
tika-s0402t:1325_13: tasmā “yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā”ti vatvā tena aparitussanto “yāva arahattamaggañāṇā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1326_1: Tena sakkāyo sarūpato parimāṇato paricchedato ca dassitoti āha “ayaṃ sakkāyo”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1326_4: Tassa ca parimāṇassa ekantikabhāvaṃ dassentena “na ito bhiyyo sakkāyo atthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1326_8: Paricchedatoti yattake ṭhāne tassa pavattitassa paricchindanato.
tika-s0402t:1326_10: Sabbepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dassitā honti yathāvuttena vibhāgena.
tika-s0402t:1326_11: Ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo nāmāti ayaṃ āhārādisakkāyassa samudayo nāma.
tika-s0402t:1326_14: “Āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā”ti ca asādhāraṇameva taṃ gahetvā sesesu ādi-
tika-s0402t:1327_2: Anāgāmīnampi hi bhayaṃ cittutrāsañca na hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1327_4: Itarāsaṃ pana devatānanti akhīṇāsavadeve sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0402t:1328_4: Duvidhepi ñāṇaṃ padhānanti ñāṇasīsena vuttaṃ “paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1328_5: Idāni taṃ ñāṇaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1328_6: Yasmā tassa ñāṇassa paṭividdhattā bhagavā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni veneyyānaṃ dassetuṃ samattho ahosi,
tika-s0402t:1328_7: tasmā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni tena ñāṇena saddhiṃyeva siddhānīti katvā dassento “saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhī”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1328_8: Tiparivaṭṭanti “idaṃ dukkha”nti ca “pariññeyya”nti ca “pariññāta”nti ca evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1331_8: So hi mahābhinīhāraṃ dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayañca ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi
tika-s0402t:1331_9: ca payojanehi ca sesajanehi asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi aggo.
tika-s0402t:1331_11: tehi sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi sabbasattuttamatāya aggo.
tika-s0402t:1331_12: Ye pana purimakā sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā,
tika-s0402t:1331_13: tehi saddhiṃ ayameva rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva dhammakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi aggo.
tika-s0402t:1331_14: Tathā dullabhapātubhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyaasahāyādibhāvato ca bhagavā loke aggoti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-s0402t:1332_14: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo.
tika-s0402t:1333_0: Dhammasaṅghā aññadhammasaṅghehi asadisaṭṭhena visiṭṭhaguṇatāya dullabhapātubhāvādinā ca aggā.
tika-s0402t:1333_1: Tathā hi tesaṃ svākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesehi aññe dhammasaṅghasadisā appataraṃ nihīnā vā natthi,
tika-s0402t:1333_8: Evaṃ aggesu seṭṭhesu uttamesu pavaresu guṇavisiṭṭhesu pasādāti aggappasadā.
tika-s0402t:1334_0: Dutiyasmiṃ panatthe yathāvuttesu aggesu buddhādīsu uppattiyā aggabhūtā pasādā aggappasādā.
tika-s0402t:1334_2: te ekanteneva aggabhūtā pasādāti aggappasādā. Yathāha – “idha,
tika-s0402t:1335_4: uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatī”ti ettha anuppanno ca uppanno cāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1335_5: Yathā ca “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā”ti ettha bhūtānañca sambhavesīnañcāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1335_6: Yathā ca “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā”ti ettha aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho,
tika-s0402t:1335_8: aggamakkhāyatī”ti etthāpi apadā ca dvipadā cāti sampiṇḍanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1336_12: nevasaññināsaññibhavoti navavidhepi bhave sattepi anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1337_0: Kasmā panettha yathā adutiyasutte “dvipadānaṃ aggo”ti dvipadā eva gahitā,
tika-s0402t:1337_1: evaṃ dvipadaggahaṇameva akatvā apadādiggahaṇaṃ katanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t:1337_3: Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahupadesu na uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1337_7: Manussesu uppajjamāno sakalalokaṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1337_8: devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattanako mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1337_9: so tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati.
tika-s0402t:1337_10: Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa dvipadānaṃ aggoti tattha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1338_0: Aggo vipāko hotīti agge sammāsambuddhe pasannānaṃ yo pasādo aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto vā,
tika-s0402t:1338_1: tasmā tassa vipākopi aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto uḷāratamo paṇītatamo hoti.
tika-s0402t:1344_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa. ;
tika-s0402t:1348_5: evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
tika-s0402t:1348_6: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhiggaṇhanti dibbena āyunā,
tika-s0402t:1349_1: tasmā so apāyadukkhavinivattanena saddhiṃ sampattibhavesu sukhavisesadāyakova daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1350_1: Sabbopi cāyaṃ pasādo paramparāya vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinivattetiyeva.
tika-s0402t:1351_3: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1352_1: Saṅkhatāti samecca sambhūya paccayehi katāti saṅkhatā,
tika-s0402t:1352_3: Hetūhi paccayehi ca na kehici katā saṅkhatāti asaṅkhatā,
tika-s0402t:1352_6: Virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ yo virāgasaṅkhāto asaṅkhatadhammo,
tika-s0402t:1352_7: so sabhāveneva saṇhasukhumabhāvato santatarapaṇītatarabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvato madanimmadanādibhāvato aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1352_15: Sabbe ālayā samugghātaṃ gacchantīti kāmālayādikā sabbepi ālayā samugghātaṃ yanti.
tika-s0402t:1357_0: Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena dhamme pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1358_0: Saṅghā vā gaṇā vāti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā.
tika-s0402t:1358_1: Tathāgatasāvakasaṅghoti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhasaṅkhāto diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho.
tika-s0402t:1358_2: Aggamakkhāyatīti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1358_6: yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho catutthaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni.
tika-s0402t:1358_8: eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha purisapuggalā.
tika-s0402t:1358_9: Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni,
tika-s0402t:1358_11: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugaḷavasena cattāri yugāni pāṭiyekkato aṭṭha purisapuggalā,
tika-s0402t:1362_0: Ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo tassa aggavipākatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1362_1: Tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo anuttarasukhādhigamoti evamādiuḷāraphalanipphādanavasena
tika-s0402t:1363_2: Aggaṃ dhammanti aggasabhāvaṃ buddhasubodhiṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ,
tika-s0402t:1363_6: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “agge buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1363_7: Tattha pasannānanti aveccappasādena ca itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1363_9: sabbassa rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1364_0: Aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadatanti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dadantānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1364_1: Tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā,
tika-s0402t:1364_2: parinibbutaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1364_3: “Dhammaṃ pūjessāmā”ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1364_4: Tathā ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1364_5: Aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti evaṃ ratanattaye pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1364_6: divase divase aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati.
tika-s0402t:1364_7: Idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “aggaṃ āyū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1364_8: Tattha āyūti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāraṃ paramaṃ āyu pavaḍḍhati uparūpari brūhati.
tika-s0402t:1365_1: Atha vā aggassa deyyadhammassa dānaṃ uḷāraṃ katvā tattha puññaṃ pavattetā.
tika-s0402t:1365_2: Aggadhammasamāhitoti aggena pasādadhammena dānādidhammena ca saṃhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto,
tika-s0402t:1365_3: tassa vā vipākabhūtehi bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi yutto.
tika-s0402t:1365_4: Aggappatto pamodatīti yattha yattha sattanikāye uppanno,
tika-s0402t:1365_6: aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ adhigato pamodati abhiramati paritussatīti.
tika-s0402t:1368_1: Pañcame ariye ñāyeti saṃkilesato ārakattā ariye niddose parisuddhe niyyānikadhammabhāvato ñāye kāraṇeti attho.
tika-s0402t:1368_3: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenātī ñāyo,
tika-s0402t:1368_5: So eva ca sampāpakahetubhāvato kāraṇanti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1368_6: Idha pana saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo adhippetoti āha “sahavipassanake magge”ti.
tika-s0402t:1371_2: daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā dhāriyamānāsu māpitattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1371_3: Tañhi nagaraṃ “maṅgaladivase sukhaṇe sunakkhattaṃ mā atikkamī”ti rattimpi ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsu māpitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1371_5: ukkāsu vijjotayantīsu ṭhitā patiṭṭhitāti mūlavibhūjādipakkhepena (pāṇini 3.2.5) saddasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1371_6: Niruttinayena vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ukkaṭṭhā.
tika-s0402t:1371_7: Apare pana bhaṇanti “bhūmibhāgasampattiyā manussasampattiyā upakaraṇasampattiyā ca sā nagarī ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ukkaṭṭhāti nāmaṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1371_9: Taṃ pana kassapadasabalassa jātanagaranti āha “atīte kassapasammāsambuddhassa jātanagara”nti.
tika-s0402t:1372_6: antarantarā kathaṃ opapātetī”ti ca ādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu vattamānā antarāsaddā eva udāharitabbā siyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1373_2: tesu antarasaddopi vattatīti samānatthattā antarāsaddatthe vattamāno antarasaddo udāhaṭo.
tika-s0402t:1373_3: Antarāsaddo eva vā “yassantarato”ti ettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1373_4: Antarāsaddo eva pana ikasaddena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “antarikā”ti vuttoti evamettha udāharaṇodāharitabbānaṃ virodhābhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1373_5: Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarāsaddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-s0402t:1374_0: Sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvāti parinibbute bhagavati dhātūnaṃ atthāya kusināranagaraṃ
tika-s0402t:1374_1: parivāretvā ṭhitehi sesarājūhi “amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā dentu yuddhaṃ vā”tiādinā kosinārakehi mallehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0402t:1374_3: So kira brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā “ete rājāno bhagavato parinibbutaṭṭhāne vivādaṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:1374_6: vūpasamessāmi na”nti gantvā unnate padese ṭhatvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma avoca.
tika-s0402t:1374_7: Tattha paṭhamabhāṇavāre tāva ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu.
tika-s0402t:1374_9: ācariyassa viya bho saddo”ti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1374_10: Jambudīpatale kira kulaghare jāto yebhuyyena tassa na-
tika-s0402t:1374_12: atha kho so attano vacanaṃ sutvā nirave tuṇhībhūte viditvā puna –
tika-s0402t:1383_0: Imaṃ gāthādvayaṃ vatvā taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo aṭṭhadhā bhājetvā adāsi,
tika-s0402t:1383_1: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1384_4: Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya vinimuttā sabbe devā devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0402t:1387_1: Sattame nibbānasantikeyeva caratīti kilesanibbānassa anupādāparinibbānassa ca santikeyeva carati “na cirasseva adhigamissatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0402t:1387_2: Gāthāya appamādaratoti samathavipassanāya appamajjane rato abhirato,
tika-s0402t:1387_4: Pamādaṃ bhayato passantoti nirayūpapattiādibhayahetuto pamādaṃ bhayato passanto.
tika-s0402t:1387_5: Abhabbo parihānāyāti so evarūpo samathavipassanādhammehi maggaphalehi vā parihānāya abhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1390_1: Aṭṭhame antavā lokoti ekapassena vaḍḍhitaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “loko”ti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:1390_4: Anantavāti samantato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “loko”ti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:1390_5: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti jīvo sarīrañca ekameva vatthūti uppannadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0402t:1390_16: Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanaṃ viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:1390_18: Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭha”nti vuccati,
tika-s0402t:1390_19: evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhāni ādinnasadisāni maggena pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni nāma hontīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭhānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1391_3: Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmapipāsā kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1392_2: diṭṭhigatikasammatabrahmacariyassa ca gavesanavasena dvippakārāti āha “brahmacariyaṃ esissāmī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1392_3: Diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanāpi hi brahmacariyesanāti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1393_8: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
tika-s0402t:1393_9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
tika-s0402t:1393_10: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
tika-s0402t:1393_11: yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
tika-s0402t:1393_12: gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho,
tika-s0402t:1394_0: Tasmā diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanā diṭṭhabrahmacariyesanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1394_2: Ettāvatā ca rāgadiṭṭhiyo esanāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1395_1: Kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1395_4: Bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1395_7: Antaggāhikā diṭṭhi tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1397_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ kāmesanā bhavesanāti tisso esanā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1397_8: Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti diṭṭhiyā pavattiākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1397_14: Tā eva ca uparūpari vuddhiyā mānalobhādikilesasamussayanena vaṭṭadukkhasamussayanena ca samussayā,
tika-s0402t:1397_15: “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti micchābhinivisamānā sabbānatthahetukā kilesadukkhūpacayato hetubhūtā ca diṭṭhiyo brahmacariyesanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1397_16: Etena pavattiākārato nibbattito ca brahmacariyesanā dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1398_1: Tato eva taṇhākkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttattā taṇhākkhayavimuttino arahato.
tika-s0402t:1398_4: Diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti brahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca paṭhamamaggeneva samugghātitā.
tika-s0402t:1401_1: Navame anukulayaññanti anukulaṃ kulānukkamaṃ upādāya dātabbadānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1401_10: Atha taṃ kulaṃ anukkamena dāliddiyena abhibhūtaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1401_11: Ekā tasmiṃ kule dārikā ekasalākato uddhaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0402t:1401_12: Sāpi pacchā sātavāhanaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā khalaṃ sodhetvā laddhadhaññena taṃ salākaṃ adāsi.
tika-s0402t:1401_15: Sā tato paṭṭhāya puna pañcapi salākasatāni pavattesi.
tika-s0402t:1402_9: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthe lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1402_10: Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti,
tika-s0402t:1402_14: Evaṃ catūhi vatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1402_15: manussā mudā modanā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti.
tika-s0402t:1402_16: Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1402_18: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā
tika-s0402t:1402_19: ummūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
tika-s0402t:1404_0: Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu”nti. ;
tika-s0402t:1405_2: Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi.
tika-s0402t:1405_3: Sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassāti sattanavutādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa.
tika-s0402t:1408_3: Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi,
tika-s0402t:1408_4: andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0402t:1408_11: Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.
tika-s0402t:1409_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vividhā yattha haññare”ti vakkhamānattā “mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā”ti paṭhamo atthavikappo vutto.
tika-s0402t:1409_2: Dutiyo pana atthavikappo “mahārambhāti papañcavasena ajeḷakā”tiādi vuttanti adhippāyena “apicā”tiādinā āraddho.
tika-s0402t:1409_4: Nanu ca pāṇātipātādiakusalakammassa appamattakampi phalaṃ nupalabbhati,
tika-s0402t:1409_5: tasmā tassa nipphalabhāvaṃ avatvā “na te honti mahapphalā”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “niravasesatthe”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1409_8: Ye niccabhattādiṃ pubbapurisehi paṭṭhapitaṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchindantā manussā dadanti,
tika-s0402t:1412_5: Jhānasamāpattivasena sukhabahulattā sukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ brahmalokaṃ jhānapuññena,
tika-s0402t:1412_6: itarapuññena pana tadaññasampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ paṇḍito sappañño upeti.
tika-s0402t:1417_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāyāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhavihāratthāya,
tika-s0402t:1417_3: Iminā cattāri phalasamāpattijjhānāni khīṇāsavassa āsavakkhayādhigamato aparabhāge adhigatarūpārūpajjhānāni ca kathitāni.
tika-s0402t:1417_5: Dibbacakkhuñāṇañhi rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha “ñāṇadassana”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1417_6: Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotīti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyadīpacandamaṇiukkāvijjulatādīnaṃ āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho,
tika-s0402t:1417_7: yathāladdhavaseneva ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapeti,
tika-s0402t:1417_9: yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:1418_1: tatheva naṃ rattimpi manasi karotīti yathā divā diṭṭho āloko,
tika-s0402t:1418_3: Dutiyapadeti “yathā rattiṃ tathā divā”ti imasmiṃ vākye.
tika-s0402t:1418_4: Esa nayoti iminā yathā rattiyaṃ candālokādi āloko diṭṭho,
tika-s0402t:1418_5: evameva rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva divā taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapetīti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0402t:1418_6: Iti vivaṭena cetasāti evaṃ apihitena cittena,
tika-s0402t:1419_0: Sattaṭṭhānikassāti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādinā vuttassa sattaṭṭhānikassa satisampajaññassa atthāya.
tika-s0402t:1419_1: Pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāyāti vatthuno ārammaṇassa ca yāthāvato viditabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:1419_2: Yathā hi sappaṃ pariyesantena tassa āsaye vidite sopi vidito gahito eva ca hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
tika-s0402t:1419_3: evaṃ vedanāya āsayabhūte vatthumhi ārammaṇe ca vidite ādikammikassapi vedanā viditā gahitā eva hoti salakkhaṇato
tika-s0402t:1419_6: Tassa hi uppādakkhaṇepi ṭhitikkhaṇepi bhaṅgakkhaṇepi vedanā viditā pākaṭā honti “tā vedanā evaṃ uppajjitvā”tiādinā.
tika-s0402t:1419_8: idha vuttā saññādayopi avuttā cetanādayopi viditāva uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca nirujjhanti ca.
tika-s0402t:1419_11: Tena anavasesato sabbadhammānampi uppādādito viditabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1420_6: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa samudayaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1421_0: Iti rūpanti ettha itisaddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa idaṃ rūpanti etena sādhāraṇato sarūpanidassanamāha,
tika-s0402t:1421_2: na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti tabbinimuttassa aññassa abhāvaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1421_10: ito paraṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti evamattho daṭṭhabboti āha “vedanādīsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0402t:1422_5: Atāri soti so evarūpo arahā jātijaraṃ atari.
tika-s0402t:1425_1: Dutiye etesaṃ pañhānanti ekaṃsabyākaraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1425_2: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānātīti “cakkhuṃ anicca”nti puṭṭhe “anicca”nti ekaṃseneva byākātabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1425_3: “Aniccā nāma cakkhu”nti puṭṭhe pana “na kevalaṃ cakkhumeva,
tika-s0402t:1425_6: yathā sotaṃ tathā cakkhu”nti puṭṭhe “kenaṭṭhena pucchasī”ti paṭipucchitvā “dassanaṭṭhena pucchāmī”ti vutte “na hī”ti byākātabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1425_8: “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo,
tika-s0402t:1425_9: esa pañho na byākātabboti evaṃ jānātīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1425_14: abhimukhabhāvena vā samayo abhisamayoti evamettha padattho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1428_1: Pañcame ekokāseti cakkavāḷassa pariyantasaññite ekasmiṃ okāse.
tika-s0402t:1428_3: Sāmaññato vuttampi “so lokassa anto”ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva hoti.
