tika-s0402t:1561_5: Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti,
tika-s0402t:1561_6: gehe bījāni geheyeva nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1561_8: Manussā hi imasmiṃ kāle “dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī”ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti.
tika-s0402t:1561_9: Atha devo vassitvā sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti,
tika-s0402t:1561_14: Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti “idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi,
tika-s0402t:1562_4: Atha vā sabbaṃ panetaṃ paccayadāyakeheva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1562_5: Eko hi “asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī”ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti,
tika-s0402t:1562_9: Aparo saṅghaṃ animantetvā sakkāraṃ katvā “bhikkhū ānessāmī”ti na labhi,
tika-s0402t:1562_13: Aparo paṭhamaṃ saṅghaṃ nimantetvā pacchā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti,
tika-s0402t:1568_1: Catutthe udakarahado jaṇṇukamattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā vā bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo
tika-s0402t:1568_4: Tiporisacatuporise pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo gambhīro uttānobhāso nāma hotīti
tika-s0402t:1568_7: Puggalepi kilesussadabhāvato guṇagambhīratāya ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamanādīhi yutto uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma.
tika-s0402t:1571_1: Pañcame āmakaṃ hutvāti anto āmaṃ hutvā.
tika-s0402t:1571_2: Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇīti anto pakkaṃ bahi āmasadisaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1571_3: Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo āmatā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1571_6: evaṃ puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatā pakkavaṇṇitāti iminā nayena sesā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1574_1: Sattame āvāṭaṃ khanatīti attano āsayaṃ bilakūpaṃ khanati.
tika-s0402t:1574_2: Na ca tattha vasatīti tattha avasitvā kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasati,
tika-s0402t:1574_4: Vasitā no gādhaṃ kattāti sayaṃ na khanati,
tika-s0402t:1574_9: Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ khanati,
tika-s0402t:1574_11: Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati,
tika-s0402t:1574_13: tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0402t:1574_15: Dutiyo yathā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khanati,
tika-s0402t:1574_17: Yathā pana parena khanite bile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati,
tika-s0402t:1574_18: evaṃ parassa kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati.
tika-s0402t:1577_1: Aṭṭhame balībaddo tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti,
tika-s0402t:1577_4: Puggalopi attano parisaṃ ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharuse samudācaranto,
tika-s0402t:1577_5: paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ nivātavuttitaṃ āpajjanto sagavacaṇḍo nāmāti iminā nayena sesāpi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1580_1: Navame rukkho tāva pheggu sāraparivāroti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu hoti,
tika-s0402t:1583_1: Dasame yassa visaṃ pajjalitatiṇukkāya aggi viya sīghaṃ abhiruhitvā akkhīni gahetvā khandhaṃ gahetvā sīsaṃ
tika-s0402t:1583_2: gahetvā ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ āpajjati maṇisappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya,
tika-s0402t:1583_3: mantaṃ pana parivattetvā kaṇṇavātaṃ datvā daṇḍakena pahaṭamatte otaritvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:1583_6: āruḷhāruḷhaṭṭhāne pana āsittaudakaṃ viya hoti udakasappādīnaṃ viya,
tika-s0402t:1583_8: mantaparivattanādīsu ca kariyamānesu sīghaṃ na otarati,
tika-s0402t:1583_11: na sīghaṃ otarati aneḷakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya,
tika-s0402t:1583_15: ohāriyamānampi sukheneva otarati nīlasappadhamanisappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya,
tika-s0402t:1591_2: yassa pāto vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni sabbavattāni katāneva paññāyanti.
tika-s0402t:1591_5: Abhijātiṭṭhānādīnipi tassa uppattihetūni bhavantīti sikkhāpento āha “saṃvegajanakānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1596_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayanti attānaṃ anuvadantassa pāpakammino uppajjanakabhayaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1596_2: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇe paṭicca uppajjanakabhayanti agārikānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1596_3: anagārikānaṃ pana vinayadaṇḍaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayampi daṇḍabhayanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0402t:1599_1: Dutiye kodhūpāyāsassetaṃ adhivacananti ettha kujjhanaṭṭhena kodho,
tika-s0402t:1599_2: sveva cittassa kāyassa ca atippamaddanamathanuppādanehi daḷhaāyāsaṭṭhena upāyāso.
tika-s0402t:1599_3: Anekavāraṃ pavattitvā attanā samavetaṃ sattaṃ ajjhottharitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā ūmisadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:1599_4: Yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo ūmīsu osīditvā marati,
tika-s0402t:1599_5: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane kodhūpāyāse osīditvā vibbhamati,
tika-s0402t:1599_7: Odarikattassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo kumbhīlena khādito marati,
tika-s0402t:1599_8: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane odarikattena odarikabhāvena āmisagedhena micchājīvena jīvikakappanena nāsitasīlādiguṇatāya khāditadhammasarīro vibbhamati,
tika-s0402t:1600_2: Pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo āvaṭṭe nimujjitvā marati,
tika-s0402t:1600_3: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe nimujjitvā vibbhamati.
tika-s0402t:1600_4: Kāmarāgābhibhūto hi satto ito ca etto,
tika-s0402t:1600_5: etto ca itoti evaṃ manāpiyarūpādivisayasaṅkhāte āvaṭṭe attānaṃ saṃsāretvā yathā tato bahibhūte nekkhamme cittampi na uppādeti,
tika-s0402t:1600_6: evaṃ āvaṭṭetvā byasanāpādanena kāmaguṇānaṃ āvaṭṭasadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:1601_3: Yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo caṇḍamacchaṃ āgamma laddhappahāro marati,
tika-s0402t:1601_4: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane mātugāmaṃ ārabbha uppannakāmarāgo vibbhamati,
tika-s0402t:1601_6: Mātugāmo hi yonisomanasikārarahitaṃ adhīrapurisaṃ itthikuttabhūtehi attano hāsabhāvavilāsehi abhibhuyya
tika-s0402t:1601_7: gahetvā dhīrajātikampi attano rūpādīhi sampalobhanavasena anavasesaṃ attano upakāradhamme sīlādike sampādetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1602_0: Imāni pana cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā yathā udakaṃ anorohantassa udakaṃ nissāya udakapipāsāvinayanaṃ sarīrasuddhipariḷāhūpasamo kāyautuggāhāpananti,
tika-s0402t:1602_2: evamevaṃ imāni cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantassapi imaṃ sāsanaṃ nissāya saṅkhepato vaṭṭadukkhūpasamo,
tika-s0402t:1602_3: vitthārato pana sīlānisaṃsādivasena anekavidho ānisaṃso natthi.
tika-s0402t:1602_4: Yathā pana imāni cattāri bhayāni abhāyitvā udakaṃ orohantassa vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti,
tika-s0402t:1602_5: evaṃ imāni abhāyitvā sāsane pabbajantassapi vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti.
tika-s0402t:1602_6: Mahādhammarakkhitatthero panāha “cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā udakaṃ anotaranto sotaṃ chinditvā paratīraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:1602_8: evamevaṃ bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantopi taṇhāsotaṃ chinditvā nibbānapāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:1605_1: Tatiye brahmakāyikānaṃ devānanti ettha brahmānaṃ kāyo samūhoti brahmakāyo,
tika-s0402t:1605_3: Etāya ca sabbassapi brahmakāyassa samaññāya bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1605_4: Ābhassarānaṃ devānantiādinā pana dutiyajjhānabhūmikādīnaṃ upari gahitattā gobalībaddaññāyena tadavasiṭṭhānaṃ ayaṃ samaññā,
tika-s0402t:1605_10: Kappo āyuppamāṇanti ettha yadipi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ āyuno antaraṃ atthi,
tika-s0402t:1605_11: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena panetaṃ vuttanti dassento “paṭhamajjhānaṃ atthi hīna”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1606_0: Dve kappā āyuppamāṇanti ettha pana hīnajjhānena nibbattānaṃ vasena ayaṃ paricchedo katoti dassetuṃ “dutiyajjhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1606_2: Cattāro kappāti ettha pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena catusaṭṭhi kappā vattabbāti dassento “yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ‘kappo dve kappā’ti,
tika-s0402t:1606_4: Kathaṃ panettha ayamattho labbhatīti āha “kappoti ca guṇassapi nāma”nti.
tika-s0402t:1606_8: Dve kappā hontīti ekavāragaṇanāya kappassa dviguṇitattā dve mahākappā hontīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1606_10: Cattāroti dutiyavāragaṇanāya dvīsu kappesu dviguṇitesu cattāro mahākappā hontīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1606_11: Puna te cattāro kappāti vuttanayena dve vāre guṇetvā ye cattāro kappā dassitā,
tika-s0402t:1606_12: puna te cattāro kappā catugguṇā hontīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1606_14: dve vāre guṇetvā ye cattāro kappā dassitā,
tika-s0402t:1606_15: tesu catukkhattuṃ guṇitesu catusaṭṭhi kappā sampajjantīti.
tika-s0402t:1606_16: Tathā hi cattāro ekasmiṃ vāre guṇitā aṭṭha honti,
tika-s0402t:1606_17: puna te aṭṭha dutiyavāre guṇitā soḷasa honti,
tika-s0402t:1606_18: puna te soḷasa tatiyavāre guṇitā dvattiṃsa honti,
tika-s0402t:1606_19: puna te dvattiṃsa catutthavāre guṇitā catusaṭṭhi honti.
tika-s0402t:1606_20: Tenevāha “imehi catūhi guṇehi guṇitā ekena guṇena aṭṭha hontī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1607_0: “Yāni mānusakāni paññāsa vassāni, cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo”ti –
tika-s0402t:1610_3: vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”tiādinā devamanussānañceva rūpārūpāvacarasattānañca āyuppamāṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1611_0: Tattha sammāsambuddhena manussānaṃ devānañca āyuṃ paricchindamānena catūsu apāyesu bhummadevesu ca āyu na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1611_7: Tattha nibbattā hi keci sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0402t:1611_10: Tattha manussesu gihibhāve ṭhitāyeva sotāpannāpi honti,
tika-s0402t:1611_13: khīṇāsavā pana parinibbāyanti vā pabbajanti vā. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1611_16: taṃ hīnatāya uttamaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:1611_17: tasmā te parinibbātukāmā vā honti pabbajitukāmā vā.
tika-s0402t:1611_18: Bhummadevā pana arahattaṃ pattāpi yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0402t:1611_19: chasu kāmāvacaresu devesu sotāpannasakadāgāmino yāvajīvaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0402t:1611_20: anāgāminā rūpabhavaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati khīṇāsavena parinibbātuṃ. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1611_23: tattha rūpāvacare nibbattā sotāpannasakadāgāmino na puna idhāgacchanti,
tika-s0402t:1612_12: Pañcasu suddhāvāsesu catūsu ca arūpesu ariyasāvakānaṃ tatrūpapattipi hoti uparūpapattipi.
tika-s0402t:1612_13: Paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbatto anāgāmī nava brahmaloke sodhetvā matthake ṭhito parinibbāti.
tika-s0402t:1612_16: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime tayo devalokā seṭṭhabhavā nāma.
tika-s0402t:1612_17: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesu nibbattaanāgāmino neva uddhaṃ gacchanti, na adho,
tika-s0402t:1612_18: tattha tattheva parinibbāyantīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1615_1: Catutthe te dhammeti te “rūpagata”ntiādinā nayena vutte rūpādayo dhamme.
tika-s0402t:1615_3: tato eva ca udayavayavantato vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1615_9: Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1615_10: Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūtā.
tika-s0402t:1615_12: Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkapabhinnato ca gaṇḍato.
tika-s0402t:1615_22: Rūpādidhammā hi na ettha attā atthīti anattā.
tika-s0402t:1615_23: Evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā.
tika-s0402t:1615_24: Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1615_25: Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1618_1: Sattame vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharitabbanti “okkamatī”ti āha “okkanto hotīti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1618_4: Devānañhi pabhaṃ so obhāso adhibhavati, na deve.
tika-s0402t:1618_12: saddena yathā heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā sandhārikā pathavī natthi asaṃvutā lokantarikā,
tika-s0402t:1618_13: evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1618_18: Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāya pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
tika-s0402t:1618_20: Evaṃ sesadīpesupīti āha “ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1618_21: Ito aññathā dvīsu eva dīpesu paññāyanti.
tika-s0402t:1618_22: Ekekāya disāya navanavayojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1618_23: Pabhāya nappahontīti attano pabhāya obhāsituṃ nābhisambhuṇanti.
tika-s0402t:1618_24: Yugandharapabbatamatthakasamappamāṇe ākāse vicaraṇato “cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena carantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1619_4: Accantakhāreti ātapasantapābhāvena atisītabhāvaṃ sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā.
tika-s0402t:1619_5: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhānaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavisandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavitumarahati,
tika-s0402t:1619_7: tesaṃ vā pāpakammaphalena petānaṃ pakatiudakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa khārabhāvāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake”ti.
tika-s0402t:1622_4: Ālīyanti vā allīyantā abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ālayā,
tika-s0402t:1622_7: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannauyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya sampattiyā ramati,
tika-s0402t:1622_13: Tena tesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayārāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1625_2: upagatānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca pucchāvissajjanavasena ceva cittarucivasena ca yathākālaṃ dhammaṃ desetiyeva,
tika-s0402t:1630_5: Nanu ca sotāpannassapi orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni,
tika-s0402t:1630_6: kasmā pana sakadāgāmīyeva idha gahitoti āha “sakadāgāmissāti idaṃ appahīnasaṃyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahita”nti.
tika-s0402t:1630_9: Sakadāgāmito parañhi appahīnaorambhāgiyasaṃyojano ariyo nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:1630_10: Nanu ca sakadāgāmissa pahīnānipi orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni atthi diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanānaṃ pahīnattā,
tika-s0402t:1630_11: tasmā “orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṃ upādāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1630_13: tasmā tāni appahīnāni upādāya “orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1633_1: Dutiye paṭibhānaṃ vuccati ñāṇampi ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitavacanampi,
tika-s0402t:1633_4: Pucchānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya nomuttappaṭibhānamassāti nomuttappaṭibhāno.
tika-s0402t:1633_6: Ettha pana paṭhamo kañci kālaṃ vīmaṃsitvā yuttameva pekkhati tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero viya.
tika-s0402t:1633_7: So pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttappattakāraṇameva katheti.
tika-s0402t:1633_8: Dutiyo pucchānantarameva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati,
tika-s0402t:1633_9: vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ na pakkheti catunikāyikapiṇḍatissatthero viya.
tika-s0402t:1633_10: So pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi nāgameti,
tika-s0402t:1633_12: vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na lagati.
tika-s0402t:1633_14: taṃkhaṇaṃyeva ca naṃ byākaroti tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero viya.
tika-s0402t:1633_15: So pana pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti,
tika-s0402t:1633_17: Catuttho puṭṭho samāno neva yuttaṃ pekkhati,
tika-s0402t:1633_18: na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:1636_1: Tatiye ugghaṭitaññūti ettha ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1636_4: Dhammābhisamayo hotīti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo.
tika-s0402t:1636_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
tika-s0402t:1636_6: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1636_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1636_12: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1639_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa sadosattā gūthakuṇapādibharito padeso viya “sāvajjo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1639_5: Sāvajjena bahulanti yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahulaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1639_7: So “sāvajjena bahulaṃ kāyakammena samannāgato appaṃ anavajjenā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1639_10: Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci karahaci uposathaṃ samādiyati,
tika-s0402t:1639_12: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya “vajjabahulo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1639_13: Yathā hi ekasmiṃ padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu,
tika-s0402t:1639_14: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ adhimuttakavassikapāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1639_16: Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese adhimuttakavassikapāṭalāni rāsikatānassu,
tika-s0402t:1639_17: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ duggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1639_19: Catuttho pana tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā ca catumadhurabharitasuvaṇṇavāti viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1642_1: Navame appañca bhāsatīti sampattaparisāya thokameva katheti.
tika-s0402t:1642_2: Asahitañcāti kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kālayuttaṃ katheti.
tika-s0402t:1642_3: Parisā cassa na kusalā hotīti sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1642_4: Evarūpoti ayaṃ evaṃjātiko bāladhammakathiko evaṃjātikāya bālaparisāya dhammakathikotveva nāmaṃ labhati.
tika-s0402t:1642_6: Ettha ca dveyeva janā sabhāvadhammakathikā, na itare.
tika-s0402t:1642_7: Itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ anto paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0402t:1650_1: Sattame paramatthato avijjamānasabhāvassa kālassa bhāvanādiyogo na sambhavatīti āha “kālāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:1650_2: kāle dhammassavanādivasena pavattānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ etaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0402t:1650_3: Kālasahacaritā hi kusalā dhammā idha kāla-
tika-s0402t:1660_7: vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti evaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmānukkamena saṃvaṭṭesu vattabbesu tathā avatvā āposaṃvaṭṭo,
tika-s0402t:1660_16: Ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassatīti ettha buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti jātikkhettaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1661_3: yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati.
tika-s0402t:1661_8: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati,
tika-s0402t:1661_9: tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti,
tika-s0402t:1664_1: Navame evaṃ pavattaṃ paccuppannataṇhaṃ nissāyāti “kudāssu nāmāhampi āsavānaṃ khayā”tiādinā nayena anuttare
tika-s0402t:1664_3: Kathaṃ pana lokuttaradhamme ārabbha āsā uppajjatīti?
tika-s0402t:1664_5: na ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tattha pihā pavattati avisayattā puggalassa ca anadhigatabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1664_6: Anussavūpaladdhe pana anuttaravimokkhe uddissa pihaṃ uppādento tattha pihaṃ uppādeti nāma.
tika-s0402t:1664_7: Nākaḍḍhatīti kammapathabhāvaṃ appattatāya paṭisandhiṃ na deti.
tika-s0402t:1667_1: Dasame vaḷañjentīti sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti ca.
tika-s0402t:1667_2: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahumpi ādiyantīti bahulā,
tika-s0402t:1667_4: Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvā yuttappayuttā nāma honti,
tika-s0402t:1667_7: sikkhāya ādaragāravābhāvena sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1667_9: saddena vā samānatthassa sāthalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1672_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññātiādīsu pāḷiyā āgatanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1673_1: Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1673_5: Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa khippaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1673_9: Akicchena akasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1673_13: Akicchena akasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassa khippaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassa yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:1674_0: Tattha kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti pubbabhāge āgamanakāle kicchena kasirena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena
tika-s0402t:1674_2: Dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:1674_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1674_7: vipassanāparivāsapaññāya ca dandhattā maggakāle ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena “dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāmā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1674_8: Upari tīsu padesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1677_3: Tīsu addhāsu kilamatīti pubbante aparante pubbantāparanteti evaṃ tīsu padesesu kilamati.
tika-s0402t:1680_0: 163. Tatiye “yathā etaṃ, tathā ida”nti iminā nayenāti etena –
tika-s0402t:1681_0: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
tika-s0402t:1682_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaye”ti. ; –
tika-s0402t:1683_2: yathā idaṃ saviññāṇakāsubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā carati tiṭṭhati nisīdati sayati,
tika-s0402t:1683_3: tathā etaṃ etarahi susāne sayitaṃ aviññāṇakampi pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi.
tika-s0402t:1683_4: Yathā ca etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na carati na tiṭṭhati na nisīdati na seyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-s0402t:1683_5: tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā bhavissati.
tika-s0402t:1683_6: Yathā ca idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ netarahi susāne mataṃ seti na uddhumātakādibhāvamupagataṃ,
tika-s0402t:1683_7: tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi.
tika-s0402t:1683_8: Yathā panetaṃ etarahi aviññāṇakāsubhaṃ matakasusāne seti uddhumātakādibhāvañca upagataṃ,
tika-s0402t:1683_10: Tattha yathā idaṃ tathā etanti attanā matasarīrassa samānabhāvaṃ karonto bāhire dosaṃ pajahati.
tika-s0402t:1683_11: Yathā etaṃ tathā idanti matasarīrena attano samānabhāvaṃ karonto ajjhattike rāgaṃ pajahati.
tika-s0402t:1684_0: Bahiddhā diṭṭhānanti bahiddhā susānādīsu diṭṭhānaṃ uddhumātakādidasannaṃ asubhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1684_2: nanu antimajīvikābhāvato piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesu paritassanagedhādisamuppattito bhattassa sammadajananato
tika-s0402t:1684_7: jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ atipāpoyaṃ lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyo vicarati pattapāṇīti.
tika-s0402t:1684_9: laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhopanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatīti.
tika-s0402t:1684_10: Bhutto ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ āvahatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1685_0: Kaṭukīṭakādayo dvattiṃsakulappabhedā kimiyo naṃ upanissāya jīvantīti? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t:1685_1: antimajīvikābhāvo tāva cittasaṃkilesavisodhanatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhinivesanato pageva manasi kātabbo “māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya”nti.
tika-s0402t:1685_2: Tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesu paritassanagedhādisamuppattinivāraṇaṃ pageva anuṭṭhātabbaṃ suparisuddhasīlassa paṭisaṅkhānavato tadabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1685_5: saṅgahitameva vā “navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasenā”ti ettha niyamassa akatattā.
tika-s0402t:1685_6: Iminā vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0402t:1686_0: Evañca katvā visuddhimagge dasahi ākārehi paṭikūlatā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1686_9: Evaṃ dasannaṃ vasena pāṭikulyavacanenapi idha “navanna”nti vacanaṃ na virujjhati,
tika-s0402t:1686_10: sammakkhanassa paribhogādīsu labbhamānabhāvā visuṃ taṃ aggahetvā na vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1686_11: Visuddhimagge pana sammakkhanaṃ paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikūlanti dassetuṃ sabbapacchā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0402t:1687_0: Ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgatoti tīsu bhavesu aruccanavasena pavattāya vipassanāpaññāya samannāgato.
tika-s0402t:1690_1: Catutthe padhānakaraṇakāle sītādīni nakkhamati na sahatīti akkhamā.
tika-s0402t:1690_4: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena vitakkasamanaṃ samāti āha “akusalavitakkānaṃ vūpasamanapaṭipadā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1690_6: sabbesampi kilesānaṃ samanavasena pavattā paṭipadā samā.
tika-s0402t:1693_1: Sattamaṭṭhamesu mahāmoggallānattherassātiādinā moggallānattherassa heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ sukhapaṭipadadandhābhiññabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1693_3: sāriputtattherassa pana heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ sukhapaṭipadadandhābhiññabhāvo,
tika-s0402t:1693_5: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “buddhānaṃ pana cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññāva ahesuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1693_9: Yañca vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “tathāgatassa hi sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññāva ahesuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1693_10: mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiñño upari tayo dukkhapaṭipadakhippābhiññā”ti,
tika-s0402t:1693_12: Imāya pāḷiyā imāya ca aṭṭhakathāya na sameti,
tika-s0402t:1693_14: Taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ vā matena tattha tattha tathā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1696_1: Navame sasaṅkhārena dukkhena kasirena adhimattapayogaṃ katvāva kilesaparinibbānadhammoti sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0402t:1696_2: Asaṅkhārena appayogena adhimattapayogaṃ akatvāva kilesaparinibbānadhammoti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0402t:1696_3: Dhammānusārī puggalo hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena akasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:1696_4: Saddhānusārī puggalo pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1696_5: tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakaṃ ñāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati.
tika-s0402t:1696_6: Yathā nāma tikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1696_11: Saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakaṃ ñāṇaṃ dandhaṃ atikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ hutvā vahati.
tika-s0402t:1696_12: Yathā nāma kuṇṭhena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1696_17: Evaṃ santepi nesaṃ kilesakkhaye nānattaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:1699_1: Dasame samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvetīti idaṃ samathayānikassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1699_2: So hi paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā uppādeti,
tika-s0402t:1699_4: So tañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati,
tika-s0402t:1699_9: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvetīti idaṃ pana vipassanāyānikassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1699_10: So taṃ vuttappakāraṃ samathaṃ asampādetvā pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vipassati.
tika-s0402t:1699_11: Paṭhamo lokuttaramaggo nibbattatīti sotāpattimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-s0402t:1699_12: lokiyamaggavaseneva vā imissā pāḷiyā attho veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0402t:1699_22: Anusayā byantī hontīti maggappaṭipāṭiyā pahīyanti byantī honti.
tika-s0402t:1700_0: Dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasanti obhāsādīsu ariyadhammoti pavattaṃ uddhaccaṃ vikkhepo dhammuddhaccaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1700_1: tena dhammuddhaccena vipassanāvīthito uggamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ pavattiyamānaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1701_5: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-s0402t:1701_9: pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1701_12: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-s0402t:1706_5: Tathā vacīsañcetanā manosañcetanāti ettha kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhanti.
tika-s0402t:1706_8: Apicettha nava mahaggatacetanāpi labbhantīti iminā navahi rūpārūpakusalacetanāhi saddhiṃ manodvāre ekūnatiṃsāti
tika-s0402t:1706_9: tīsu dvāresu ekūnasattati cetanā hontīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1706_10: Avijjāpaccayāvāti idaṃ tāpi cetanā avijjāpaccayāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1706_11: Yathāvuttā hi ekūnasattati cetanā kusalāpi avijjāpaccayā honti,
tika-s0402t:1706_12: pageva itarā appahīnāvijjasseva uppajjanato pahīnāvijjassa anuppajjanato.
tika-s0402t:1707_0: Yasmā yaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cetanābhedaṃ kāyasaṅkhārañceva vacīsaṅkhārañca manosaṅkhārañca parehi anussāhito sāmampi asaṅkhārikacittena karoti,
tika-s0402t:1707_2: “idaṃ nāma kammaṃ karontopi tassa evarūpo nāma vipāko bhavissatī”ti evaṃ kammaṃ vipākañca jānantopi karoti,
tika-s0402t:1707_3: mātāpitūsu cetiyavandanādīni karontesu anukaronto dārako viya kevalaṃ kammaññeva vijjānanto “imassa pana
tika-s0402t:1707_4: kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti vipākaṃ ajānantopi karoti,
tika-s0402t:1707_5: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ “sāmaṃ vā ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1708_5: Khīṇāsavena hi katakammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti nākusalaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1709_3: Te kira puññavisesādhigatena mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattiyā mahantatāya
tika-s0402t:1709_5: Atha ekāhārātikkamato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1709_9: Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya kāyassa balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā karajakāyaṃ upatthambhetuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1709_10: Devānaṃ pana tejo balavā hoti uḷārapuññanibbattattā uḷāragarusiniddhasudhāhārajīraṇato ca.
tika-s0402t:1709_12: Te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ akkamitvāva saṇṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0402t:1709_13: Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenapi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ na hoti vinassatiyeva,
tika-s0402t:1709_14: evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0402t:1709_17: “āhārūpacchedena ātape khittamālā viyā”ti vuttattā ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino devā evaṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:1709_24: sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti.
tika-s0402t:1709_25: Taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-s0402t:1709_27: So jivhāyaṃ ṭhapitamattoyeva yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0402t:1709_28: tesaṃyeva divasavasena sattadivasaṃ yāpanasamatthova hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1710_3: Akkuddho rakkhatīti kuddhassa so kodho itarasmiṃ akkujjhante anupādāno ekavārameva uppattiyā anāsevano cāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:1710_6: Ubhosu pana kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso
tika-s0402t:1710_7: kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ nidahanto accantasukhumālaṃ karajakāyaṃ vināseti,
tika-s0402t:1711_0: Katame tena devā daṭṭhabbāti ettha tenāti paccatte karaṇavacananti āha “katame nāma te devā daṭṭhabbā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1711_1: Karaṇattheyeva vā etaṃ karaṇavacananti dassento āha “tena vā attabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1714_1: Dutiye atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
tika-s0402t:1714_5: Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayasamuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1714_8: taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
tika-s0402t:1714_17: Vibhattaatthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttāniṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:1715_3: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
tika-s0402t:1715_5: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu,
tika-s0402t:1715_8: taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
tika-s0402t:1715_11: atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti,
tika-s0402t:1715_12: taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti.
tika-s0402t:1716_4: “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ asabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0402t:1716_6: Aññaṃ panesa nāmākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṃ jānāti na jānātīti?
tika-s0402t:1716_10: Taṃ pana “nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākicca”nti paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vatthu kathitaṃ –
tika-s0402t:1717_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya kathemī”ti pavāresi.
tika-s0402t:1717_1: Taṃ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1717_3: So hi mahāpaññatāya taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ kathāpetvā uggahetvā evaṃ pavāresi.
tika-s0402t:1717_4: “Bhāsaṃ nāma sattā uggaṇhantī”ti vatvā panettha idaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1717_5: Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṃ taṃ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti.
tika-s0402t:1717_6: Dārakā tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti “iminā idaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1717_7: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti.
tika-s0402t:1717_10: Tesaṃ jāto dārako sace mātukathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti,
tika-s0402t:1717_14: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṃ bhāsissati.
tika-s0402t:1717_24: kālantarena aññathā honti ca nassanti ca.
tika-s0402t:1718_1: Sā hi katthaci kadāci parivattantīpi na sabbattha sabbadā sabbathāva parivattati,
tika-s0402t:1718_3: Sammāsambuddhopi hi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1718_5: Māgadhabhāsāya hi tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco.
tika-s0402t:1718_6: Tena saṅghaṭitamatteneva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0402t:1718_7: Aññāya bhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhakaṃ sodhetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1718_8: bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0402t:1719_1: Atthadhammādivisayesu hi tīsu ñāṇesu “imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī”ti evaṃ pavattañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1719_2: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0402t:1719_6: tattha sāriputtattherassa mahāmoggallānattherassa mahākassapattherassa mahākaccāyanattherassa mahākoṭṭhikattherassāti
tika-s0402t:1719_12: khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti evamādīnaṃ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedagatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0402t:1719_13: Pabhedo nāma maggehi adhigatānaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1720_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti?
tika-s0402t:1720_8: Sakkaccaṃ suṇantassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
tika-s0402t:1720_10: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṃ kathentassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
tika-s0402t:1721_4: na pana yathā adhigamassa balavapaccayo hoti,
tika-s0402t:1721_6: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā,
tika-s0402t:1721_7: pubbayogena pana pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṃ vinā paṭisambhidādhigamo nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:1721_8: Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā hontīti.
tika-s0402t:1724_1: Tatiye phassāyatanānanti ettha ākaraṭṭho āyatanasaddoti āha “phassākarāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:1724_6: Svāyaṃ channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ asesaṃ virāganirodhā atthaññaṃ vacanaṃ kiñcīti sandhāyāhāti āha “mā bhaṇīti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1724_7: Pañcaphassāyatanāni niruddhānīti cakkhādīnañca tattha abhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0402t:1727_3: Aṭṭhavidhāpi hi vijjā vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha abhiññā pariggahetvā vuttā.
tika-s0402t:1727_9: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti evaṃ pannarasabhedena caraṇadhammena samannāgato.
tika-s0402t:1727_10: Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1730_3: pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu evāti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1730_6: tasmā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggāhā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1730_8: Dantena goṇena saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visukāyati vipphandati,
tika-s0402t:1730_10: evaṃ ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanabhāvena upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0402t:1730_11: atha na cirenevassā acetanabhāvo pākaṭo hoti dhātumattatāya dassanato.
tika-s0402t:1730_15: na eso me attā”ti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1730_18: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.
tika-s0402t:1730_21: na meso attā”ti passanto neva katthaci attānaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:1730_22: na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:1730_23: na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:1733_1: Aṭṭhame santanti aṅgasantatāya ceva ārammaṇasantatāya ca kamanīyaṃ manoharaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1733_6: Yo hi kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandaṃ na suṭṭhu vikkhambhetvā kāyappassaddhivasena duṭṭhullaṃ
tika-s0402t:1733_7: suppaṭippassaddhaṃ akatvā ārambhadhātumanasikārādivasena thinamiddhaṃ na suṭṭhu paṭivinodetvā samathanimittamanasikārādivasena
tika-s0402t:1733_8: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ na samūhataṃ katvā aññepi samādhiparipanthe dhamme na suṭṭhu sodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati.
tika-s0402t:1733_9: So asodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya asuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca khippameva nikkhamati.
tika-s0402t:1733_10: Yo pana samādhiparipanthe dhamme suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0402t:1733_11: so suvisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya suparisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca sakalampi divasabhāgaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃyeva hoti.
tika-s0402t:1738_1: Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā,
tika-s0402t:1738_4: Nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhitā nibbedhabhāginī paññā”ti –
tika-s0402t:1740_0: Tattha paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, taṃ.
tika-s0402t:1740_1: Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti tudanti codenti.
tika-s0402t:1740_2: Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati parihāyati,
tika-s0402t:1740_5: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1740_7: Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1740_8: tassa nikantivasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā neva hāyati na vaḍḍhati,
tika-s0402t:1740_11: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā.
tika-s0402t:1740_12: Samudācarantīti paguṇato paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya tudanti codenti,
tika-s0402t:1740_13: tassa upari dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa
tika-s0402t:1741_0: Nibbidāsahagatāti taṃyeva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā.
tika-s0402t:1741_5: Vipassanāñāṇañhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito “virāgūpasaṃhita”nti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1741_7: Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā ariyamaggappaṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānatāya “nibbedhabhāginī”ti vuttāti.
tika-s0402t:1744_1: Dasame mahāokāseti mahante okāse mahantāni dhammassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0402t:1744_8: bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa dhammoti vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1744_12: Yasmā dhammassa dve sampadāyo satthā sāvako ca.
tika-s0402t:1744_14: Evamimamhā mayāyaṃ dhammo paṭiggahitoti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro.
tika-s0402t:1744_17: Tathā ca vuttaṃ nettiyaṃ “cattāro mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso,
tika-s0402t:1745_1: ganthassa sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma savananti āha “na sotabba”nti.
tika-s0402t:1745_15: Attho vuttoti pāḷiyā attho vutto niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:1745_16: Anusandhi kathitoti yathāraddhadesanāya uparidesanāya ca anusandhānaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1745_18: Pubbāparaṃ kathitanti pubbena paraṃ avirujjhanañceva visesaṭṭhānañca kathitaṃ pakāsitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1745_19: Evaṃ pāḷidhammādīni sammadeva sallakkhetvā gahaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahaṇanti āha “suṭṭhu gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1745_20: Sutte otāretabbānīti ñāṇena sutte ogāhetvā tāretabbāni.
tika-s0402t:1745_21: Taṃ pana ogāhetvā taraṇaṃ tattha otaraṇaṃ anuppavesanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “otaritabbānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1746_1: ko vā vinayo”ti vicāraṇāyaṃ ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1746_3: So hi mātikāsaññitassa suttassa atthe sūcanato “sutta”nti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0402t:1746_6: Evanti evaṃ suttavinayesu pariggayhamānesu vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādiyati parivārapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā.
tika-s0402t:1746_10: Na tāva pariyādiyantīti na tāva anavasesato pariggayhanti.
tika-s0402t:1746_12: Yasmā suttanti imaṃ nāmaṃ anāropetvā saṅgītaṃ jātakādibuddhavacanaṃ atthi,
tika-s0402t:1746_13: tasmā vuttanayena tīṇi piṭakāni na pariyādiyantīti.
tika-s0402t:1746_14: Suttanipātaudānaitivuttakāni dīghanikāyādayo viya suttanti nāmaṃ āropetvā asaṅgītānīti adhippāyenettha jātakādīhi saddhiṃ tānipi gahitāni.
tika-s0402t:1747_0: Kiṃ atthīti asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthiyevāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1747_1: Taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti “suttanti vinayo”tiādinā vuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “nāyamattho idhādhippeto”ti paṭisedhetvā.
tika-s0402t:1747_4: so eva kāraṇanti āha “vinayo pana kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:1748_14: Vīriyārambhāyāti kāyikassa ceva cetasikassa ca vīriyassa paggaṇhanatthāya.
tika-s0402t:1748_18: Evaṃ yo pariyattidhammo uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchāmanasikāravasena yoniso paṭipajjantassa sarāgādibhāvaparivajjanassa
tika-s0402t:1748_21: eso vinayo sammadeva apāyādīsu apatanavasena dhāraṇato kilesānaṃ vinayanato ca.
tika-s0402t:1748_22: Satthu sammāsambuddhassa ovādānurūpappavattibhāvato etaṃ satthusāsananti ca jāneyyāsīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1749_2: Rāgādivinayakāraṇaṃ yathā tena suttapadena pakāsitanti āha “vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0402t:1749_5: Challiṃ uṭṭhapetvāti arogassa mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato upakkamena challikāya sakalikāya papaṭikāya vā
tika-s0402t:1749_6: uṭṭhāpanaṃ viya arogassa sāsanadhammassa tiṭṭhato byañjanamattena tappariyāpannaṃ viya hutvā challisadisaṃ
tika-s0402t:1749_8: Tādisāni pana ekaṃsato guḷhavessantarādipariyāpannāni hontīti āha “guḷhavessantara…pe…
tika-s0402t:1749_10: Rāgādivinayeti rāgādivinayanatthena atadākāratāya apaññāyamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni cajitabbāni na gahetabbāni.
tika-s0402t:1756_3: Kilamatīti tasseva sokassa vasena kāye ca uppannadukkhena kilamati.
tika-s0402t:1756_4: Paridevatīti sokuddehakavasena taṃ taṃ vippalapanto vācāya paridevati.
tika-s0402t:1756_9: Kiṃ nu kho ida”nti ārammaṇaṃ kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā,
tika-s0402t:1759_4: Atha vā kvacīti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā vā.
tika-s0402t:1759_8: vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā parehi parikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1759_9: Tattha parassāti parajāti paro purisoti vā evaṃ gahitassa.
tika-s0402t:1759_10: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-
tika-s0402t:1759_14: Paro puriso nāma atthi mamatthāya ṭhito.
tika-s0402t:1759_15: Tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ ijjhatīti ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ
tika-s0402t:1759_17: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano sabbhāvaṃ na passati.
tika-s0402t:1759_18: Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano eva kassaci attaniyataṃ na passati.
tika-s0402t:1759_19: Na ca mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathārahaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, atthi-
tika-s0402t:1759_21: Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1759_22: Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā natthīti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
tika-s0402t:1762_1: Chaṭṭhe ākaḍḍhīyatīti cittavasiko loko tattha tattha upakaḍḍhīyati.
tika-s0402t:1762_2: Tesaṃyevettha gahaṇaṃ veditabbanti ye apariññātavatthukā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0402t:1762_4: Na hi pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0402t:1765_1: Sattame vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmattoti ettha vassakāroti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1765_4: issariyena ceva vittūpakaraṇena cāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0402t:1765_11: So hi taṃ gāmaṃ soṇadaṇḍo viya,
tika-s0402t:1765_20: pasādanīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā appasādanīyaṭṭhāne pasannoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:1765_21: Taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ atthaṃ passatīti atthadasā,
tika-s0402t:1765_25: Neva sappurisaṃ na asappurisaṃ jānāti sappurisadhammānaṃ asappurisadhammānañca yāthāvato ajānanato.
tika-s0402t:1768_2: nirayasaṃvattaniyena vā kammunā niraye niyuttoti nerayiko.
tika-s0402t:1768_3: Avīcimhi uppajjitvā tattha āyukappasaññitaṃ antarakappaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho.
tika-s0402t:1768_6: Sace hi eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0402t:1768_9: “Iminā puṭṭhe ahaṃ pucchāmī”ti eko ekaṃ na oloketi,
tika-s0402t:1768_10: evaṃ santepi tesaṃ vāro paññāyati eva,
tika-s0402t:1768_12: Vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ chāyaṃ atikkamanato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1768_25: Sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:1768_27: Yāvatā hi lokiyamahājane ekaṃ padaṃ kathente tāva ānandatthero aṭṭha padāni katheti.
tika-s0402t:1768_28: Ānandatthere pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasa padāni katheti. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:1769_5: Tañhi padavākyaṃ paricchijjamānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ byañjeti pakāseti.
tika-s0402t:1769_6: Etena aparāparehi padabyañjanehi sucirampi kālaṃ kathentassa tathāgatassa na kadāci tesaṃ pariyādānaṃ atthīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1775_1: Dasame tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti āmeḍitavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena vuttanti āha “yato yato anuviloketī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1775_3: saddopi byāpanicchāvacanamevāti anu anu viloketvāti attho,
tika-s0402t:1775_4: pañcapasādappaṭimaṇḍitāni akkhīni ummīletvā tato tato viloketvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1775_7: Puṭabandhanena pariharitvā asitabbaṃ puṭosaṃ sambalaṃ a-
tika-s0402t:1780_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame sotānugatānanti pasādasotaṃ anugantvā gatānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1780_3: Evaṃbhūtā ca pasādasotaṃ odahitvā ñāṇasotena suṭṭhu vavatthapitā nāma hontīti āha “pasādasota”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:1780_4: Ekaccassa hi uggahitapubbavacanaṃ taṃ taṃ paguṇaṃ niccharitaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapitaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0402t:1780_5: “Asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte “sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1780_6: Ekaccassa taṃ taṃ paguṇaṃ bhavaṅgasotasadisaṃ hoti “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
tika-s0402t:1781_0: Vaḷañjetīti pāḷiṃ anusandhiṃ pubbāparavasena vācuggataṃ karonto dhāreti.
tika-s0402t:1781_3: dasavaggāni gatānī”tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1781_4: Vaggādivasena hi idha vacasā paricayo adhippeto,
tika-s0402t:1781_5: na pana suttekadesassa suttamattassa vacasā paricayo.
tika-s0402t:1781_6: Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā viditā manusānupekkhitā.
tika-s0402t:1781_7: Yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1781_8: mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati.
tika-s0402t:1781_10: Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
tika-s0402t:1784_2: Sīlaṃ veditabbanti “ayaṃ susīlo vā dussīlo vā”ti saha vasantena upasaṅkamantena jānitabbo.
tika-s0402t:1784_4: na ittaranti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1784_6: Dvīhatīhañhi saṃyatākāro ca saṃvutindriyākāro ca na sakkā dassetuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1784_7: Manasi karotāti tampi “sīlamassa pariggahessāmī”ti manasikarontena paccavekkhanteneva sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-s0402t:1784_10: Bālo hi manasikarontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:1787_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
tika-s0402t:1788_6: Ekaccassa hi sammukhākathā parammukhākathāya na sameti parammukhākathā sammukhākathāya.
tika-s0402t:1788_9: So kathaneneva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti.
tika-s0402t:1788_14: tasmā kathanena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento evamāha.
tika-s0402t:1789_2: so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbaṃ gahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ apassanto advārakagharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati.
tika-s0402t:1790_1: Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uppilavati.
tika-s0402t:1790_3: Udakavipphanditeneva hi maccho khuddako vā mahanto vāti ñāyati.
tika-s0402t:1797_1: Catutthe puggalassa pārisuddhiyā padhānabhūtāni vā aṅgāni pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni.
tika-s0402t:1800_1: Pañcame pihitattāti akusalassa pavesanadvāraṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā.
tika-s0402t:1800_2: Kāyena saṃvaritabbañhi apihitena dvārena pavattanakaṃ pāpadhammaṃ saṃvaritvā ṭhito kāyena saṃvuto nāma.
tika-s0402t:1800_7: Pahānābhisamayabhāvanābhisamayānaṃ abhinnakālattā padīpujjalanena andhakāraṃ viya vijjuppādena avijjā niruddhāva hoti,
tika-s0402t:1800_11: Hetuphaladhammā ca samānakālāpi pubbāparakālā viya voharīyanti yathā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti paccayādānuppajjanakiriyā.
tika-s0402t:1800_12: Cittassa kāyassa ca vihananato vighāto, dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1801_1: Ṭhapetvā hi samāpattivelaṃ bhavaṅgavelañca khīṇāsavā iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena sabbakālaṃ viharanti.
tika-s0402t:1801_2: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
tika-s0402t:1801_3: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti hi nissayavohārena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1801_6: Rāgavasena na somanassajāto hotīti gehasitapemavasenapi javanakkhaṇe somanassajāto na hoti maggena samucchinnattā,
tika-s0402t:1801_8: Upekkhako majjhatto hutvā viharatīti asamapekkhanena mohaṃ anuppādento ñāṇupekkhāvaseneva upekkhako viharati majjhatto.
tika-s0402t:1801_9: Khīṇāsavo hi iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi ārammaṇe yo asamapekkhanena samasamā ayonisogahaṇe akhīṇāsavānaṃ moho uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1801_10: taṃ anuppādento maggeneva tassa samugghātitattā ñāṇupekkhāvaseneva upekkhako viharati,
tika-s0402t:1801_11: ayañcassa paṭipatti sativepullapattiyā paññāvepullapattiyā cāti vuttaṃ “satisampajaññapariggahitāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1802_0: Ettha ca “chasu dvāresu upekkhako viharatī”ti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā.
tika-s0402t:1802_1: “Sampajāno”ti vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0402t:1802_2: “Satatavihārā”ti vacanato aṭṭhapi mahākiriyacittāni labbhanti ñāṇuppattipaccayarahitakālepi pavattijotanato.
tika-s0402t:1802_3: “Arajjanto adussanto”ti vacanato hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanehi saddhiṃ dasa cittāni labbhanti.
tika-s0402t:1802_5: Nanu cettha “upekkhako viharatī”ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ āgatattā somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti?
tika-s0402t:1802_7: Kiñcāpi hi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatte viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhappakatibhāvāvijahanato,
tika-s0402t:1802_8: kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārabhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1802_9: tassa yāthāvato sabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0402t:1803_6: Pacchā uppajjitvāti etasmiṃ attabhāve manodvārikavedanāto pacchā uppajjitvā tato paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-s0402t:1803_7: tato eva atthasiddhamatthaṃ sarūpeneva dassetuṃ “manodvārikavedanā paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1803_8: Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “sā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:1803_11: Ṭhitā hotīti vaḍḍhihāniyo anupagantvā samarūpeneva ṭhitā hoti.
tika-s0402t:1803_15: Hadayakoṭiṃyevāti cakkhādivatthūsu appavattitvā tesaṃ ādiantakoṭibhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃyeva.
tika-s0402t:1804_4: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāyāti imaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariyosānappattaṃ manodvārikavedanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0402t:1805_3: So panāyaṃ sabbaso appavattivasenevāti āha “appavattanadhammāni bhavissantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1806_0: Attabhāvaṃ nāsetukāmassa daḷhaṃ uppannaṃ saṃvegañāṇaṃ sandhāyāha “kudālo viya paññā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1806_2: Tannissāya pavattetabbavipassanārambhañāṇaṃ sandhāya “khanitti viya vipassanā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1809_3: Tena kāyadaḷhibahulatānimittassa pāpassa jigucchanaṃ virajjanaṃ tapojigucchāti āha “dukkarakārikasaṅkhātenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1809_6: kāyenapi tameva allīnā nānappakāraṃ attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharantīti attho.
tika-s0402t:1809_11: tadā pana te cetanāpakkhikā vā abbohārikā vāti,
tika-s0402t:1809_13: Atha vā dvārantare pavattānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ vacīsamācārādibhāvābhāvo viya dvārantare pavattānampi abhijjhādīnaṃ kāyasamācārādibhāvo asiddho,
tika-s0402t:1809_14: manosamācārabhāvo eva pana siddhoti katvā manosamācāravāre eva abhijjhādayo uddhaṭā.
tika-s0402t:1812_0: Aparisuddhājīvāti aparisuddhena vejjakammadūtakammavaḍḍhiyogādinā ekavīsatianesanābhedena ājīvena samannāgatā.
tika-s0402t:1812_2: “yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti pana vacanato bāhirakavasena gahaṭṭhavasena ca yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1813_0: Ñāṇadassanāyāti ettha ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi vuccati phalañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi vipassanāñāṇampi.
tika-s0402t:1813_2: ñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti hi ettha maggañāṇaṃ “ñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1813_3: “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1813_4: “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1816_2: Sā pana appesakkhatā ādhipateyyasampattiyā parivārasampattiyā ca abhāvena pākaṭā hoti.
tika-s0402t:1816_5: Sā panassā issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā pākaṭā jātāti aḍḍhatāpariyāyabhāvena vadanto “aḍḍhāti issarā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1816_7: Idha pana vaḷañjanakeneva dhanena mahaddhanataṃ dassento “vaḷañjanakadhanena mahaddhanā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:1816_11: suppatiṭṭhitamahesatāya pana parehi mahesoti akkhātabbatāya mahesakkhā.
tika-s0402t:1816_12: Yasmā pana so mahesakkhābhāvo ādhipateyyaparivārasampattiyā viññāyati,
tika-s0402t:1817_3: Rūpanti ca sarīraṃ “rūpavanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:1817_5: dissamānā cakkhūni piyāyatīti aññakiccavikkhepaṃ hitvāpi daṭṭhabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:1817_15: Iti paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti uttamaparisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1818_0: Abhisajjatīti kujjhanavaseneva kuṭilakaṇṭako viya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samuṭṭhāne makaradanto viya lagati.
tika-s0402t:1818_1: Yañhi kodhassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūte ārammaṇe upanāhassa paccayabhūtaṃ kujjhanavasena abhisajjanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1818_5: tato balavataro byāpādo laddhāsevanatāya cittassa byāpajjanato.
tika-s0402t:1818_6: Sātisayaṃ laddhāsevanatāya tato byāpādatopi balavatarā paccatthikabhāvena thāmappatti patitthiyanā.
tika-s0402t:1818_15: Chattampi hi vassātapadukkhanivāraṇena maggagamanasādhananti katvā “yāna”nti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:1821_3: Idha pana yo paro na hoti, so attā,
tika-s0402t:1821_12: Anto tāpanakilesānanti attano santāne darathapariḷāhajananena santāpanakilesānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1823_3: Yamakasnehena hi esā tadā kāyaṃ abbhañjati.
tika-s0402t:1823_5: Parikkhepakaraṇatthāyāti navamālāhi saddhiṃ dabbhehi vediyā parikkhipanatthāya.
tika-s0402t:1824_3: Bhogārogyādivatthukā madā suppahiyā honti nimittassa avaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0402t:1824_4: na tathā kulavijjāmadāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulānaṃ pabbajitānampi jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena hi…pe…
tika-s0402t:1824_7: Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0402t:1824_9: Patiṭṭhātunti vā saccappaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1825_0: Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1825_4: Kāmaṃ “jāyampatikā”ti vutte gharasāmikagharasāminivasena dvinnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati,
tika-s0402t:1825_5: yassa pana purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo honti,
tika-s0402t:1825_6: tattha kiṃ vattabbanti ekāyapi saṃvāso sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1825_8: khettavatthuādinā sapalibodhaṭṭhena rāgarajādīnaṃ āgamanapathatāpi uppajjanaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā ekatthā,
tika-s0402t:1825_11: Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyāyeva
tika-s0402t:1826_0: Saṅkhepakathāti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0402t:1826_2: Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:1827_1: Ābandhanaṭṭhenāti putto nattātiādinā pemavasena saparicchedavasena bandhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0402t:1827_5: saddo ājīvasaddasannidhānato uparivuccamānavisesāpekkhāya ca visesaniviṭṭhova hotīti vuttaṃ “yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1827_12: byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato ca vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1827_15: Tato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1828_5: Yasmā pana anuvattanavasena sandhānassa padānaṃ ādhānaṃ ārakkhanaṃ vā daḷhakaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:1833_1: Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā ayuttakālappayogena atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanavācaṃ anulometi,
tika-s0402t:1833_2: tasmā samphappalāpaṃ pajahantena akālavāditā pariharitabbāti vuttaṃ “kālavādī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1833_3: Kālena vadantenapi ubhayānatthasādhanato abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha “bhūtavādī”ti.
tika-s0402t:1833_6: Atthaṃ vadantenapi lokiyadhammasannissitameva avatvā lokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vattabbanti dassanatthaṃ “dhammavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1833_9: Pañcannañhi saṃvaravinayānaṃ pañcannañca pahānavinayānaṃ vasena vuccamāno attho nibbānādhigamanahetubhāvato lokuttaradhammasannissito hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1833_10: Evaṃ guṇavisesayuttova attho vuccamāno desanākosalle sati sobhati,
tika-s0402t:1833_12: na aññathāti dassetuṃ “nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1833_14: Pucchādivasena hi otiṇṇavācāvatthusmiṃ ekaṃsādibyākaraṇavibhāgaṃ sallakkhetvā ṭhapanāhetūdāharaṇasandassanādiṃ
tika-s0402t:1833_16: kathāya ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pare yāthāvato dhamme patiṭṭhāpento “desanākusalo”ti vuccatīti evamettha atthayojanā
tika-s0402t:1834_0: Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā satta mūlasikkhāpadāni vibhajitvā abhijjhādippahānaṃ indriyasaṃvarajāgariyānuyogehi vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0402t:1834_1: tampi nīharitvā ācārasīlasseva vibhajanavasena pāḷi pavattāti tadatthaṃ vivarituṃ “bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1834_3: Bhūtānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ samūho bhūtagāmo.
tika-s0402t:1834_4: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-s0402t:1834_5: cittarahitatā ca paripphandābhāvato chinne viruhanato visadisajātibhāvato catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā,
tika-s0402t:1834_6: vuddhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1834_7: visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādīnaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1835_4: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-
tika-s0402t:1835_5: saddo tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0402t:1835_8: Kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā bījagāmo eva niddiṭṭhoti?
tika-s0402t:1835_17: Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-
tika-s0402t:1836_2: So pana rattibhojanenapi siyāti tannivattanatthaṃ āha “rattūparato”ti.
tika-s0402t:1836_3: Evampi aparaṇhabhojīpi siyā ekabhattikoti tannivattanatthaṃ “virato vikālabhojanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1836_4: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-s0402t:1836_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā “atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1837_2: Aññehi gāhāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti “neva taṃ uggaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:1837_5: Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena, vācāya, manasāti.
tika-s0402t:1837_8: manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ sādiyananti tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiggahaṇāti vuttanti āha “neva taṃ uggaṇhātī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1837_17: gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1837_18: Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭati sati paccayeti āha “aññatra odissa anuññātā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1838_8: Telādīnaṃ nāḷiādīhi minanakāle ussāpitā sikhāyeva sikhābhedo,
tika-s0402t:1839_4: Yathā hi apaṭiggahabhāvasāmaññe satipi pabbajitehi appaṭiggahitabbavatthuvisesabhāvasandassanatthaṃ itthikumāridāsidāsādayo vibhāgena vuttā,
tika-s0402t:1839_5: evaṃ parassaharaṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññe satipi tulākūṭādayo adinnādānavisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā.
tika-s0402t:1839_6: Na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi,
tika-s0402t:1839_8: idha paraṃkāroti ca na sakkā vattuṃ “kāyavacippayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā chappayogā”ti vacanato,
tika-s0402t:1839_11: Tampi pothanameva sandhāyāti ca sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇasaddassa vihiṃsanepi dissanato.
tika-s0402t:1840_0: Cīvarapiṇḍapātānaṃ yathākkamaṃ kāyakucchipariharaṇamattajotanāyaṃ avisesato aṭṭhannaṃ parikkhārānaṃ tappayojanatā
tika-s0402t:1840_2: Etepīti navaparikkhārikādayopi appicchā ca santuṭṭhā ca.
tika-s0402t:1840_3: Na hi tattakena mahicchatā asantuṭṭhitā hotīti.
tika-s0402t:1841_1: tato eva sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā assa santīti cātuddiso.
tika-s0402t:1841_2: Tattha cāyaṃ satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena nappaṭihaññatīti appaṭigho.
tika-s0402t:1841_5: abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittūpaddavānaṃ abhibhavanato parissayānaṃ sahitā.
tika-s0402t:1841_8: Tato eva khaggamigasiṅgasadisatāya khaggavisāṇakappo careyyāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1842_1: asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo gantuṃ na sakkotīti pakkhi-
tika-s0402t:1842_2: saddena visesetvā sakuṇo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha “pakkhayutto sakuṇo”ti.
tika-s0402t:1842_3: Yassa sannidhikāraparibhogo kiñci ṭhapetabbaṃ sāpekkhāṭhapanañca natthi,
tika-s0402t:1842_6: tehi vā ārakāti ariyoti āha “ariyenāti niddosenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1843_0: Yathāvutte sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhitasseva indriyasaṃvaro icchitabbo tadadhiṭṭhānato tassa ca paripālakabhāvatoti
tika-s0402t:1843_1: vuttaṃ “so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhū”ti.
tika-s0402t:1843_4: na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:1843_6: Nānubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjanantiladdhavohāraṃ hatthapādasitahasitakathitavilokitādibhedaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_10: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-s0402t:1843_11: asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvassaveyyuṃ anuppabandheyyuṃ.
tika-s0402t:1843_12: Tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya paṭipajjati.
tika-s0402t:1843_16: Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato rūpādīsu kilesānubandhanimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇaṃ indriyasaṃvaraṃ sīlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1843_19: Kilesehi anavasittasukhantiādīsu rūpādīsu nimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇattā indriyasaṃvarassa kilesehi
tika-s0402t:1844_5: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
tika-s0402t:1844_7: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato oṇamanto abhikkamati nāma,
tika-s0402t:1844_9: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
tika-s0402t:1845_4: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1845_8: aññatthāpi pavattesu avijahitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1845_10: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:1845_13: Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1845_14: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0402t:1845_15: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0402t:1845_17: Keci pana “āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva taṃ nissāya brahmacariyānuggahāya paṭipannattā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:1846_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1846_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
tika-s0402t:1846_4: attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
tika-s0402t:1846_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti.
tika-s0402t:1846_19: Dantakaṭṭhatthāya sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā gatadaharabhikkhuno vatthupettha kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1846_20: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1846_22: Sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṃ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1847_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthakasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0402t:1847_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:1848_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati,
tika-s0402t:1848_6: tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1848_7: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati,
tika-s0402t:1848_9: āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
tika-s0402t:1848_13: vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
tika-s0402t:1848_16: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0402t:1848_21: Tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṃ sannisandhi odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṃ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
tika-s0402t:1851_5: Vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti “asukassa bhikkhuno araññe tiracchānagatānaṃ viya vanacarakānaṃ viya ca nivāsamattameva,
tika-s0402t:1851_6: na araññavāsānucchavikā kāci sammāpaṭipattī”ti apavādavasena vattabbataṃ,
tika-s0402t:1851_7: āraññakehi vā tiracchānagatehi vanacarakavisabhāgajanehi vippaṭipattivasena vatthabbataṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0402t:1852_2: Taṃ pana janasaddanigghosābhāvena veditabbaṃ saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassāti āha “appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:1852_14: Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1852_23: Masārakādi mañcapīṭhaṃ tattha attharitabbabhisi upadhānañca mañcapīṭhasambandhato mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1852_25: Abhisaṅkhatābhāvato kevalaṃ sayanassa nisajjāya ca okāsabhūtaṃ rukkhamūlādi paṭikkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1852_26: Senāsanaggahaṇena gahitamevāti “vivittaṃ senāsana”nti iminā senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva sāmaññajotanābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:1853_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “arañña”nti vuttanti āha “imassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:1853_1: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgatanti idaṃ vinaye tathā āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1853_2: abhidhammepi pana “araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhilā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti āgatameva.
tika-s0402t:1853_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
tika-s0402t:1853_12: saddo avisesato pabbatapariyāyoti katvā vuttaṃ “pabbatanti sela”nti,
tika-s0402t:1853_15: Vivaranti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ mitho āsannatare ṭhitānaṃ ovarakādisadisaṃ vivaraṃ.
tika-s0402t:1853_18: Manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānanti pakatisañcāravasena manussehi na sañcaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0402t:1853_23: Vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti imaṃ pāḷippadesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:1853_24: Acchannanti kenaci chadanena antamaso rukkhasākhāyapi na chāditaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1854_3: tasmā vāmoruṃ dakkhiṇoruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubho pāde aññamaññaṃ sambandhe katvā nisajjā pallaṅkanti āha “samantato ūrubaddhāsana”nti.
tika-s0402t:1854_5: Ābhujitvāti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti,
tika-s0402t:1854_6: evaṃ ubho pāde ābhujite samiñjite katvā.
tika-s0402t:1854_7: Taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathāsambandhatākaraṇanti āha “bandhitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1854_8: Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti ujuṃ kāyanti ettha kāya-
tika-s0402t:1854_10: Taṃ pana ujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1854_12: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na laṅgheti,
tika-s0402t:1854_13: tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesasampattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gacchati.
tika-s0402t:1854_17: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1854_20: Ettha ca yathā “vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī”tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1854_21: evaṃ nisīdatīti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiyo santo iriyāpatho dassito.
tika-s0402t:1855_3: tasmā pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-s0402t:1856_0: Abhijjhāyati gijjhati abhikaṅkhati etāyāti abhijjhā, lobho.
tika-s0402t:1856_3: Vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ paṭipakkhena suppahīnattā.
tika-s0402t:1856_4: Pahīnattāti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatattā.
tika-s0402t:1856_5: Tathāpi nayidaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya sabhāvato vigatābhijjhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1856_8: Eseva nayoti yathā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sabhāvena vigatābhijjhaṃ abyāpannañca na bhāvanāya vikkhambhitattā,
tika-s0402t:1856_10: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhāvanāya parisodhitattā abyāpannaṃ vigatathinamiddhaṃ anuddhataṃ nibbicikicchañcāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1856_13: “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa akalyatā”tiādinā ca middhassa abhidhamme niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1856_15: Satipi hi aññamaññaṃ avippayoge cittakāyalahutādīnaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ yathākkamaṃ taṃtaṃvisesassa yā tesaṃ akalyatādīnaṃ visesapaccayatā,
tika-s0402t:1857_9: Ucchinditvā pātentīti ettha ucchindanaṃ pātanañca tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva.
tika-s0402t:1857_10: Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇadhammā itarāya ca
tika-s0402t:1860_1: Navame tayo bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitaṃ “ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā vuttaṃ
tika-s0402t:1860_2: taṃ taṃ attano koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ jālametissā atthīti jālinī.
tika-s0402t:1860_6: Apicātiādinā niddesanayena visattikāpadassa atthaṃ dassento niddesapāḷiyā ekadesaṃ dasseti “visamūlā”tiādinā.
tika-s0402t:1861_10: Visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe kule gaṇe āvāse lābhe yase pasaṃsāya sukhe
tika-s0402t:1861_12: rūpabhave arūpabhave saññibhave asaññibhave nevasaññināsaññibhave ekavokārabhave catuvokārabhave pañcavokārabhave
tika-s0402t:1861_13: atīte anāgate paccuppanne diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1862_6: Ratto hi rāgavatthunā parena tāḷiyamānopi sahati,
tika-s0402t:1862_8: Visaṃharatīti tathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito cittaṃ saṃharati saṃkhipati.
tika-s0402t:1862_13: visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā.
tika-s0402t:1862_19: taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visaṭā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1863_0: Tantaṃ vuccati vatthavinanatthaṃ tantavāyehi daṇḍake āsañcitvā pasāritasuttavaṭṭi “tanīyatī”ti katvā,
tika-s0402t:1863_1: taṃ pana suttaṃ santānākulatāya nidassanabhāvena ākulameva gahitanti āha “tantaṃ viya ākulajāto”ti.
tika-s0402t:1863_2: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1863_7: Vinanato gulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmassa tantavāyassa guṇṭhikaṃ nāma ākulabhāvena aggato vā mūlato
tika-s0402t:1863_8: vā duviññeyyameva khalibaddhatantasuttanti āha “gulāguṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasutta”nti.
tika-s0402t:1864_2: Tañhi sā kuṭavaṃ tato tato tiṇahīrādike ānetvā tathā vinati,
tika-s0402t:1864_3: yathā te pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ viya aggena vā aggaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1864_4: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ vivecetuṃ vā na sakkā.
tika-s0402t:1864_8: Kāmaṃ muñjapabbajatiṇāni yathājātānipi dīghabhāvena patitvā araññaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ vinandhitvā ākulabyākulāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0402t:1864_9: tāni pana na tathā dubbiveciyāni yathā rajjubhūtānīti dassetuṃ “yathā tānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1866_0: Khandhānañca paṭipāṭīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavatti.
tika-s0402t:1866_2: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ “apāya”ntiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ apāyadukkhañca vaṭṭadukkhañca.
tika-s0402t:1866_3: Mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viyāti idaṃ paribbhamanaṭṭhānassa mahantadassanatthañceva paribbhamanassa anavaṭṭhitatādassanatthañca upamā.
tika-s0402t:1866_4: Yante yuttagoṇo viyāti idaṃ pana avasībhāvadassanatthañceva duppamokkhabhāvadassanatthañcāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1867_1: “itthaṃ evaṃ aññathā”ti pana visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇaṃ samūhaggāhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:1867_2: Visesaṃ akatvāti ca anupanidhānaṃ samato asamato ca upanidhānanti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:1867_4: Evaṃ aññathāti pana samato asamato ca upanidhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1868_4: Patthanākappanavasenāti “api nāma sādhu panāhaṃ siya”nti evaṃ patthanāya kappanavasena.
tika-s0402t:1868_6: “Itthaṃ evaṃ aññathā”ti vuttassa visesassa anissitattā “suddhasīsā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0402t:1868_7: Tattha diṭṭhisīsehi diṭṭhiyā gahitāya tadavinābhāvinī taṇhā dassitā,
tika-s0402t:1868_8: catūhi sīsehi dvādasahi ca sīsamūlakehi mānadiṭṭhīhi ayameva taṇhā dassitāti āha “evamete…pe…
tika-s0402t:1868_12: tasmā kathaṃ taṇhāvicaritānīti idaṃ vacanaṃ? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t:1868_13: diṭṭhimānesupi taṇhāvicaritānīti vacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ vippayogīnaṃ diṭṭhimānānaṃ taṇhāya avippayogānaṃ taṃmūlakattā tappadhānatāya katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1875_10: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃkatena ca dussīlyena samannāgato,
tika-s0402t:1875_15: Sappurisena sappurisataroti attanā ca katena susīlyena samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti,
tika-s0402t:1875_17: Ettha ca parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ susīlyaṃ vā āṇattiyā attanā ca vacippayogena katanti āṇāpanavasena pasutapāpassa
tika-s0402t:1875_18: puññassa vā dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo”ti vutto.
tika-s0402t:1880_2: Cintākavītiādīsu vatthuanusandhiubhayameva cirena cintetvā karaṇavasena cintākavi veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1880_3: Kiñci sutvā sutena assutaṃ anusandhetvā karaṇavasena sutakavi,
tika-s0402t:1880_4: kiñci atthaṃ upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipanavitthāraṇādivasena atthakavi yaṃkiñci parena kataṃ kabbaṃ nāṭakaṃ
tika-s0402t:1880_5: vā disvā taṃsadisameva aññaṃ attano ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena karaṇavasena paṭibhānakavi veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1884_17: Missakakammanti kālena kaṇhaṃ kālena sukkanti evaṃ missakavasena katakammaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1884_18: Sukhadukkhavipākanti vatvā tattha sukhadukkhānaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “missakakammaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1884_19: Kammassa kaṇhasukkasamaññā kaṇhasukkābhijātihetutāyāti apacayagāmitāya tadubhayaviddhaṃsakassa kammakkhayakarakammassa
tika-s0402t:1884_23: Sampattibhavapariyāpanno hi vipāko idha sukkaṃ sukkavipākoti adhippeto,
tika-s0402t:1887_4: Kāyasaṅkhārādīsu kāyadvāre gahaṇādivasena copanappattā dvādasa akusalacetanā abyābajjhakāyasaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:1887_5: Vacīdvāre hanusaṃcopanavasena vacībhedappavattikā tāyeva dvādasa vacīsaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:1887_6: Ubhayacopanaṃ appatvā raho cintentassa manodvāre pavattā manosaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:1887_7: Iti tīsupi dvāresu kāyaduccaritādibhedā akusalā cetanāva saṅkhārāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1887_9: taṃ pana āyūhanaṃ paccayasamavāyasiddhito saṅkaḍḍhitvā piṇḍanaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:1887_15: Tassa pahānāyāti tassa yathāvuttassa kammassa anuppattidhammatāpādanāya.
tika-s0402t:1890_2: divasāni purimatarānīti ettha hiyyo divasaṃ purimaṃ nāma,
tika-s0402t:1890_4: Iti imesu dvīsu pavattito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo dassito.
tika-s0402t:1890_9: taṃ taṃ purimataraṃ orapārabhāvassa viya purimatarabhāvassa ca apekkhāsiddhattā.
tika-s0402t:1893_2: Yathā hi “vivicceva kāmehī”ti ettha kato niyamo “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇaatthassa icchitabbattā,
tika-s0402t:1893_5: Sāmaññaphalādhigamavasena nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitā.
tika-s0402t:1893_6: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne cattāro phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva adhippetā samitapāpasamaṇaggahaṇato.
tika-s0402t:1893_7: Kasmā panettha mahāparinibbāne viya maggaṭṭhā tadatthāya paṭipannāpi na gahitāti?
tika-s0402t:1893_9: Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi,
tika-s0402t:1893_10: kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā “ñāyassa dhammassa padesavattī,
tika-s0402t:1893_12: Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā,
tika-s0402t:1894_8: So evaṃ anussaranto “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti abhivadati,
tika-s0402t:1894_9: takkī pana takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti abhivadati.
tika-s0402t:1895_0: Sattesu saṅkhāresu ca ekaccaṃ sassatanti pavatto vādo ekaccasassatavādo.
tika-s0402t:1895_1: So pana brahmakāyikakhiḍḍāpadosikamanopadosikattabhāvato cavitvā idhāgatānaṃ takkino ca uppajjanavasena
tika-s0402t:1896_0: Cattāro antānantikāti ettha amati gacchati ettha vosānanti anto, mariyādā.
tika-s0402t:1896_2: Anto ca ananto ca antānanto sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0402t:1896_9: antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0402t:1896_11: Avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa taṃ kasiṇaṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gaṇhantassa vasena paṭhamo vutto,
tika-s0402t:1896_15: Ettha ca yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vādānaṃ antañca anantañca antānantañca ārabbha pavattavādattā antānantikattaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1896_18: Antānantikappaṭisedhavādopi hi antānantavisayo eva taṃ ārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0402t:1897_1: “Evantipi me no”tiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca.
tika-s0402t:1897_7: sā ummujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gāhaṃ na gacchati,
tika-s0402t:1897_8: evamevaṃ ayampi vādo ito cito ca sandhāvati,
tika-s0402t:1897_11: Svāyaṃ vādo musāvādānuyogachandarāgabhayamohabhāvahetukatāya catudhā pavattoti āha “cattāro amarāvikkhepikā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1898_0: Adhicca yathicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci buddhipubbaṃ vā vinā samuppannoti attalokasaññitānaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:1898_1: adhicca pavattiākārārammaṇaṃ dassanaṃ tadākārasannissayena pavattito tadākārasahacaritatāya ca “adhiccasamuppanna”nti
tika-s0402t:1899_2: Rūpicatukkaṃ ekantasukhacatukkanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasa saññivādā.
tika-s0402t:1899_3: Imesuyeva purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena aṭṭha saññivādā,
tika-s0402t:1899_5: Kevalañhi tattha “saññī attā”ti gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo,
tika-s0402t:1900_0: Satta ucchedavādāti manussattabhāve kāmāvacaradevattabhāve rūpāvacarattabhāve catubbidhārūpattabhāve
tika-s0402t:1900_1: ca ṭhatvā sattassa ucchedapaññāpanavasena satta ucchedavādā.
tika-s0402t:1901_0: Pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti pañcakāmaguṇaupabhogavasena catubbidharūpajjhānasukhaparibhogavasena ca diṭṭhadhamme nibbūtipaññāpanavādā.
tika-s0402t:1902_1: so eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti āha “ñāyassa dhammassā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1902_2: Ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthītiādīsu kasmā panete aññattha natthīti?
tika-s0402t:1902_4: Yathā hi na āragge sāsapo tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:1902_7: evamevaṃ bāhiresu titthāyatanesu na ime samaṇā uppajjanti,
tika-s0402t:1902_10: Sā pana nesaṃ akkhettatā sukkhettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvato bhāvato ca veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1903_1: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
tika-s0402t:1903_13: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati. Idheva, subhadda, samaṇo,
tika-s0402t:1904_0: Ariyamaggassa ca abhāvo bhāvo ca suparisuddhassa sīlassa suparisuddhāya samathavipassanābhāvanāya abhāvato bhāvato ca veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:1904_5: tasmā yathā surattahatthapādo bhāsurakesarabhāro sīho migarājā na susāne vā saṅkārakūṭe vā paṭivasati,
tika-s0402t:1904_6: tiyojanasahassavitthataṃ pana himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā maṇiguhāyameva vasati,
tika-s0402t:1904_7: yathā ca chaddanto nāgarājā na gocariyahatthikulādīsu navasu kulesu uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1904_8: yathā ca valāhako assarājā na gadrabhakule vā ghoṭakakule vā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1904_10: yathā ca sabbakāmadadaṃ manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ na saṅkārakūṭe vā paṃsupabbatādīsu vā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1904_12: yathā ca timirapiṅgalo maccharājā na khuddakapokkharaṇīsu uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1904_14: yathā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko supaṇṇarājā na gāmadvāre eraṇḍavanādīsu paṭivasati,
tika-s0402t:1904_16: yathā ca dhataraṭṭho suvaṇṇahaṃso na gāmadvāre āvāṭakādīsu paṭivasati,
tika-s0402t:1904_18: yathā ca catuddīpissaro cakkavattirājā na nīcakule uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1904_20: evamevaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekasamaṇopi na aññattha titthāyatane uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:1909_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame vivādādhikaraṇādīsūti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesu catūsu.
tika-s0402t:1909_2: Tattha dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-s0402t:1909_4: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-s0402t:1912_1: Dutiye bhassati niratthakabhāvena khipīyatīti bhasmaṃ, chārikā.
tika-s0402t:1915_2: Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena katajīvitucchedā honti,
tika-s0402t:1915_7: Tenāha “atha vā petavisaye nibbattā petā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0402t:1915_8: Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti dukkhuppattito.
tika-s0402t:1916_1: Bhīrukā sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti,
tika-s0402t:1916_2: sīho pana abhīruko sabhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati.
tika-s0402t:1916_4: Dakkhiṇe purimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0402t:1916_5: Pacchimapāde vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:1916_7: Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvātiādinā vuttasīhakiriyā anutrastappabujjhanā viya abhīrubhāvasiddhadhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:1916_8: Sīhavijambhanaṃ ativelaṃ ekākāre ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ gamanādikiriyāsu yogyabhāvāpādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1917_2: tathāgataseyyāti iminā catutthajjhānaseyyā tathāgataseyyā nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:1917_7: Tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato jātoti.
tika-s0402t:1917_9: tathāpi yasmā “catutthajjhānasamanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti mahāparinibbāne āgataṃ,
tika-s0402t:1917_14: Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddūpagamalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti,
tika-s0402t:1917_16: evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ tathāgataseyyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:1927_0: Dutiye anariyehi pariyesitabbattā anariyānaṃ pariyesanāti anariyapariyesanā.
tika-s0402t:1927_1: Sayaṃ lāmakatāya anariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā anariyapariyesanā.
